    345 <a href="#l326" class="line" id="l326">    326</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h2-0-0&quot; id=&quot;h2-0-0&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+

    804 <a href="#l785" class="line" id="l785">    785</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-52&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-52&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;
    805 <a href="#l786" class="line" id="l786">    786</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-53&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-53&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;/header&amp;gt;
    806 <a href="#l787" class="line" id="l787">    787</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-54&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-54&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;main tabindex=&amp;quot;-1&amp;quot; id=&amp;quot;main-content&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
    807 <a href="#l788" class="line" id="l788">    788</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-55&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-55&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            
    808 <a href="#l789" class="line" id="l789">    789</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-56&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-56&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;div class=&amp;quot;[ page-header ]&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
    809 <a href="#l790" class="line" id="l790">    790</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-57&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-57&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;div class=&amp;quot;[ wrapper ] [ flow ]&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
    810 <a href="#l791" class="line" id="l791">    791</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-58&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-58&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;h1&amp;gt;10 Tips for Website Redesign in 2020&amp;lt;/h1&amp;gt;
    811 <a href="#l792" class="line" id="l792">    792</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-59&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-59&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        
    812 <a href="#l793" class="line" id="l793">    793</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-60&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-60&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;div class=&amp;quot;[ page-header__summary ] [ measure-long ]&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
    813 <a href="#l794" class="line" id="l794">    794</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-61&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-61&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                
    814 <a href="#l795" class="line" id="l795">    795</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-62&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-62&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;time datetime=&amp;quot;Jan 1, 2020&amp;quot;&amp;gt;Jan 1, 2020&amp;lt;/time&amp;gt;
    815 <a href="#l796" class="line" id="l796">    796</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-63&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-63&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
    816 <a href="#l797" class="line" id="l797">    797</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-64&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-64&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;p class=&amp;quot;visually-hidden&amp;quot; id=&amp;quot;tags-desc&amp;quot;&amp;gt;Tags that this post has been filed under.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
    817 <a href="#l798" class="line" id="l798">    798</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-65&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-65&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;ul class=&amp;quot;tags-list&amp;quot; aria-describedby=&amp;quot;tags-desc&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
    818 <a href="#l799" class="line" id="l799">    799</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-66&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-66&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        
    819 <a href="#l800" class="line" id="l800">    800</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-67&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-67&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;li&amp;gt;
    820 <a href="#l801" class="line" id="l801">    801</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-68&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-68&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;/tag/tips-and-tricks/&amp;quot;&amp;gt;#TipsAndTricks&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt;
    821 <a href="#l802" class="line" id="l802">    802</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-69&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-69&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
    822 <a href="#l803" class="line" id="l803">    803</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-70&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-70&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        
    823 <a href="#l804" class="line" id="l804">    804</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-71&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-71&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;li&amp;gt;
    824 <a href="#l805" class="line" id="l805">    805</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-72&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-72&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;/tag/featured/&amp;quot;&amp;gt;#Featured&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt;
    825 <a href="#l806" class="line" id="l806">    806</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-73&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-73&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
    826 <a href="#l807" class="line" id="l807">    807</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-74&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-74&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        
    827 <a href="#l808" class="line" id="l808">    808</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-75&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-75&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;/ul&amp;gt;
    828 <a href="#l809" class="line" id="l809">    809</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-76&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-76&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
    829 <a href="#l810" class="line" id="l810">    810</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-77&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-77&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
    830 <a href="#l811" class="line" id="l811">    811</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-78&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-78&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;
    831 <a href="#l812" class="line" id="l812">    812</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-79&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-79&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        
    832 <a href="#l813" class="line" id="l813">    813</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-80&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-80&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;
    833 <a href="#l814" class="line" id="l814">    814</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-81&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-81&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;
    834 <a href="#l815" class="line" id="l815">    815</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-82&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-82&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;article class=&amp;quot;constrained&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
    835 <a href="#l816" class="line" id="l816">    816</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-83&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-83&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;div class=&amp;quot;[ page-content ] [ flow wrapper ] [ flow-space-700 gap-top-700 ]&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
    836 <a href="#l817" class="line" id="l817">    817</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-84&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-84&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Lorem markdownum &amp;lt;strong&amp;gt;verbis&amp;lt;/strong&amp;gt;, fertur &amp;lt;em&amp;gt;fas&amp;lt;/em&amp;gt; poplite cervix proximus ventis et. Regia ac gestu pugnacem actis, cum &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;#murmurat-veros-tepescunt&amp;quot;&amp;gt;illis&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt;, et ungues ante mihi placet nomina relaxant circumstantes repagula non, speratque. Amorem suadent volucris quoque, tamen nunc sacra et genitalia candidaque audet homini iudice auras ramosam Dictaeaque.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
    837 <a href="#l818" class="line" id="l818">    818</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-85&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-85&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;ol&amp;gt;
    838 <a href="#l819" class="line" id="l819">    819</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-86&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-86&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Addenda ventis non&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
    839 <a href="#l820" class="line" id="l820">    820</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-87&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-87&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Sol inpia ne arboreis&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
    840 <a href="#l821" class="line" id="l821">    821</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-88&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-88&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Iam grates voluit cumque&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
    841 <a href="#l822" class="line" id="l822">    822</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-89&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-89&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Vestigia et clipei adhaeret atque aristas collaque&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
    842 <a href="#l823" class="line" id="l823">    823</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-90&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-90&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Furialibus Aonius morati optari nullique Hersilie manus&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
    843 <a href="#l824" class="line" id="l824">    824</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-91&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-91&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;/ol&amp;gt;
    844 <a href="#l825" class="line" id="l825">    825</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-92&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-92&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;h2&amp;gt;Dispositam terribilis quae&amp;lt;/h2&amp;gt;
    845 <a href="#l826" class="line" id="l826">    826</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-93&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-93&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Cognoscite gerens causam circumstant &amp;lt;em&amp;gt;luctus cupioque&amp;lt;/em&amp;gt; morte, fera coniunx frustra Cnosiacaeque, cupidisque tempus Achaia. Pericla multis blanda! Et terribili, nec, &amp;lt;strong&amp;gt;trepidans&amp;lt;/strong&amp;gt; pro; toto nam urbesque.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
    846 <a href="#l827" class="line" id="l827">    827</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-94&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-94&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Utilis templum verbis, date Sidonide et fugit, iram vela cultros pennis et nimium. Tuam speciosam truculenta et cinxit sacer feroci et armenta servas; totoque fovet! Diversa ite profugi bella fugit viasque, velint sinu sic Iliades aquas gutture &amp;lt;em&amp;gt;asper&amp;lt;/em&amp;gt; Neptunus.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
    847 <a href="#l828" class="line" id="l828">    828</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-95&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-95&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;h2&amp;gt;Tu viginti non&amp;lt;/h2&amp;gt;
    848 <a href="#l829" class="line" id="l829">    829</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-96&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-96&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Dedit profundo similis Aurora Luna obscenique; innato amabam scopulos Idan? Ratione fides, nomen, nidos telluris stetit; dextra collumque maenades proxima congreditur! Inquit in dixere noverca manerem; dis omnia meri postquam nostris calidis fraudesque, &amp;lt;strong&amp;gt;imis&amp;lt;/strong&amp;gt;. &amp;lt;strong&amp;gt;Probavit coniunx quoque&amp;lt;/strong&amp;gt;, me mentior geniti fatorum vulnus.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
    849 <a href="#l830" class="line" id="l830">    830</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-97&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-97&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;ul&amp;gt;
    850 <a href="#l831" class="line" id="l831">    831</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-98&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-98&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Est et haec bitumine documenta ora at&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
    851 <a href="#l832" class="line" id="l832">    832</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-99&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-99&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Possent herbas&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
    852 <a href="#l833" class="line" id="l833">    833</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-100&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-100&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Iacens caelo guttae&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
    853 <a href="#l834" class="line" id="l834">    834</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-101&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-101&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Unus regni&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
    854 <a href="#l835" class="line" id="l835">    835</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-102&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-102&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Ad aras pueroque nomen&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
    855 <a href="#l836" class="line" id="l836">    836</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-103&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-103&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;/ul&amp;gt;
    856 <a href="#l837" class="line" id="l837">    837</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-104&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-104&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;h2&amp;gt;Ut iugo quod&amp;lt;/h2&amp;gt;
    857 <a href="#l838" class="line" id="l838">    838</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-105&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-105&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;In Alce ergo vestem Dixit pede non ut &amp;lt;strong&amp;gt;sumit&amp;lt;/strong&amp;gt; exercent. Illi portus; pedes nomine &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;#duxerat-fudit&amp;quot;&amp;gt;praeferre rarescit cadit&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt; magni, indignantibus iram herbarum omnibus alter. Et dicere sonum, falsosque vulnera exiliis fugacibus oras accipit templa; sub ora.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
    858 <a href="#l839" class="line" id="l839">    839</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-106&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-106&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;ol&amp;gt;
    859 <a href="#l840" class="line" id="l840">    840</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-107&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-107&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Quae equos versus iura leti germanae sibi&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
    860 <a href="#l841" class="line" id="l841">    841</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-108&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-108&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Vertice innubere velox et postquam fugae credulitate&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
    861 <a href="#l842" class="line" id="l842">    842</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-109&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-109&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Mihi scelerataque extendi nec istis nostris caput&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
    862 <a href="#l843" class="line" id="l843">    843</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-110&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-110&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;/ol&amp;gt;
    863 <a href="#l844" class="line" id="l844">    844</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-111&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-111&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Tellure liceat sive serpens, erat quamvis, mihi: vultus mihi &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;#relicta&amp;quot;&amp;gt;contra frater&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt;. Arce constitit Cimmerios quod, pedes, cetera, totoque dixit misit &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;#quae-verba&amp;quot;&amp;gt;adapertaque addidici dabat&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt;.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
    864 <a href="#l845" class="line" id="l845">    845</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-112&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-112&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
    865 <a href="#l846" class="line" id="l846">    846</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-113&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-113&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;
    866 <a href="#l847" class="line" id="l847">    847</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-114&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-114&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;/article&amp;gt;
    867 <a href="#l848" class="line" id="l848">    848</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-115&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-115&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
    868 <a href="#l849" class="line" id="l849">    849</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-116&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-116&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;/main&amp;gt;
    869 <a href="#l850" class="line" id="l850">    850</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-117&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-117&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;footer class=&amp;quot;site-footer&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
    870 <a href="#l851" class="line" id="l851">    851</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-118&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-118&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;div class=&amp;quot;wrapper&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
    871 <a href="#l852" class="line" id="l852">    852</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-119&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-119&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;nav class=&amp;quot;site-footer__navigation&amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;quot;Secondary&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
    872 <a href="#l853" class="line" id="l853">    853</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-120&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-120&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;ul class=&amp;quot;site-footer__navigation__inner&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
    873 <a href="#l854" class="line" id="l854">    854</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-121&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-121&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                
    874 <a href="#l855" class="line" id="l855">    855</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-122&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-122&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                    &amp;lt;li&amp;gt;
    875 <a href="#l856" class="line" id="l856">    856</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-123&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-123&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                        &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;https://www.11ty.dev/&amp;quot; rel=&amp;quot;noopener noreferrer&amp;quot; target=&amp;quot;_blank&amp;quot;&amp;gt;Build with Eleventy&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt;
    876 <a href="#l857" class="line" id="l857">    857</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-124&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-124&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                    &amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
    877 <a href="#l858" class="line" id="l858">    858</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h5-0-125&quot; id=&quot;h5-0-125&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+

    997 <a href="#l978" class="line" id="l978">    978</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-86&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-86&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;article class=&amp;quot;constrained&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
    998 <a href="#l979" class="line" id="l979">    979</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-87&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-87&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;div class=&amp;quot;[ page-content ] [ flow wrapper ] [ flow-space-700 gap-top-700 ]&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
    999 <a href="#l980" class="line" id="l980">    980</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-88&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-88&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Placidis tamen. Amnem unda fores et nocent tellus. Ictu undis offensi nostra nempe dextra quod, illa causa expositum, dat. Cura rapta dum praepositam inhaesit, laeto sceleratus vicina utque. Annos nunc sumitur ignes ac nequit minanti.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   1000 <a href="#l981" class="line" id="l981">    981</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-89&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-89&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;h2&amp;gt;Latus formam supplex dea ante cupies sanguisque&amp;lt;/h2&amp;gt;
   1001 <a href="#l982" class="line" id="l982">    982</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-90&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-90&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Et mors praebebat et acciperet flammas meque gravida quam quid. Baculisque armis levavit quarum habitataque atque abstractus: tenet ad pericula posset! Semesaque cura super concursibus enim communis caede &amp;lt;strong&amp;gt;iam illa eduxit&amp;lt;/strong&amp;gt;, commissa acies, alto sit &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;#te-aestuat&amp;quot;&amp;gt;soror&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt; aut?&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   1002 <a href="#l983" class="line" id="l983">    983</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-91&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-91&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;blockquote&amp;gt;
   1003 <a href="#l984" class="line" id="l984">    984</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-92&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-92&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Sigei pontus quondam, sed, anus duos nec: tamen? Marito fiuntque Baccho causam. Hecabe funus Oleniae umida illi miserere grandaevus aventi vocem, habet; iura. Ambae Phrygiisque magnis &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;#hunc&amp;quot;&amp;gt;spectemur&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt; Erigoneque vates. Colla trahebat tamen nec datis mihi colorum &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;#et-fata-locis&amp;quot;&amp;gt;vidit&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt;.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   1004 <a href="#l985" class="line" id="l985">    985</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-93&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-93&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;/blockquote&amp;gt;
   1005 <a href="#l986" class="line" id="l986">    986</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-94&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-94&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;h2&amp;gt;Fuit Cypro&amp;lt;/h2&amp;gt;
   1006 <a href="#l987" class="line" id="l987">    987</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-95&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-95&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Urbem monte vaccam tales Dianae, terrore quam non segetes ianua spatioque, ora des! Omnes vitiataque fibra promissa: et corpore timor; cum ait tumidaeque adolescere ipsaque nec. Facilem non ne forte Pergama corporis morbi removete amnes, movere loca &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;#primaque&amp;quot;&amp;gt;lumina Rutuli&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt;, opus est poenamque. Campos dicere, replet placidi citharaque titulum in oritur ex omnibus &amp;lt;strong&amp;gt;patitur&amp;lt;/strong&amp;gt;! Dixit Taygetenque album Deoia Troiae et utinam ergo animam tacita flores &amp;lt;em&amp;gt;visa&amp;lt;/em&amp;gt;.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   1007 <a href="#l988" class="line" id="l988">    988</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-96&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-96&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;ul&amp;gt;
   1008 <a href="#l989" class="line" id="l989">    989</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-97&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-97&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Sed pro dicturus matres&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1009 <a href="#l990" class="line" id="l990">    990</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-98&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-98&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Tremendos annos cunctosque mugiat videns&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1010 <a href="#l991" class="line" id="l991">    991</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-99&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-99&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Ait in recipit nutricis in rapimur velox&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1011 <a href="#l992" class="line" id="l992">    992</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-100&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-100&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Prosiliunt propior quamvis altera tumulo sensit&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1012 <a href="#l993" class="line" id="l993">    993</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-101&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-101&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Florem leve inclusas cernere eandem nobis&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1013 <a href="#l994" class="line" id="l994">    994</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-102&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-102&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Orchamus protinus&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1014 <a href="#l995" class="line" id="l995">    995</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-103&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-103&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;/ul&amp;gt;
   1015 <a href="#l996" class="line" id="l996">    996</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-104&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-104&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Tum est prendique acerbo! Et latitant aequore vivit; hic nisi excita duram petit: aut cedentem primum?&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   1016 <a href="#l997" class="line" id="l997">    997</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-105&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-105&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;ol&amp;gt;
   1017 <a href="#l998" class="line" id="l998">    998</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-106&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-106&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Dentibus inque rigidum dici vigil&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1018 <a href="#l999" class="line" id="l999">    999</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-107&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-107&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Popularis solitas amicis certos maneant discedite Sisyphe&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1019 <a href="#l1000" class="line" id="l1000">   1000</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-108&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-108&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Nec verba&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1020 <a href="#l1001" class="line" id="l1001">   1001</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-109&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-109&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Mihi patriumque abnuat formas&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1021 <a href="#l1002" class="line" id="l1002">   1002</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-110&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-110&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Piscem blandaque in nervoque corpus qua longo&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1022 <a href="#l1003" class="line" id="l1003">   1003</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-111&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-111&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Quid hanc puerile imbres&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1023 <a href="#l1004" class="line" id="l1004">   1004</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-112&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-112&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;/ol&amp;gt;
   1024 <a href="#l1005" class="line" id="l1005">   1005</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-113&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-113&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;h2&amp;gt;Percussit clamor heu senes vixque cur&amp;lt;/h2&amp;gt;
   1025 <a href="#l1006" class="line" id="l1006">   1006</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-114&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-114&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Nihil Phoebeius, ferro ferrataque limenque est facies &amp;lt;em&amp;gt;et&amp;lt;/em&amp;gt; amet Troianaque. Repetenda umor iuvenes, &amp;lt;em&amp;gt;dum probat freta&amp;lt;/em&amp;gt; nec arvis mersura. Regia qua quam despectat.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   1026 <a href="#l1007" class="line" id="l1007">   1007</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-115&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-115&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;blockquote&amp;gt;
   1027 <a href="#l1008" class="line" id="l1008">   1008</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-116&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-116&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Suos est? Dat duras magis fuit: domus vobis. Petis pervenientia vidit axis sanae, ore corpora turba, nova mutat. Fervoribus lumen, nam concursibus non alta quatenus, &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;#natae-aeneadae-fingit&amp;quot;&amp;gt;in undis comae&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt; doceri aequore excute. Limosi genitor, doles invia: &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;#pependit-bracchia-quidem&amp;quot;&amp;gt;vidisse rauco&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt; vocari.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   1028 <a href="#l1009" class="line" id="l1009">   1009</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-117&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-117&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;/blockquote&amp;gt;
   1029 <a href="#l1010" class="line" id="l1010">   1010</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-118&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-118&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;h2&amp;gt;Ilicet sata edax artesque submersum amicitur ad&amp;lt;/h2&amp;gt;
   1030 <a href="#l1011" class="line" id="l1011">   1011</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-119&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-119&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Et &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;#misit-aures&amp;quot;&amp;gt;oculis&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt; vadit flavusque. Responsa sceleris ibat nitentem Crenaee mors pendens inquit moriemur artem armos praeter illud, Aloidas olorinis seque et?&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   1031 <a href="#l1012" class="line" id="l1012">   1012</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-120&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-120&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;blockquote&amp;gt;
   1032 <a href="#l1013" class="line" id="l1013">   1013</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-121&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-121&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Territa qui nostro, magis palus erat, hoc &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;#coniunx-et&amp;quot;&amp;gt;solem&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt;. Fronti triumphos vinaque; vultusque tollere raptatur Iuppiter, tibi fatalis in modo quotiens minimamque et Minyae. Dantem optabile &amp;lt;em&amp;gt;aurum&amp;lt;/em&amp;gt;; videt est ponit se vultu fervet superi, sub segnior placidique Tremorque. Fictilibus ignis; oris esse cum huius &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;#me-eratque&amp;quot;&amp;gt;ultoris&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt;, terrae Delphica.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   1033 <a href="#l1014" class="line" id="l1014">   1014</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-122&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-122&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;/blockquote&amp;gt;
   1034 <a href="#l1015" class="line" id="l1015">   1015</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-123&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-123&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Gravis si nona urbes aggere, tulit &amp;lt;strong&amp;gt;vivat tulit caeleste&amp;lt;/strong&amp;gt; in virgine vidit, diligis. Tibi quid. Illo sua, Palladis, iunctis. Lustrabere regnum Aeneia verba est quo accipis habet Hebe: cum.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   1035 <a href="#l1016" class="line" id="l1016">   1016</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-124&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-124&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   1036 <a href="#l1017" class="line" id="l1017">   1017</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-125&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-125&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;
   1037 <a href="#l1018" class="line" id="l1018">   1018</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-126&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-126&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;/article&amp;gt;
   1038 <a href="#l1019" class="line" id="l1019">   1019</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-127&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-127&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   1039 <a href="#l1020" class="line" id="l1020">   1020</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-128&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-128&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;/main&amp;gt;
   1040 <a href="#l1021" class="line" id="l1021">   1021</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-129&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-129&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;footer class=&amp;quot;site-footer&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   1041 <a href="#l1022" class="line" id="l1022">   1022</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-130&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-130&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;div class=&amp;quot;wrapper&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   1042 <a href="#l1023" class="line" id="l1023">   1023</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-131&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-131&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;nav class=&amp;quot;site-footer__navigation&amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;quot;Secondary&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   1043 <a href="#l1024" class="line" id="l1024">   1024</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-132&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-132&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;ul class=&amp;quot;site-footer__navigation__inner&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   1044 <a href="#l1025" class="line" id="l1025">   1025</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-133&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-133&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                
   1045 <a href="#l1026" class="line" id="l1026">   1026</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-134&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-134&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                    &amp;lt;li&amp;gt;
   1046 <a href="#l1027" class="line" id="l1027">   1027</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-135&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-135&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                        &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;https://www.11ty.dev/&amp;quot; rel=&amp;quot;noopener noreferrer&amp;quot; target=&amp;quot;_blank&amp;quot;&amp;gt;Build with Eleventy&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt;
   1047 <a href="#l1028" class="line" id="l1028">   1028</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-136&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-136&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                    &amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1048 <a href="#l1029" class="line" id="l1029">   1029</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-137&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-137&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                
   1049 <a href="#l1030" class="line" id="l1030">   1030</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-138&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-138&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                    &amp;lt;li&amp;gt;
   1050 <a href="#l1031" class="line" id="l1031">   1031</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-139&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-139&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                        &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;https://www.twitter.com/BitByte_&amp;quot; rel=&amp;quot;noopener noreferrer&amp;quot; target=&amp;quot;_blank&amp;quot;&amp;gt;Twitter&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt;
   1051 <a href="#l1032" class="line" id="l1032">   1032</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-140&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-140&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                    &amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1052 <a href="#l1033" class="line" id="l1033">   1033</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-141&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-141&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                
   1053 <a href="#l1034" class="line" id="l1034">   1034</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-142&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-142&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                    &amp;lt;li&amp;gt;
   1054 <a href="#l1035" class="line" id="l1035">   1035</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-143&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-143&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                        &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;https://codepen.io/hectoraldairah&amp;quot; rel=&amp;quot;noopener noreferrer&amp;quot; target=&amp;quot;_blank&amp;quot;&amp;gt;Codepen&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt;
   1055 <a href="#l1036" class="line" id="l1036">   1036</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-144&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-144&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                    &amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1056 <a href="#l1037" class="line" id="l1037">   1037</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-145&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-145&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                
   1057 <a href="#l1038" class="line" id="l1038">   1038</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-146&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-146&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                    &amp;lt;li&amp;gt;
   1058 <a href="#l1039" class="line" id="l1039">   1039</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-147&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-147&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                        &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;https://github.com/hectoraldairah&amp;quot; rel=&amp;quot;noopener noreferrer&amp;quot; target=&amp;quot;_blank&amp;quot;&amp;gt;Github&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt;
   1059 <a href="#l1040" class="line" id="l1040">   1040</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-148&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-148&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                    &amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1060 <a href="#l1041" class="line" id="l1041">   1041</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-149&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-149&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                
   1061 <a href="#l1042" class="line" id="l1042">   1042</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-150&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-150&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                    &amp;lt;li&amp;gt;
   1062 <a href="#l1043" class="line" id="l1043">   1043</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-151&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-151&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                        &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;https://www.linkedin.com/in/hectoraldairaguilar&amp;quot; rel=&amp;quot;noopener noreferrer&amp;quot; target=&amp;quot;_blank&amp;quot;&amp;gt;LinkedIn&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt;
   1063 <a href="#l1044" class="line" id="l1044">   1044</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-152&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-152&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                    &amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1064 <a href="#l1045" class="line" id="l1045">   1045</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-153&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-153&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                
   1065 <a href="#l1046" class="line" id="l1046">   1046</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-154&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-154&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;/ul&amp;gt;
   1066 <a href="#l1047" class="line" id="l1047">   1047</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-155&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-155&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;ul class=&amp;quot;site-footer__navigation__outer&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   1067 <a href="#l1048" class="line" id="l1048">   1048</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-156&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-156&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                &amp;lt;li&amp;gt;
   1068 <a href="#l1049" class="line" id="l1049">   1049</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h6-0-157&quot; id=&quot;h6-0-157&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                    &amp;lt;a&amp;gt;RSS&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt;

   1105 <a href="#l1086" class="line" id="l1086">   1086</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-23&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-23&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        
   1106 <a href="#l1087" class="line" id="l1087">   1087</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-24&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-24&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        
   1107 <a href="#l1088" class="line" id="l1088">   1088</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-25&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-25&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   1108 <a href="#l1089" class="line" id="l1089">   1089</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-26&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-26&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;/head&amp;gt;
   1109 <a href="#l1090" class="line" id="l1090">   1090</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-27&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-27&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;body&amp;gt;
   1110 <a href="#l1091" class="line" id="l1091">   1091</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-28&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-28&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;header role=&amp;quot;banner&amp;quot; class=&amp;quot;site-head&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   1111 <a href="#l1092" class="line" id="l1092">   1092</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-29&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-29&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;div class=&amp;quot;wrapper&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   1112 <a href="#l1093" class="line" id="l1093">   1093</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-30&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-30&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;div class=&amp;quot;site-head__inner&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   1113 <a href="#l1094" class="line" id="l1094">   1094</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-31&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-31&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;/&amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;quot;bitbyte - home&amp;quot; class=&amp;quot;site-head__brand&amp;quot;&amp;gt;

   1140 <a href="#l1121" class="line" id="l1121">   1121</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-58&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-58&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;h1&amp;gt;A Font for people with dyslexia&amp;lt;/h1&amp;gt;
   1141 <a href="#l1122" class="line" id="l1122">   1122</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-59&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-59&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        
   1142 <a href="#l1123" class="line" id="l1123">   1123</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-60&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-60&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;div class=&amp;quot;[ page-header__summary ] [ measure-long ]&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   1143 <a href="#l1124" class="line" id="l1124">   1124</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-61&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-61&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                
   1144 <a href="#l1125" class="line" id="l1125">   1125</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-62&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-62&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;time datetime=&amp;quot;Apr 8, 2020&amp;quot;&amp;gt;Apr 8, 2020&amp;lt;/time&amp;gt;
   1145 <a href="#l1126" class="line" id="l1126">   1126</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-63&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-63&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   1146 <a href="#l1127" class="line" id="l1127">   1127</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-64&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-64&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;p class=&amp;quot;visually-hidden&amp;quot; id=&amp;quot;tags-desc&amp;quot;&amp;gt;Tags that this post has been filed under.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   1147 <a href="#l1128" class="line" id="l1128">   1128</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-65&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-65&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;ul class=&amp;quot;tags-list&amp;quot; aria-describedby=&amp;quot;tags-desc&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   1148 <a href="#l1129" class="line" id="l1129">   1129</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-66&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-66&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        
   1149 <a href="#l1130" class="line" id="l1130">   1130</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-67&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-67&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;li&amp;gt;
   1150 <a href="#l1131" class="line" id="l1131">   1131</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-68&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-68&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;/tag/typography/&amp;quot;&amp;gt;#Typography&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt;

   1152 <a href="#l1133" class="line" id="l1133">   1133</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-70&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-70&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        
   1153 <a href="#l1134" class="line" id="l1134">   1134</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-71&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-71&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;li&amp;gt;
   1154 <a href="#l1135" class="line" id="l1135">   1135</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-72&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-72&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;/tag/resources/&amp;quot;&amp;gt;#Resources&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt;
   1155 <a href="#l1136" class="line" id="l1136">   1136</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-73&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-73&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1156 <a href="#l1137" class="line" id="l1137">   1137</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-74&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-74&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        
   1157 <a href="#l1138" class="line" id="l1138">   1138</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-75&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-75&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;li&amp;gt;
   1158 <a href="#l1139" class="line" id="l1139">   1139</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-76&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-76&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;/tag/featured/&amp;quot;&amp;gt;#Featured&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt;
   1159 <a href="#l1140" class="line" id="l1140">   1140</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-77&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-77&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1160 <a href="#l1141" class="line" id="l1141">   1141</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-78&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-78&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        
   1161 <a href="#l1142" class="line" id="l1142">   1142</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-79&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-79&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;/ul&amp;gt;
   1162 <a href="#l1143" class="line" id="l1143">   1143</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-80&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-80&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   1163 <a href="#l1144" class="line" id="l1144">   1144</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-81&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-81&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   1164 <a href="#l1145" class="line" id="l1145">   1145</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-82&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-82&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;
   1165 <a href="#l1146" class="line" id="l1146">   1146</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-83&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-83&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        
   1166 <a href="#l1147" class="line" id="l1147">   1147</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-84&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-84&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;
   1167 <a href="#l1148" class="line" id="l1148">   1148</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-85&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-85&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;
   1168 <a href="#l1149" class="line" id="l1149">   1149</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-86&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-86&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;article class=&amp;quot;constrained&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   1169 <a href="#l1150" class="line" id="l1150">   1150</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-87&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-87&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;div class=&amp;quot;[ page-content ] [ flow wrapper ] [ flow-space-700 gap-top-700 ]&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   1170 <a href="#l1151" class="line" id="l1151">   1151</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-88&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-88&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Lorem markdownum &amp;lt;strong&amp;gt;verbis&amp;lt;/strong&amp;gt;, fertur &amp;lt;em&amp;gt;fas&amp;lt;/em&amp;gt; poplite cervix proximus ventis et. Regia ac gestu pugnacem actis, cum &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;#murmurat-veros-tepescunt&amp;quot;&amp;gt;illis&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt;, et ungues ante mihi placet nomina relaxant circumstantes repagula non, speratque. Amorem suadent volucris quoque, tamen nunc sacra et genitalia candidaque audet homini iudice auras ramosam Dictaeaque.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   1171 <a href="#l1152" class="line" id="l1152">   1152</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-89&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-89&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;ol&amp;gt;
   1172 <a href="#l1153" class="line" id="l1153">   1153</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-90&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-90&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Addenda ventis non&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1173 <a href="#l1154" class="line" id="l1154">   1154</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-91&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-91&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Sol inpia ne arboreis&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1174 <a href="#l1155" class="line" id="l1155">   1155</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-92&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-92&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Iam grates voluit cumque&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1175 <a href="#l1156" class="line" id="l1156">   1156</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-93&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-93&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Vestigia et clipei adhaeret atque aristas collaque&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1176 <a href="#l1157" class="line" id="l1157">   1157</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-94&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-94&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Furialibus Aonius morati optari nullique Hersilie manus&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1177 <a href="#l1158" class="line" id="l1158">   1158</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-95&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-95&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;/ol&amp;gt;
   1178 <a href="#l1159" class="line" id="l1159">   1159</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-96&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-96&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;h2&amp;gt;Dispositam terribilis quae&amp;lt;/h2&amp;gt;
   1179 <a href="#l1160" class="line" id="l1160">   1160</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-97&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-97&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Cognoscite gerens causam circumstant &amp;lt;em&amp;gt;luctus cupioque&amp;lt;/em&amp;gt; morte, fera coniunx frustra Cnosiacaeque, cupidisque tempus Achaia. Pericla multis blanda! Et terribili, nec, &amp;lt;strong&amp;gt;trepidans&amp;lt;/strong&amp;gt; pro; toto nam urbesque.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   1180 <a href="#l1161" class="line" id="l1161">   1161</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-98&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-98&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Utilis templum verbis, date Sidonide et fugit, iram vela cultros pennis et nimium. Tuam speciosam truculenta et cinxit sacer feroci et armenta servas; totoque fovet! Diversa ite profugi bella fugit viasque, velint sinu sic Iliades aquas gutture &amp;lt;em&amp;gt;asper&amp;lt;/em&amp;gt; Neptunus.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   1181 <a href="#l1162" class="line" id="l1162">   1162</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-99&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-99&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;h2&amp;gt;Tu viginti non&amp;lt;/h2&amp;gt;
   1182 <a href="#l1163" class="line" id="l1163">   1163</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-100&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-100&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Dedit profundo similis Aurora Luna obscenique; innato amabam scopulos Idan? Ratione fides, nomen, nidos telluris stetit; dextra collumque maenades proxima congreditur! Inquit in dixere noverca manerem; dis omnia meri postquam nostris calidis fraudesque, &amp;lt;strong&amp;gt;imis&amp;lt;/strong&amp;gt;. &amp;lt;strong&amp;gt;Probavit coniunx quoque&amp;lt;/strong&amp;gt;, me mentior geniti fatorum vulnus.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   1183 <a href="#l1164" class="line" id="l1164">   1164</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-101&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-101&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;ul&amp;gt;
   1184 <a href="#l1165" class="line" id="l1165">   1165</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-102&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-102&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Est et haec bitumine documenta ora at&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1185 <a href="#l1166" class="line" id="l1166">   1166</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-103&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-103&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Possent herbas&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1186 <a href="#l1167" class="line" id="l1167">   1167</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-104&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-104&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Iacens caelo guttae&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1187 <a href="#l1168" class="line" id="l1168">   1168</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-105&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-105&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Unus regni&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1188 <a href="#l1169" class="line" id="l1169">   1169</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-106&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-106&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Ad aras pueroque nomen&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1189 <a href="#l1170" class="line" id="l1170">   1170</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-107&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-107&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;/ul&amp;gt;
   1190 <a href="#l1171" class="line" id="l1171">   1171</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-108&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-108&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;h2&amp;gt;Ut iugo quod&amp;lt;/h2&amp;gt;
   1191 <a href="#l1172" class="line" id="l1172">   1172</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-109&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-109&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;In Alce ergo vestem Dixit pede non ut &amp;lt;strong&amp;gt;sumit&amp;lt;/strong&amp;gt; exercent. Illi portus; pedes nomine &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;#duxerat-fudit&amp;quot;&amp;gt;praeferre rarescit cadit&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt; magni, indignantibus iram herbarum omnibus alter. Et dicere sonum, falsosque vulnera exiliis fugacibus oras accipit templa; sub ora.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   1192 <a href="#l1173" class="line" id="l1173">   1173</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-110&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-110&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;ol&amp;gt;
   1193 <a href="#l1174" class="line" id="l1174">   1174</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-111&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-111&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Quae equos versus iura leti germanae sibi&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1194 <a href="#l1175" class="line" id="l1175">   1175</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-112&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-112&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Vertice innubere velox et postquam fugae credulitate&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1195 <a href="#l1176" class="line" id="l1176">   1176</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-113&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-113&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Mihi scelerataque extendi nec istis nostris caput&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1196 <a href="#l1177" class="line" id="l1177">   1177</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-114&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-114&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;/ol&amp;gt;
   1197 <a href="#l1178" class="line" id="l1178">   1178</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-115&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-115&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Tellure liceat sive serpens, erat quamvis, mihi: vultus mihi &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;#relicta&amp;quot;&amp;gt;contra frater&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt;. Arce constitit Cimmerios quod, pedes, cetera, totoque dixit misit &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;#quae-verba&amp;quot;&amp;gt;adapertaque addidici dabat&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt;.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   1198 <a href="#l1179" class="line" id="l1179">   1179</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-116&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-116&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   1199 <a href="#l1180" class="line" id="l1180">   1180</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-117&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-117&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;
   1200 <a href="#l1181" class="line" id="l1181">   1181</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-118&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-118&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;/article&amp;gt;
   1201 <a href="#l1182" class="line" id="l1182">   1182</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-119&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-119&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   1202 <a href="#l1183" class="line" id="l1183">   1183</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-120&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-120&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;/main&amp;gt;
   1203 <a href="#l1184" class="line" id="l1184">   1184</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-121&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-121&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;footer class=&amp;quot;site-footer&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   1204 <a href="#l1185" class="line" id="l1185">   1185</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h7-0-122&quot; id=&quot;h7-0-122&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;div class=&amp;quot;wrapper&amp;quot;&amp;gt;

   1295 <a href="#l1276" class="line" id="l1276">   1276</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h8-0-50&quot; id=&quot;h8-0-50&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;/nav&amp;gt;
   1296 <a href="#l1277" class="line" id="l1277">   1277</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h8-0-51&quot; id=&quot;h8-0-51&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;
   1297 <a href="#l1278" class="line" id="l1278">   1278</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h8-0-52&quot; id=&quot;h8-0-52&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;
   1298 <a href="#l1279" class="line" id="l1279">   1279</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h8-0-53&quot; id=&quot;h8-0-53&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;/header&amp;gt;
   1299 <a href="#l1280" class="line" id="l1280">   1280</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h8-0-54&quot; id=&quot;h8-0-54&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;main tabindex=&amp;quot;-1&amp;quot; id=&amp;quot;main-content&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   1300 <a href="#l1281" class="line" id="l1281">   1281</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h8-0-55&quot; id=&quot;h8-0-55&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            
   1301 <a href="#l1282" class="line" id="l1282">   1282</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h8-0-56&quot; id=&quot;h8-0-56&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;div class=&amp;quot;[ page-header ]&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   1302 <a href="#l1283" class="line" id="l1283">   1283</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h8-0-57&quot; id=&quot;h8-0-57&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;div class=&amp;quot;[ wrapper ] [ flow ]&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   1303 <a href="#l1284" class="line" id="l1284">   1284</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h8-0-58&quot; id=&quot;h8-0-58&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;h1&amp;gt;Color Palette Generator&amp;lt;/h1&amp;gt;
   1304 <a href="#l1285" class="line" id="l1285">   1285</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h8-0-59&quot; id=&quot;h8-0-59&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        
   1305 <a href="#l1286" class="line" id="l1286">   1286</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h8-0-60&quot; id=&quot;h8-0-60&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;div class=&amp;quot;[ page-header__summary ] [ measure-long ]&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   1306 <a href="#l1287" class="line" id="l1287">   1287</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h8-0-61&quot; id=&quot;h8-0-61&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                
   1307 <a href="#l1288" class="line" id="l1288">   1288</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h8-0-62&quot; id=&quot;h8-0-62&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;time datetime=&amp;quot;Nov 15, 2019&amp;quot;&amp;gt;Nov 15, 2019&amp;lt;/time&amp;gt;
   1308 <a href="#l1289" class="line" id="l1289">   1289</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h8-0-63&quot; id=&quot;h8-0-63&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   1309 <a href="#l1290" class="line" id="l1290">   1290</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h8-0-64&quot; id=&quot;h8-0-64&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;p class=&amp;quot;visually-hidden&amp;quot; id=&amp;quot;tags-desc&amp;quot;&amp;gt;Tags that this post has been filed under.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   1310 <a href="#l1291" class="line" id="l1291">   1291</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h8-0-65&quot; id=&quot;h8-0-65&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;ul class=&amp;quot;tags-list&amp;quot; aria-describedby=&amp;quot;tags-desc&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   1311 <a href="#l1292" class="line" id="l1292">   1292</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h8-0-66&quot; id=&quot;h8-0-66&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        
   1312 <a href="#l1293" class="line" id="l1293">   1293</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h8-0-67&quot; id=&quot;h8-0-67&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;li&amp;gt;
   1313 <a href="#l1294" class="line" id="l1294">   1294</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h8-0-68&quot; id=&quot;h8-0-68&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;/tag/tools/&amp;quot;&amp;gt;#Tools&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt;

   1315 <a href="#l1296" class="line" id="l1296">   1296</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h8-0-70&quot; id=&quot;h8-0-70&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+

   1318 <a href="#l1299" class="line" id="l1299">   1299</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h8-0-73&quot; id=&quot;h8-0-73&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1319 <a href="#l1300" class="line" id="l1300">   1300</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h8-0-74&quot; id=&quot;h8-0-74&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        
   1320 <a href="#l1301" class="line" id="l1301">   1301</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h8-0-75&quot; id=&quot;h8-0-75&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;/ul&amp;gt;
   1321 <a href="#l1302" class="line" id="l1302">   1302</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h8-0-76&quot; id=&quot;h8-0-76&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   1322 <a href="#l1303" class="line" id="l1303">   1303</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h8-0-77&quot; id=&quot;h8-0-77&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   1323 <a href="#l1304" class="line" id="l1304">   1304</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h8-0-78&quot; id=&quot;h8-0-78&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;
   1324 <a href="#l1305" class="line" id="l1305">   1305</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h8-0-79&quot; id=&quot;h8-0-79&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        
   1325 <a href="#l1306" class="line" id="l1306">   1306</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h8-0-80&quot; id=&quot;h8-0-80&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;
   1326 <a href="#l1307" class="line" id="l1307">   1307</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h8-0-81&quot; id=&quot;h8-0-81&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;
   1327 <a href="#l1308" class="line" id="l1308">   1308</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h8-0-82&quot; id=&quot;h8-0-82&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;article class=&amp;quot;constrained&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   1328 <a href="#l1309" class="line" id="l1309">   1309</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h8-0-83&quot; id=&quot;h8-0-83&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;div class=&amp;quot;[ page-content ] [ flow wrapper ] [ flow-space-700 gap-top-700 ]&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   1329 <a href="#l1310" class="line" id="l1310">   1310</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h8-0-84&quot; id=&quot;h8-0-84&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Lorem markdownum ait. Plaustrum gaudet: similis pulsarunt inmortalis multa cui et huic altera nil; non ingenio tormenta visa.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   1330 <a href="#l1311" class="line" id="l1311">   1311</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h8-0-85&quot; id=&quot;h8-0-85&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;blockquote&amp;gt;
   1331 <a href="#l1312" class="line" id="l1312">   1312</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h8-0-86&quot; id=&quot;h8-0-86&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Matre quid vescitur Paris hunc rependatur cursus vitasset tenebrae nec! Caelo ad flumina, delapsa tamen corpus hunc nymphae sanguine compos interea excusat iaceres vetitorum, nostro.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   1332 <a href="#l1313" class="line" id="l1313">   1313</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h8-0-87&quot; id=&quot;h8-0-87&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;/blockquote&amp;gt;
   1333 <a href="#l1314" class="line" id="l1314">   1314</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h8-0-88&quot; id=&quot;h8-0-88&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;h2&amp;gt;Cthonius reque missa robore humus perque&amp;lt;/h2&amp;gt;
   1334 <a href="#l1315" class="line" id="l1315">   1315</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h8-0-89&quot; id=&quot;h8-0-89&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Nodum praemia nam postes tellus. Iuvenis exstinctum in venire consilium est, pars non eunti &amp;lt;em&amp;gt;texerat&amp;lt;/em&amp;gt; dapibus, satis suarum non mihi licuit carmine. Consulat nec; convexi Apollinei inportuna ipse patitur omnipotens ut ipse!&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   1335 <a href="#l1316" class="line" id="l1316">   1316</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h8-0-90&quot; id=&quot;h8-0-90&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;ul&amp;gt;
   1336 <a href="#l1317" class="line" id="l1317">   1317</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h8-0-91&quot; id=&quot;h8-0-91&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Veste caelestibus Tyrrhenaque sed&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1337 <a href="#l1318" class="line" id="l1318">   1318</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h8-0-92&quot; id=&quot;h8-0-92&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Per sacrorum mendacem ut aureus Bromumque haeret&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1338 <a href="#l1319" class="line" id="l1319">   1319</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h8-0-93&quot; id=&quot;h8-0-93&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Et longe tamen pariterque et toto dabas&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1339 <a href="#l1320" class="line" id="l1320">   1320</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h8-0-94&quot; id=&quot;h8-0-94&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Ore sui cum in iter nocturnos gestamina&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1340 <a href="#l1321" class="line" id="l1321">   1321</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h8-0-95&quot; id=&quot;h8-0-95&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Annis frementes flammis&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1341 <a href="#l1322" class="line" id="l1322">   1322</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h8-0-96&quot; id=&quot;h8-0-96&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;/ul&amp;gt;
   1342 <a href="#l1323" class="line" id="l1323">   1323</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h8-0-97&quot; id=&quot;h8-0-97&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;h2&amp;gt;Inpositum inque de sagittas furoris umet&amp;lt;/h2&amp;gt;
   1343 <a href="#l1324" class="line" id="l1324">   1324</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h8-0-98&quot; id=&quot;h8-0-98&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Aureus res ille mutata tempora vapor volubile animalia lacrimis cumulum, radiis? Manus figit prius, patrem?&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   1344 <a href="#l1325" class="line" id="l1325">   1325</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h8-0-99&quot; id=&quot;h8-0-99&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;ul&amp;gt;
   1345 <a href="#l1326" class="line" id="l1326">   1326</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h8-0-100&quot; id=&quot;h8-0-100&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Omni equinis Neptunia habebat&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1346 <a href="#l1327" class="line" id="l1327">   1327</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h8-0-101&quot; id=&quot;h8-0-101&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Misso hunc notior pars fictus hic opus&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1347 <a href="#l1328" class="line" id="l1328">   1328</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h8-0-102&quot; id=&quot;h8-0-102&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Quod tuum lenta&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1348 <a href="#l1329" class="line" id="l1329">   1329</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h8-0-103&quot; id=&quot;h8-0-103&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Manumque illa novit tumulo notam&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1349 <a href="#l1330" class="line" id="l1330">   1330</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h8-0-104&quot; id=&quot;h8-0-104&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Quid traxere&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1350 <a href="#l1331" class="line" id="l1331">   1331</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h8-0-105&quot; id=&quot;h8-0-105&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Ut tibi prudens temporis liliaque inmanis meas&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1351 <a href="#l1332" class="line" id="l1332">   1332</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h8-0-106&quot; id=&quot;h8-0-106&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;/ul&amp;gt;
   1352 <a href="#l1333" class="line" id="l1333">   1333</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h8-0-107&quot; id=&quot;h8-0-107&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Pectus dum mendaci duce &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;#et-vulnerat&amp;quot;&amp;gt;fama&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt; idem praedae coniunx &amp;lt;strong&amp;gt;obstitit&amp;lt;/strong&amp;gt;, est. Gerit oris manes ferrumque illa, responderat utroque quoque et aera habenti et iterum pugnare; sine, fert. Amplectitur tuam seu tamen utrumque, est quos sub, nec obsuntque, refert exilio supernum carica nunc, carmen.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   1353 <a href="#l1334" class="line" id="l1334">   1334</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h8-0-108&quot; id=&quot;h8-0-108&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   1354 <a href="#l1335" class="line" id="l1335">   1335</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h8-0-109&quot; id=&quot;h8-0-109&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;
   1355 <a href="#l1336" class="line" id="l1336">   1336</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h8-0-110&quot; id=&quot;h8-0-110&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;/article&amp;gt;
   1356 <a href="#l1337" class="line" id="l1337">   1337</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h8-0-111&quot; id=&quot;h8-0-111&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   1357 <a href="#l1338" class="line" id="l1338">   1338</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h8-0-112&quot; id=&quot;h8-0-112&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;/main&amp;gt;

   1370 <a href="#l1351" class="line" id="l1351">   1351</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h8-0-125&quot; id=&quot;h8-0-125&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+

   1410 <a href="#l1391" class="line" id="l1391">   1391</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h9-0-10&quot; id=&quot;h9-0-10&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;/style&amp;gt;
   1411 <a href="#l1392" class="line" id="l1392">   1392</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h9-0-11&quot; id=&quot;h9-0-11&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+

   1416 <a href="#l1397" class="line" id="l1397">   1397</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h9-0-16&quot; id=&quot;h9-0-16&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                    .post-list__item{padding-bottom:4rem}.post-list__item__info{display:flex;align-items:center;flex-wrap:wrap;font-size:1rem;color:rgba(243,243,243,.68);gap:1.25rem}.post-list__item__info a{text-decoration-color:#e9a6a6;padding:.2rem .4rem;background-color:#3f3351;border-radius:10%}.post-list__item__date{padding-bottom:.8rem 0}.post-list__item__excerpt{padding:1.25rem 0}.post-list__link{font-size:2rem;color:#e9a6a6;text-decoration:none;font-family:Lora,serif;font-weight:700}.post-list__link:hover{color:#916bbf}time[datetime]{display:block;color:#e9a6a6;font-size:2rem;font-style:italic}

   1463 <a href="#l1444" class="line" id="l1444">   1444</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h9-0-63&quot; id=&quot;h9-0-63&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+

   1466 <a href="#l1447" class="line" id="l1447">   1447</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h9-0-66&quot; id=&quot;h9-0-66&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
