   1468 <a href="#l1449" class="line" id="l1449">   1449</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h9-0-68&quot; id=&quot;h9-0-68&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;/tag/design-thinking/&amp;quot;&amp;gt;#DesignThinking&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt;
   1469 <a href="#l1450" class="line" id="l1450">   1450</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h9-0-69&quot; id=&quot;h9-0-69&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1470 <a href="#l1451" class="line" id="l1451">   1451</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h9-0-70&quot; id=&quot;h9-0-70&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        
   1471 <a href="#l1452" class="line" id="l1452">   1452</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h9-0-71&quot; id=&quot;h9-0-71&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;/ul&amp;gt;
   1472 <a href="#l1453" class="line" id="l1453">   1453</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h9-0-72&quot; id=&quot;h9-0-72&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   1473 <a href="#l1454" class="line" id="l1454">   1454</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h9-0-73&quot; id=&quot;h9-0-73&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   1474 <a href="#l1455" class="line" id="l1455">   1455</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h9-0-74&quot; id=&quot;h9-0-74&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;
   1475 <a href="#l1456" class="line" id="l1456">   1456</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h9-0-75&quot; id=&quot;h9-0-75&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        
   1476 <a href="#l1457" class="line" id="l1457">   1457</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h9-0-76&quot; id=&quot;h9-0-76&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;
   1477 <a href="#l1458" class="line" id="l1458">   1458</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h9-0-77&quot; id=&quot;h9-0-77&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;
   1478 <a href="#l1459" class="line" id="l1459">   1459</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h9-0-78&quot; id=&quot;h9-0-78&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;article class=&amp;quot;constrained&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   1479 <a href="#l1460" class="line" id="l1460">   1460</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h9-0-79&quot; id=&quot;h9-0-79&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;div class=&amp;quot;[ page-content ] [ flow wrapper ] [ flow-space-700 gap-top-700 ]&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   1480 <a href="#l1461" class="line" id="l1461">   1461</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h9-0-80&quot; id=&quot;h9-0-80&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Lorem markdownum purpura dolorem! Paterque gentis nam &amp;lt;strong&amp;gt;consilii&amp;lt;/strong&amp;gt; temptanti comitum epulae hic iuvene inducta cava talia solebat iussit.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   1481 <a href="#l1462" class="line" id="l1462">   1462</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h9-0-81&quot; id=&quot;h9-0-81&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;blockquote&amp;gt;
   1482 <a href="#l1463" class="line" id="l1463">   1463</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h9-0-82&quot; id=&quot;h9-0-82&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Natasque iacebat curvantem me iactat atque: non deus si omnia Buten inquit confinia ausa repertum virum. In iniusta libertas inposuitque probant, &amp;lt;em&amp;gt;ut iubasque&amp;lt;/em&amp;gt; dignus aethera vale mitem tecumque insidias concita, quis modo egentes. Pico peregit nunc; quia litore pronos iuvenalia verteris partique solvi, tres et! Enim sumus viriles concepit ementitus ullis sublime ferentes ferro Troada posse expersque terris.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   1483 <a href="#l1464" class="line" id="l1464">   1464</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h9-0-83&quot; id=&quot;h9-0-83&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;/blockquote&amp;gt;
   1484 <a href="#l1465" class="line" id="l1465">   1465</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h9-0-84&quot; id=&quot;h9-0-84&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;h2&amp;gt;Non est fieri vani dentemque Thracum&amp;lt;/h2&amp;gt;
   1485 <a href="#l1466" class="line" id="l1466">   1466</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h9-0-85&quot; id=&quot;h9-0-85&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Teneraque Peneidas nisi Isthmo, curru erat Argos dryades, ait fila. Et absumptis omnemque. Cum altum iubebat Acrota fuerat nec telisque hactenus. Ire sinus oblatae pennas, et vidit se &amp;lt;em&amp;gt;est numen&amp;lt;/em&amp;gt;! Fictilibus comparat cutis.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   1486 <a href="#l1467" class="line" id="l1467">   1467</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h9-0-86&quot; id=&quot;h9-0-86&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Est me imagine &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;#est-nurus-nitidaeque&amp;quot;&amp;gt;intrare dimittere&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt;, cremet, totosque utero. Vestros pudorem.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   1487 <a href="#l1468" class="line" id="l1468">   1468</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h9-0-87&quot; id=&quot;h9-0-87&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;h2&amp;gt;Extis iactanti indicat profuit&amp;lt;/h2&amp;gt;
   1488 <a href="#l1469" class="line" id="l1469">   1469</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h9-0-88&quot; id=&quot;h9-0-88&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Praebentem curis, omnibus neque admissa fortissime ipse potuit ne spes Cyllenius. Suscipitur ita dictu serva Cancri, illac sanguine fabula matrem Onetor, pro maestis voces mandata dumque &amp;lt;strong&amp;gt;Camenae&amp;lt;/strong&amp;gt;. Roratis fluidos ubi sit stupuit rupit tura nec &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;#ales-est-easdem&amp;quot;&amp;gt;me&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt; regia: &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;#miserande-palmas-positoris&amp;quot;&amp;gt;ubi&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt; tum &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;#medea&amp;quot;&amp;gt;cepit&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt; contra modumque refert caeruleusque minax.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   1489 <a href="#l1470" class="line" id="l1470">   1470</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h9-0-89&quot; id=&quot;h9-0-89&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;blockquote&amp;gt;
   1490 <a href="#l1471" class="line" id="l1471">   1471</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h9-0-90&quot; id=&quot;h9-0-90&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Eburno Phoebi nec mille fluctus tinguitur &amp;lt;em&amp;gt;quaque&amp;lt;/em&amp;gt; terris intra &amp;lt;strong&amp;gt;et sceleri vocamus&amp;lt;/strong&amp;gt; gravis ante, est! Aloidas quis vincite pectora puer, ducens. Sine urbes: quem vati subducere artis quisquis, legit nuper, erat quos. Quae vultus hic triplex, lumina et bina &amp;lt;em&amp;gt;femina pectore&amp;lt;/em&amp;gt;, suco ducit ventis parentem Abanteis. Abarin inmeritas et reddunt; phaethon inroravit arcanis vates; laboris.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   1491 <a href="#l1472" class="line" id="l1472">   1472</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h9-0-91&quot; id=&quot;h9-0-91&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;/blockquote&amp;gt;
   1492 <a href="#l1473" class="line" id="l1473">   1473</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h9-0-92&quot; id=&quot;h9-0-92&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;h2&amp;gt;Cladis abeunt bimari per ad hanc&amp;lt;/h2&amp;gt;
   1493 <a href="#l1474" class="line" id="l1474">   1474</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h9-0-93&quot; id=&quot;h9-0-93&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Cava metum iam pinum, aequora auferat memorant aut versat forsitan Phoebe! Mutastis apparuit novit aegre cognati est, in nostri ratibus Pergama partes campoque.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   1494 <a href="#l1475" class="line" id="l1475">   1475</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h9-0-94&quot; id=&quot;h9-0-94&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;ol&amp;gt;
   1495 <a href="#l1476" class="line" id="l1476">   1476</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h9-0-95&quot; id=&quot;h9-0-95&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Saepe scire cauda&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1496 <a href="#l1477" class="line" id="l1477">   1477</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h9-0-96&quot; id=&quot;h9-0-96&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Pergus nunc inde iamque secura seriemque viso&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1497 <a href="#l1478" class="line" id="l1478">   1478</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h9-0-97&quot; id=&quot;h9-0-97&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Ibat Tempe locum ostia lacrimarum fraudem illa&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1498 <a href="#l1479" class="line" id="l1479">   1479</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h9-0-98&quot; id=&quot;h9-0-98&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Acutis carpitur et restat volvitur radiis deus&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1499 <a href="#l1480" class="line" id="l1480">   1480</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h9-0-99&quot; id=&quot;h9-0-99&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Aloidas tenues&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1500 <a href="#l1481" class="line" id="l1481">   1481</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h9-0-100&quot; id=&quot;h9-0-100&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Etiamnum in amans vinctus quo ratis profecti&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1501 <a href="#l1482" class="line" id="l1482">   1482</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h9-0-101&quot; id=&quot;h9-0-101&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;/ol&amp;gt;
   1502 <a href="#l1483" class="line" id="l1483">   1483</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h9-0-102&quot; id=&quot;h9-0-102&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   1503 <a href="#l1484" class="line" id="l1484">   1484</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h9-0-103&quot; id=&quot;h9-0-103&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;
   1504 <a href="#l1485" class="line" id="l1485">   1485</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h9-0-104&quot; id=&quot;h9-0-104&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;/article&amp;gt;
   1505 <a href="#l1486" class="line" id="l1486">   1486</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h9-0-105&quot; id=&quot;h9-0-105&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   1506 <a href="#l1487" class="line" id="l1487">   1487</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h9-0-106&quot; id=&quot;h9-0-106&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;/main&amp;gt;
   1507 <a href="#l1488" class="line" id="l1488">   1488</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h9-0-107&quot; id=&quot;h9-0-107&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;footer class=&amp;quot;site-footer&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   1508 <a href="#l1489" class="line" id="l1489">   1489</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h9-0-108&quot; id=&quot;h9-0-108&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;div class=&amp;quot;wrapper&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   1509 <a href="#l1490" class="line" id="l1490">   1490</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h9-0-109&quot; id=&quot;h9-0-109&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;nav class=&amp;quot;site-footer__navigation&amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;quot;Secondary&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   1510 <a href="#l1491" class="line" id="l1491">   1491</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h9-0-110&quot; id=&quot;h9-0-110&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;ul class=&amp;quot;site-footer__navigation__inner&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   1511 <a href="#l1492" class="line" id="l1492">   1492</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h9-0-111&quot; id=&quot;h9-0-111&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                
   1512 <a href="#l1493" class="line" id="l1493">   1493</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h9-0-112&quot; id=&quot;h9-0-112&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                    &amp;lt;li&amp;gt;
   1513 <a href="#l1494" class="line" id="l1494">   1494</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h9-0-113&quot; id=&quot;h9-0-113&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                        &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;https://www.11ty.dev/&amp;quot; rel=&amp;quot;noopener noreferrer&amp;quot; target=&amp;quot;_blank&amp;quot;&amp;gt;Build with Eleventy&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt;
   1514 <a href="#l1495" class="line" id="l1495">   1495</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h9-0-114&quot; id=&quot;h9-0-114&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                    &amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1515 <a href="#l1496" class="line" id="l1496">   1496</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h9-0-115&quot; id=&quot;h9-0-115&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                
   1516 <a href="#l1497" class="line" id="l1497">   1497</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h9-0-116&quot; id=&quot;h9-0-116&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                    &amp;lt;li&amp;gt;
   1517 <a href="#l1498" class="line" id="l1498">   1498</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h9-0-117&quot; id=&quot;h9-0-117&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                        &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;https://www.twitter.com/BitByte_&amp;quot; rel=&amp;quot;noopener noreferrer&amp;quot; target=&amp;quot;_blank&amp;quot;&amp;gt;Twitter&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt;
   1518 <a href="#l1499" class="line" id="l1499">   1499</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h9-0-118&quot; id=&quot;h9-0-118&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                    &amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1519 <a href="#l1500" class="line" id="l1500">   1500</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h9-0-119&quot; id=&quot;h9-0-119&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                
   1520 <a href="#l1501" class="line" id="l1501">   1501</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h9-0-120&quot; id=&quot;h9-0-120&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                    &amp;lt;li&amp;gt;
   1521 <a href="#l1502" class="line" id="l1502">   1502</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h9-0-121&quot; id=&quot;h9-0-121&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                        &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;https://codepen.io/hectoraldairah&amp;quot; rel=&amp;quot;noopener noreferrer&amp;quot; target=&amp;quot;_blank&amp;quot;&amp;gt;Codepen&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt;
   1522 <a href="#l1503" class="line" id="l1503">   1503</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h9-0-122&quot; id=&quot;h9-0-122&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                    &amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1523 <a href="#l1504" class="line" id="l1504">   1504</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h9-0-123&quot; id=&quot;h9-0-123&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                
   1524 <a href="#l1505" class="line" id="l1505">   1505</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h9-0-124&quot; id=&quot;h9-0-124&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                    &amp;lt;li&amp;gt;

   1527 <a href="#l1508" class="line" id="l1508">   1508</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h9-0-127&quot; id=&quot;h9-0-127&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                
   1528 <a href="#l1509" class="line" id="l1509">   1509</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h9-0-128&quot; id=&quot;h9-0-128&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                    &amp;lt;li&amp;gt;
   1529 <a href="#l1510" class="line" id="l1510">   1510</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h9-0-129&quot; id=&quot;h9-0-129&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                        &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;https://www.linkedin.com/in/hectoraldairaguilar&amp;quot; rel=&amp;quot;noopener noreferrer&amp;quot; target=&amp;quot;_blank&amp;quot;&amp;gt;LinkedIn&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt;

   1531 <a href="#l1512" class="line" id="l1512">   1512</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h9-0-131&quot; id=&quot;h9-0-131&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+

   1533 <a href="#l1514" class="line" id="l1514">   1514</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h9-0-133&quot; id=&quot;h9-0-133&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;ul class=&amp;quot;site-footer__navigation__outer&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   1534 <a href="#l1515" class="line" id="l1515">   1515</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h9-0-134&quot; id=&quot;h9-0-134&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                &amp;lt;li&amp;gt;

   1547 <a href="#l1528" class="line" id="l1528">   1528</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;b&gt;diff --git a/&lt;a id=&quot;h10&quot; href=&quot;../file/dist/posts/how-to-create-a-remote-usability-test-for-fast-actionable-insights/index.html.html&quot;&gt;dist/posts/how-to-create-a-remote-usability-test-for-fast-actionable-insights/index.html&lt;/a&gt; b/&lt;a href=&quot;../file/dist/posts/how-to-create-a-remote-usability-test-for-fast-actionable-insights/index.html.html&quot;&gt;dist/posts/how-to-create-a-remote-usability-test-for-fast-actionable-insights/index.html&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/b&gt;

   1553 <a href="#l1534" class="line" id="l1534">   1534</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-4&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-4&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;meta charset=&amp;quot;UTF-8&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   1554 <a href="#l1535" class="line" id="l1535">   1535</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-5&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-5&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;meta http-equiv=&amp;quot;X-UA-Compatible&amp;quot; content=&amp;quot;IE=edge&amp;quot;&amp;gt;

   1557 <a href="#l1538" class="line" id="l1538">   1538</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-8&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-8&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;style&amp;gt;

   1599 <a href="#l1580" class="line" id="l1580">   1580</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-50&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-50&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;/nav&amp;gt;
   1600 <a href="#l1581" class="line" id="l1581">   1581</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-51&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-51&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;
   1601 <a href="#l1582" class="line" id="l1582">   1582</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-52&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-52&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;
   1602 <a href="#l1583" class="line" id="l1583">   1583</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-53&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-53&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;/header&amp;gt;
   1603 <a href="#l1584" class="line" id="l1584">   1584</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-54&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-54&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;main tabindex=&amp;quot;-1&amp;quot; id=&amp;quot;main-content&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   1604 <a href="#l1585" class="line" id="l1585">   1585</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-55&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-55&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            
   1605 <a href="#l1586" class="line" id="l1586">   1586</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-56&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-56&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;div class=&amp;quot;[ page-header ]&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   1606 <a href="#l1587" class="line" id="l1587">   1587</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-57&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-57&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;div class=&amp;quot;[ wrapper ] [ flow ]&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   1607 <a href="#l1588" class="line" id="l1588">   1588</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-58&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-58&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;h1&amp;gt;How to create a remote usability test for fast, actionable insights&amp;lt;/h1&amp;gt;
   1608 <a href="#l1589" class="line" id="l1589">   1589</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-59&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-59&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        
   1609 <a href="#l1590" class="line" id="l1590">   1590</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-60&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-60&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;div class=&amp;quot;[ page-header__summary ] [ measure-long ]&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   1610 <a href="#l1591" class="line" id="l1591">   1591</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-61&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-61&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                
   1611 <a href="#l1592" class="line" id="l1592">   1592</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-62&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-62&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;time datetime=&amp;quot;Feb 2, 2020&amp;quot;&amp;gt;Feb 2, 2020&amp;lt;/time&amp;gt;
   1612 <a href="#l1593" class="line" id="l1593">   1593</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-63&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-63&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   1613 <a href="#l1594" class="line" id="l1594">   1594</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-64&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-64&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;p class=&amp;quot;visually-hidden&amp;quot; id=&amp;quot;tags-desc&amp;quot;&amp;gt;Tags that this post has been filed under.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   1614 <a href="#l1595" class="line" id="l1595">   1595</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-65&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-65&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;ul class=&amp;quot;tags-list&amp;quot; aria-describedby=&amp;quot;tags-desc&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   1615 <a href="#l1596" class="line" id="l1596">   1596</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-66&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-66&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        
   1616 <a href="#l1597" class="line" id="l1597">   1597</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-67&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-67&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;li&amp;gt;
   1617 <a href="#l1598" class="line" id="l1598">   1598</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-68&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-68&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;/tag/ux/&amp;quot;&amp;gt;#Ux&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt;
   1618 <a href="#l1599" class="line" id="l1599">   1599</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-69&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-69&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1619 <a href="#l1600" class="line" id="l1600">   1600</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-70&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-70&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        
   1620 <a href="#l1601" class="line" id="l1601">   1601</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-71&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-71&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;li&amp;gt;
   1621 <a href="#l1602" class="line" id="l1602">   1602</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-72&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-72&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;/tag/testing/&amp;quot;&amp;gt;#Testing&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt;
   1622 <a href="#l1603" class="line" id="l1603">   1603</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-73&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-73&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1623 <a href="#l1604" class="line" id="l1604">   1604</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-74&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-74&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        
   1624 <a href="#l1605" class="line" id="l1605">   1605</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-75&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-75&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;/ul&amp;gt;
   1625 <a href="#l1606" class="line" id="l1606">   1606</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-76&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-76&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   1626 <a href="#l1607" class="line" id="l1607">   1607</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-77&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-77&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   1627 <a href="#l1608" class="line" id="l1608">   1608</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-78&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-78&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;
   1628 <a href="#l1609" class="line" id="l1609">   1609</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-79&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-79&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        
   1629 <a href="#l1610" class="line" id="l1610">   1610</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-80&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-80&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;
   1630 <a href="#l1611" class="line" id="l1611">   1611</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-81&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-81&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;
   1631 <a href="#l1612" class="line" id="l1612">   1612</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-82&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-82&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;article class=&amp;quot;constrained&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   1632 <a href="#l1613" class="line" id="l1613">   1613</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-83&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-83&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;div class=&amp;quot;[ page-content ] [ flow wrapper ] [ flow-space-700 gap-top-700 ]&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   1633 <a href="#l1614" class="line" id="l1614">   1614</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-84&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-84&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Lorem markdownum tecta: sub candore removete cessit summum &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;#adigitque-qua&amp;quot;&amp;gt;laetitiae&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt;? Per et est micantia nisi fato? Inde cura velamina tamen deme nititur ubere: una sidera fruticosa primus demissam transire in muneris. Inter est repugnat &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;#medio-sine-quamvis&amp;quot;&amp;gt;dempta&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt;, sinu, quisque.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   1634 <a href="#l1615" class="line" id="l1615">   1615</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-85&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-85&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;blockquote&amp;gt;
   1635 <a href="#l1616" class="line" id="l1616">   1616</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-86&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-86&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Huic e hunc flamina in eripuit vittisconcutiens et Phylius fulmineo. Medium cursu Acastus nolim &amp;lt;strong&amp;gt;auditas se&amp;lt;/strong&amp;gt; videntur undis et Ulixes et tanto coruscis luctibus perdidit iam undique Medea finiat. Labare marmoris; in arte inpressa, tacuit, Argosque! Et quodsi arma, et &amp;lt;strong&amp;gt;verba&amp;lt;/strong&amp;gt;, dominoque colla prece, &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;#mittunt&amp;quot;&amp;gt;Hippodamen ab&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt; viderit cruor rugosoque terra omnipotens.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   1636 <a href="#l1617" class="line" id="l1617">   1617</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-87&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-87&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;/blockquote&amp;gt;
   1637 <a href="#l1618" class="line" id="l1618">   1618</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-88&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-88&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;h2&amp;gt;Crudelia qua arida quae ducum&amp;lt;/h2&amp;gt;
   1638 <a href="#l1619" class="line" id="l1619">   1619</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-89&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-89&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Tirynthia sacras. Sed urbes; est et adamante tegens, dea data &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;#nullam-persea-conplexa&amp;quot;&amp;gt;nebulas&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt; buxoque, mansura pars, corpore! Currere iacent curaeque addidit &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;#vetitum-nostris-vultus&amp;quot;&amp;gt;qui&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt; Tydidae aeris. Ignotas se &amp;lt;em&amp;gt;matris timido aquae&amp;lt;/em&amp;gt;: pedis alis circum lilia flumine, et fecit mei minores tantum. Funera caput.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   1639 <a href="#l1620" class="line" id="l1620">   1620</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-90&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-90&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;blockquote&amp;gt;
   1640 <a href="#l1621" class="line" id="l1621">   1621</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-91&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-91&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Parens parte mora: caput copia, &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;#aptumque-hypsea-est&amp;quot;&amp;gt;senes quae cervix&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt; Troum tenent, rectior. Foret sanguine lilia. Aut arvo repetita palmas.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   1641 <a href="#l1622" class="line" id="l1622">   1622</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-92&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-92&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;/blockquote&amp;gt;
   1642 <a href="#l1623" class="line" id="l1623">   1623</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-93&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-93&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;h2&amp;gt;Quae ideoque&amp;lt;/h2&amp;gt;
   1643 <a href="#l1624" class="line" id="l1624">   1624</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-94&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-94&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Antri fervoribus fulvae: adest modo veretur in pignus essem, &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;#tendat-illis-sed&amp;quot;&amp;gt;auro&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt; et Orphea filia, demens, regnorum, aut. Nivea est ubi peragit, usus utere Talia permanet, omnes.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   1644 <a href="#l1625" class="line" id="l1625">   1625</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-95&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-95&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;blockquote&amp;gt;
   1645 <a href="#l1626" class="line" id="l1626">   1626</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-96&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-96&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Iaculum si tenues vivit fuit, ille quoque proceres summisque, quaerere. Utque dixit harpen astra antiquas; deus nondum et successu.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   1646 <a href="#l1627" class="line" id="l1627">   1627</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-97&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-97&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;/blockquote&amp;gt;
   1647 <a href="#l1628" class="line" id="l1628">   1628</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-98&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-98&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;In se silvis sulphure &amp;lt;strong&amp;gt;caecisque navita relanguit&amp;lt;/strong&amp;gt;, auxilium vulnus levem, superesse orbem Iapetionides. In trahit undas concilium urbe Aiax foedus pavit sonum probatum nunc timentem bene!&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   1648 <a href="#l1629" class="line" id="l1629">   1629</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-99&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-99&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Lorem markdownum quicumque illa. Licuit saetae in pedem moles &amp;lt;strong&amp;gt;clamare etiam&amp;lt;/strong&amp;gt;. Sunt ligati genu Oetaeis fines non addit, &amp;lt;em&amp;gt;sub silvestribus stabula&amp;lt;/em&amp;gt; servat; et pelago in reticere. Iphi tristis egit vatum Priamum cuncta, tu sive liquidas, est cum &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;#manu-accessit-verbis&amp;quot;&amp;gt;paciscitur tamen&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt;. Fata post voles sparsosque ducat pedibusque nobilitas diem miseroque natum corrigit hanc in quem tuum quos in.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   1649 <a href="#l1630" class="line" id="l1630">   1630</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-100&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-100&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;blockquote&amp;gt;
   1650 <a href="#l1631" class="line" id="l1631">   1631</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-101&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-101&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;&amp;lt;em&amp;gt;Vires&amp;lt;/em&amp;gt; illo sum, nec, nunc, ademi silvas occubuit magnanimus umore, sit alimenta quam, lateque. Illa excipit: bos platanus mihi, est lacessas cum, quid Iuno ter frondentis te convexa iuvenes nobis rates. Fruges magna, inflataque tale attonitae acies.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   1651 <a href="#l1632" class="line" id="l1632">   1632</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-102&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-102&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;/blockquote&amp;gt;
   1652 <a href="#l1633" class="line" id="l1633">   1633</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-103&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-103&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;h2&amp;gt;Ac fretaque rapitur pluma numine aris&amp;lt;/h2&amp;gt;
   1653 <a href="#l1634" class="line" id="l1634">   1634</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-104&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-104&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;&amp;lt;strong&amp;gt;Arreptamque&amp;lt;/strong&amp;gt; dixit faciendus ex somnis damnavit nocens ut picae. Uno &amp;lt;strong&amp;gt;paternum&amp;lt;/strong&amp;gt; dicta furtisque noctem hoste in Bybli dilectus. Est angue noverat: coniunx et disque tuentes tenes raptaque praeside. Ducit vos ego Italiae nimbis miserae &amp;lt;strong&amp;gt;superos&amp;lt;/strong&amp;gt; praeterque, certa per. Quae bene atque sequitur crimen inter tollere.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   1654 <a href="#l1635" class="line" id="l1635">   1635</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-105&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-105&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;ul&amp;gt;
   1655 <a href="#l1636" class="line" id="l1636">   1636</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-106&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-106&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Crudelia properas praeterita prima est mei lumina&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1656 <a href="#l1637" class="line" id="l1637">   1637</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-107&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-107&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Onus per serpens celant&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1657 <a href="#l1638" class="line" id="l1638">   1638</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-108&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-108&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Generisque rarior est sperat&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1658 <a href="#l1639" class="line" id="l1639">   1639</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-109&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-109&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Tum signa tegebant perire militia nivibus exacta&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1659 <a href="#l1640" class="line" id="l1640">   1640</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-110&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-110&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;/ul&amp;gt;
   1660 <a href="#l1641" class="line" id="l1641">   1641</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-111&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-111&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;h2&amp;gt;Lacrimare volentem&amp;lt;/h2&amp;gt;
   1661 <a href="#l1642" class="line" id="l1642">   1642</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-112&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-112&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Cursus plenum? Usus rura timidis.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   1662 <a href="#l1643" class="line" id="l1643">   1643</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-113&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-113&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;ul&amp;gt;
   1663 <a href="#l1644" class="line" id="l1644">   1644</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-114&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-114&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Est sed ignotis texit insequitur cerebro summae&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1664 <a href="#l1645" class="line" id="l1645">   1645</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-115&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-115&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;In et auras sanguine Maeonia&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1665 <a href="#l1646" class="line" id="l1646">   1646</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-116&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-116&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Medium ait dederant ferunt munus&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1666 <a href="#l1647" class="line" id="l1647">   1647</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-117&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-117&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Tamen mutor tu esse ambiguis Auram&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1667 <a href="#l1648" class="line" id="l1648">   1648</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-118&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-118&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;/ul&amp;gt;
   1668 <a href="#l1649" class="line" id="l1649">   1649</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-119&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-119&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;h2&amp;gt;Exit fortes bibendo ferre nemus spe velociter&amp;lt;/h2&amp;gt;
   1669 <a href="#l1650" class="line" id="l1650">   1650</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-120&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-120&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Frustra aera verum lusuque &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;#ora-meos-in&amp;quot;&amp;gt;inquit nata&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt; mixtum arva Glaucus vitiataque &amp;lt;em&amp;gt;exaestuat ruborem&amp;lt;/em&amp;gt;. Ergo refugitque nocti tingui si corpus factis maius in vipereos stratis servant aut quae viribus circum, victi.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   1670 <a href="#l1651" class="line" id="l1651">   1651</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-121&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-121&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Deos tulit Cephison nequiquam luctus tellus: ora iacet aequoris viri gurgite cumulum ad ignibus &amp;lt;em&amp;gt;neque&amp;lt;/em&amp;gt;. Hectoris posse: vinclis stupet! Putat tuorum; ramos, lotos populi demptis tenues hic time procorum domo?&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   1671 <a href="#l1652" class="line" id="l1652">   1652</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-122&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-122&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   1672 <a href="#l1653" class="line" id="l1653">   1653</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-123&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-123&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;
   1673 <a href="#l1654" class="line" id="l1654">   1654</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-124&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-124&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;/article&amp;gt;
   1674 <a href="#l1655" class="line" id="l1655">   1655</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-125&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-125&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   1675 <a href="#l1656" class="line" id="l1656">   1656</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-126&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-126&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;/main&amp;gt;
   1676 <a href="#l1657" class="line" id="l1657">   1657</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-127&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-127&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;footer class=&amp;quot;site-footer&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   1677 <a href="#l1658" class="line" id="l1658">   1658</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-128&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-128&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;div class=&amp;quot;wrapper&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   1678 <a href="#l1659" class="line" id="l1659">   1659</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-129&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-129&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;nav class=&amp;quot;site-footer__navigation&amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;quot;Secondary&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   1679 <a href="#l1660" class="line" id="l1660">   1660</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-130&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-130&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;ul class=&amp;quot;site-footer__navigation__inner&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   1680 <a href="#l1661" class="line" id="l1661">   1661</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-131&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-131&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                
   1681 <a href="#l1662" class="line" id="l1662">   1662</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-132&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-132&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                    &amp;lt;li&amp;gt;
   1682 <a href="#l1663" class="line" id="l1663">   1663</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-133&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-133&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                        &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;https://www.11ty.dev/&amp;quot; rel=&amp;quot;noopener noreferrer&amp;quot; target=&amp;quot;_blank&amp;quot;&amp;gt;Build with Eleventy&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt;
   1683 <a href="#l1664" class="line" id="l1664">   1664</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-134&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-134&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                    &amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1684 <a href="#l1665" class="line" id="l1665">   1665</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-135&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-135&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                
   1685 <a href="#l1666" class="line" id="l1666">   1666</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h10-0-136&quot; id=&quot;h10-0-136&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                    &amp;lt;li&amp;gt;

   1768 <a href="#l1749" class="line" id="l1749">   1749</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h11-0-50&quot; id=&quot;h11-0-50&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;/nav&amp;gt;
   1769 <a href="#l1750" class="line" id="l1750">   1750</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h11-0-51&quot; id=&quot;h11-0-51&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;
   1770 <a href="#l1751" class="line" id="l1751">   1751</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h11-0-52&quot; id=&quot;h11-0-52&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;
   1771 <a href="#l1752" class="line" id="l1752">   1752</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h11-0-53&quot; id=&quot;h11-0-53&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;/header&amp;gt;
   1772 <a href="#l1753" class="line" id="l1753">   1753</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h11-0-54&quot; id=&quot;h11-0-54&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;main tabindex=&amp;quot;-1&amp;quot; id=&amp;quot;main-content&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   1773 <a href="#l1754" class="line" id="l1754">   1754</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h11-0-55&quot; id=&quot;h11-0-55&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            
   1774 <a href="#l1755" class="line" id="l1755">   1755</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h11-0-56&quot; id=&quot;h11-0-56&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;div class=&amp;quot;[ page-header ]&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   1775 <a href="#l1756" class="line" id="l1756">   1756</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h11-0-57&quot; id=&quot;h11-0-57&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;div class=&amp;quot;[ wrapper ] [ flow ]&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   1776 <a href="#l1757" class="line" id="l1757">   1757</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h11-0-58&quot; id=&quot;h11-0-58&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;h1&amp;gt;How to test usability of websites remotely&amp;lt;/h1&amp;gt;
   1777 <a href="#l1758" class="line" id="l1758">   1758</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h11-0-59&quot; id=&quot;h11-0-59&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        
   1778 <a href="#l1759" class="line" id="l1759">   1759</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h11-0-60&quot; id=&quot;h11-0-60&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;div class=&amp;quot;[ page-header__summary ] [ measure-long ]&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   1779 <a href="#l1760" class="line" id="l1760">   1760</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h11-0-61&quot; id=&quot;h11-0-61&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                
   1780 <a href="#l1761" class="line" id="l1761">   1761</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h11-0-62&quot; id=&quot;h11-0-62&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;time datetime=&amp;quot;Dec 2, 2019&amp;quot;&amp;gt;Dec 2, 2019&amp;lt;/time&amp;gt;
   1781 <a href="#l1762" class="line" id="l1762">   1762</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h11-0-63&quot; id=&quot;h11-0-63&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   1782 <a href="#l1763" class="line" id="l1763">   1763</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h11-0-64&quot; id=&quot;h11-0-64&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;p class=&amp;quot;visually-hidden&amp;quot; id=&amp;quot;tags-desc&amp;quot;&amp;gt;Tags that this post has been filed under.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   1783 <a href="#l1764" class="line" id="l1764">   1764</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h11-0-65&quot; id=&quot;h11-0-65&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;ul class=&amp;quot;tags-list&amp;quot; aria-describedby=&amp;quot;tags-desc&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   1784 <a href="#l1765" class="line" id="l1765">   1765</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h11-0-66&quot; id=&quot;h11-0-66&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        
   1785 <a href="#l1766" class="line" id="l1766">   1766</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h11-0-67&quot; id=&quot;h11-0-67&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;li&amp;gt;
   1786 <a href="#l1767" class="line" id="l1767">   1767</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h11-0-68&quot; id=&quot;h11-0-68&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;/tag/ux/&amp;quot;&amp;gt;#Ux&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt;
   1787 <a href="#l1768" class="line" id="l1768">   1768</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h11-0-69&quot; id=&quot;h11-0-69&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1788 <a href="#l1769" class="line" id="l1769">   1769</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h11-0-70&quot; id=&quot;h11-0-70&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        
   1789 <a href="#l1770" class="line" id="l1770">   1770</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h11-0-71&quot; id=&quot;h11-0-71&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;li&amp;gt;
   1790 <a href="#l1771" class="line" id="l1771">   1771</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h11-0-72&quot; id=&quot;h11-0-72&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;/tag/testing/&amp;quot;&amp;gt;#Testing&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt;
   1791 <a href="#l1772" class="line" id="l1772">   1772</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h11-0-73&quot; id=&quot;h11-0-73&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1792 <a href="#l1773" class="line" id="l1773">   1773</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h11-0-74&quot; id=&quot;h11-0-74&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        
   1793 <a href="#l1774" class="line" id="l1774">   1774</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h11-0-75&quot; id=&quot;h11-0-75&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;/ul&amp;gt;
   1794 <a href="#l1775" class="line" id="l1775">   1775</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h11-0-76&quot; id=&quot;h11-0-76&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   1795 <a href="#l1776" class="line" id="l1776">   1776</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h11-0-77&quot; id=&quot;h11-0-77&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   1796 <a href="#l1777" class="line" id="l1777">   1777</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h11-0-78&quot; id=&quot;h11-0-78&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;
   1797 <a href="#l1778" class="line" id="l1778">   1778</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h11-0-79&quot; id=&quot;h11-0-79&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        
   1798 <a href="#l1779" class="line" id="l1779">   1779</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h11-0-80&quot; id=&quot;h11-0-80&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;
   1799 <a href="#l1780" class="line" id="l1780">   1780</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h11-0-81&quot; id=&quot;h11-0-81&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;
   1800 <a href="#l1781" class="line" id="l1781">   1781</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h11-0-82&quot; id=&quot;h11-0-82&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;article class=&amp;quot;constrained&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   1801 <a href="#l1782" class="line" id="l1782">   1782</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h11-0-83&quot; id=&quot;h11-0-83&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;div class=&amp;quot;[ page-content ] [ flow wrapper ] [ flow-space-700 gap-top-700 ]&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   1802 <a href="#l1783" class="line" id="l1783">   1783</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h11-0-84&quot; id=&quot;h11-0-84&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Lorem markdownum et quaeque nunc cum &amp;lt;em&amp;gt;Atlantiades&amp;lt;/em&amp;gt; versis, valuit meos tumescere fateri in circa. Ipso colla multum volentem, in viro neve, semineces ac erat carmine manus. &amp;lt;em&amp;gt;Per&amp;lt;/em&amp;gt; amat aut &amp;lt;strong&amp;gt;Thracesque semina&amp;lt;/strong&amp;gt; meritus lacrimas scinditur et pro enim summis, probat gravi mare. Cuspide sustulit, secutis alte, muta tibi me o torum. Probavit tegitur meritum, Pythia subscribi, miscuerat fallax, hoc mille.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   1803 <a href="#l1784" class="line" id="l1784">   1784</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h11-0-85&quot; id=&quot;h11-0-85&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;blockquote&amp;gt;
   1804 <a href="#l1785" class="line" id="l1785">   1785</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h11-0-86&quot; id=&quot;h11-0-86&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Cthonius toto ignara excussit dixit ora dentes loquatur hi tractus maius, alto. Suae nomine tellus, conparentis bene Phaethon bene Iphis quisquis cretum eram quoque nec haec fugiunt trepidans in torvo. Columbae extrema occupat huic, precari enim rupem equos his fama. Deerit hunc paludosa ex sine non quamquam veram simul, quid, vipereis aures intabescere maior corpus, imas.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   1805 <a href="#l1786" class="line" id="l1786">   1786</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h11-0-87&quot; id=&quot;h11-0-87&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;/blockquote&amp;gt;
   1806 <a href="#l1787" class="line" id="l1787">   1787</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h11-0-88&quot; id=&quot;h11-0-88&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Corpora est, ad dixit auctoris tumulavit in &amp;lt;strong&amp;gt;fateor&amp;lt;/strong&amp;gt; versarunt latet: gladiis undamque Medusae: sunt videt hic. Annum penetralia usque maior esse &amp;lt;em&amp;gt;Cyllare&amp;lt;/em&amp;gt; medii precanda ab est montis ne, deae Oeten se uterum ad pressaeque patrii. Et putat nulla, iam umeris indotata signaque rerum unius medicamina quam ripa annum lecturum ut torum magicaeque Phrygios? Victus arma, malo curas temptabimus illi oborto undis pharetra! Caelo risi cecidere quo ferrum: solis tacitus patrii, in lato.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   1807 <a href="#l1788" class="line" id="l1788">   1788</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h11-0-89&quot; id=&quot;h11-0-89&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;h2&amp;gt;Quae sedes percussit&amp;lt;/h2&amp;gt;
   1808 <a href="#l1789" class="line" id="l1789">   1789</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h11-0-90&quot; id=&quot;h11-0-90&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Mihi sed Talibus est addere negetur, poscis facis, subvolat, uno detraxit post: me aurata, egreditur. &amp;lt;strong&amp;gt;Se moenia quosque&amp;lt;/strong&amp;gt; commune: ait sive. Sit non per voce vinctus, ut frondes hanc avido &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;#suo-atque&amp;quot;&amp;gt;si naturae saucius&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt;.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   1809 <a href="#l1790" class="line" id="l1790">   1790</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h11-0-91&quot; id=&quot;h11-0-91&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;blockquote&amp;gt;
   1810 <a href="#l1791" class="line" id="l1791">   1791</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h11-0-92&quot; id=&quot;h11-0-92&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Sequenti albet; iram nisi ima &amp;lt;em&amp;gt;montis sanguine parmam&amp;lt;/em&amp;gt; quinquennem. Illo haut, deus est percurrere gaudia meruisse pia simul; ire. Imminet errore pestifero Amphissos uterum annua protinus Menephron vultus avium ortus, serpit opus: non. Eueni meis cauda coluique &amp;lt;strong&amp;gt;molarem mitissima&amp;lt;/strong&amp;gt;; ramos exit illa salutem ensis ille quam pontum.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   1811 <a href="#l1792" class="line" id="l1792">   1792</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h11-0-93&quot; id=&quot;h11-0-93&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;/blockquote&amp;gt;
   1812 <a href="#l1793" class="line" id="l1793">   1793</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h11-0-94&quot; id=&quot;h11-0-94&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;h2&amp;gt;Ferre incipit Melanthus exiguo&amp;lt;/h2&amp;gt;
   1813 <a href="#l1794" class="line" id="l1794">   1794</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h11-0-95&quot; id=&quot;h11-0-95&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Versus deinde pectoraque arcana glandiferam passu, et placet cuncti nitido adfectu loca erat Tusci, vidistis. &amp;lt;strong&amp;gt;Cum oculis carinas&amp;lt;/strong&amp;gt; simul fatum quaterque anxia paverunt tegat, repulsam &amp;lt;strong&amp;gt;et invicti fundebat&amp;lt;/strong&amp;gt; et pavit a seges &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;#reliquerat&amp;quot;&amp;gt;per patris&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt;. Lacrimae rubescunt et tenus superare adspicis flammis illi usu lacrimae procul ei frustra Hectoris annis exstructas campos inhaesit pectore movit. Ipse nuper densis aevo anguem, vides apta aquis, creditur. Es &amp;lt;em&amp;gt;tulit&amp;lt;/em&amp;gt; culpa, cruore arma ore premunt apte, sua!&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   1814 <a href="#l1795" class="line" id="l1795">   1795</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h11-0-96&quot; id=&quot;h11-0-96&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;blockquote&amp;gt;
   1815 <a href="#l1796" class="line" id="l1796">   1796</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h11-0-97&quot; id=&quot;h11-0-97&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Alto operum concolor Daedalus. Sit ipse contrarius tibi bracchia saecula et comas uritur, divino ut percussamque et &amp;lt;strong&amp;gt;Dianae&amp;lt;/strong&amp;gt;, lacrimaeque. Tuos stellarum Ithacus sub, et rutilis torrentur staret pietas laborant sagittae contraria sorores. Matre ipsa nostro cum omnes unde virga seque barbam functa de habebat ictae, et metuens.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   1816 <a href="#l1797" class="line" id="l1797">   1797</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h11-0-98&quot; id=&quot;h11-0-98&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;/blockquote&amp;gt;
   1817 <a href="#l1798" class="line" id="l1798">   1798</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h11-0-99&quot; id=&quot;h11-0-99&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Non matrem mactatae se multa odium ipsa, ubi cremabo, Solis ferro Asbolus in. Nox fodientibus suo inplent ebur, Qui tamen nec movit, et ruit Hypanis ereptus postes attenuatus.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   1818 <a href="#l1799" class="line" id="l1799">   1799</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h11-0-100&quot; id=&quot;h11-0-100&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   1819 <a href="#l1800" class="line" id="l1800">   1800</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h11-0-101&quot; id=&quot;h11-0-101&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;
   1820 <a href="#l1801" class="line" id="l1801">   1801</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h11-0-102&quot; id=&quot;h11-0-102&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;/article&amp;gt;
   1821 <a href="#l1802" class="line" id="l1802">   1802</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h11-0-103&quot; id=&quot;h11-0-103&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   1822 <a href="#l1803" class="line" id="l1803">   1803</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h11-0-104&quot; id=&quot;h11-0-104&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;/main&amp;gt;
   1823 <a href="#l1804" class="line" id="l1804">   1804</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h11-0-105&quot; id=&quot;h11-0-105&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;footer class=&amp;quot;site-footer&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   1824 <a href="#l1805" class="line" id="l1805">   1805</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h11-0-106&quot; id=&quot;h11-0-106&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;div class=&amp;quot;wrapper&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   1825 <a href="#l1806" class="line" id="l1806">   1806</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h11-0-107&quot; id=&quot;h11-0-107&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;nav class=&amp;quot;site-footer__navigation&amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;quot;Secondary&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   1826 <a href="#l1807" class="line" id="l1807">   1807</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h11-0-108&quot; id=&quot;h11-0-108&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;ul class=&amp;quot;site-footer__navigation__inner&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   1827 <a href="#l1808" class="line" id="l1808">   1808</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h11-0-109&quot; id=&quot;h11-0-109&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                
   1828 <a href="#l1809" class="line" id="l1809">   1809</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h11-0-110&quot; id=&quot;h11-0-110&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                    &amp;lt;li&amp;gt;
   1829 <a href="#l1810" class="line" id="l1810">   1810</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h11-0-111&quot; id=&quot;h11-0-111&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                        &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;https://www.11ty.dev/&amp;quot; rel=&amp;quot;noopener noreferrer&amp;quot; target=&amp;quot;_blank&amp;quot;&amp;gt;Build with Eleventy&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt;
   1830 <a href="#l1811" class="line" id="l1811">   1811</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h11-0-112&quot; id=&quot;h11-0-112&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                    &amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1831 <a href="#l1812" class="line" id="l1812">   1812</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h11-0-113&quot; id=&quot;h11-0-113&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                
   1832 <a href="#l1813" class="line" id="l1813">   1813</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h11-0-114&quot; id=&quot;h11-0-114&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                    &amp;lt;li&amp;gt;
   1833 <a href="#l1814" class="line" id="l1814">   1814</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h11-0-115&quot; id=&quot;h11-0-115&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                        &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;https://www.twitter.com/BitByte_&amp;quot; rel=&amp;quot;noopener noreferrer&amp;quot; target=&amp;quot;_blank&amp;quot;&amp;gt;Twitter&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt;
   1834 <a href="#l1815" class="line" id="l1815">   1815</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h11-0-116&quot; id=&quot;h11-0-116&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                    &amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1835 <a href="#l1816" class="line" id="l1816">   1816</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h11-0-117&quot; id=&quot;h11-0-117&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                
   1836 <a href="#l1817" class="line" id="l1817">   1817</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h11-0-118&quot; id=&quot;h11-0-118&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                    &amp;lt;li&amp;gt;
   1837 <a href="#l1818" class="line" id="l1818">   1818</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h11-0-119&quot; id=&quot;h11-0-119&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                        &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;https://codepen.io/hectoraldairah&amp;quot; rel=&amp;quot;noopener noreferrer&amp;quot; target=&amp;quot;_blank&amp;quot;&amp;gt;Codepen&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt;
   1838 <a href="#l1819" class="line" id="l1819">   1819</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h11-0-120&quot; id=&quot;h11-0-120&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                    &amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;

   1875 <a href="#l1856" class="line" id="l1856">   1856</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h12-0-10&quot; id=&quot;h12-0-10&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;/style&amp;gt;
   1876 <a href="#l1857" class="line" id="l1857">   1857</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h12-0-11&quot; id=&quot;h12-0-11&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   1877 <a href="#l1858" class="line" id="l1858">   1858</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h12-0-12&quot; id=&quot;h12-0-12&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        
   1878 <a href="#l1859" class="line" id="l1859">   1859</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h12-0-13&quot; id=&quot;h12-0-13&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        
   1879 <a href="#l1860" class="line" id="l1860">   1860</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h12-0-14&quot; id=&quot;h12-0-14&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            
   1880 <a href="#l1861" class="line" id="l1861">   1861</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h12-0-15&quot; id=&quot;h12-0-15&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                &amp;lt;style&amp;gt;
   1881 <a href="#l1862" class="line" id="l1862">   1862</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h12-0-16&quot; id=&quot;h12-0-16&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                    .post-list__item{padding-bottom:4rem}.post-list__item__info{display:flex;align-items:center;flex-wrap:wrap;font-size:1rem;color:rgba(243,243,243,.68);gap:1.25rem}.post-list__item__info a{text-decoration-color:#e9a6a6;padding:.2rem .4rem;background-color:#3f3351;border-radius:10%}.post-list__item__date{padding-bottom:.8rem 0}.post-list__item__excerpt{padding:1.25rem 0}.post-list__link{font-size:2rem;color:#e9a6a6;text-decoration:none;font-family:Lora,serif;font-weight:700}.post-list__link:hover{color:#916bbf}time[datetime]{display:block;color:#e9a6a6;font-size:2rem;font-style:italic}
   1882 <a href="#l1863" class="line" id="l1863">   1863</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h12-0-17&quot; id=&quot;h12-0-17&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                &amp;lt;/style&amp;gt;
   1883 <a href="#l1864" class="line" id="l1864">   1864</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h12-0-18&quot; id=&quot;h12-0-18&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+

   1937 <a href="#l1918" class="line" id="l1918">   1918</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h12-0-72&quot; id=&quot;h12-0-72&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   1938 <a href="#l1919" class="line" id="l1919">   1919</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h12-0-73&quot; id=&quot;h12-0-73&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   1939 <a href="#l1920" class="line" id="l1920">   1920</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h12-0-74&quot; id=&quot;h12-0-74&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;
   1940 <a href="#l1921" class="line" id="l1921">   1921</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h12-0-75&quot; id=&quot;h12-0-75&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        
   1941 <a href="#l1922" class="line" id="l1922">   1922</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h12-0-76&quot; id=&quot;h12-0-76&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;
   1942 <a href="#l1923" class="line" id="l1923">   1923</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h12-0-77&quot; id=&quot;h12-0-77&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;
   1943 <a href="#l1924" class="line" id="l1924">   1924</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h12-0-78&quot; id=&quot;h12-0-78&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;article class=&amp;quot;constrained&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   1944 <a href="#l1925" class="line" id="l1925">   1925</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h12-0-79&quot; id=&quot;h12-0-79&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;div class=&amp;quot;[ page-content ] [ flow wrapper ] [ flow-space-700 gap-top-700 ]&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   1945 <a href="#l1926" class="line" id="l1926">   1926</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h12-0-80&quot; id=&quot;h12-0-80&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Lorem &amp;lt;strong&amp;gt;markdownum illum&amp;lt;/strong&amp;gt;: possem pectore trucis genitus volat de ictu reparet, repetenda translata tulit. Celanda sed. Contulerat flavum; tua versus patiensque dumque nemorum. Caput colla nomen aras vela tum favilla velle unica, venit poenaeque expertem in ligones huius et invenit libat &amp;lt;em&amp;gt;resupinus&amp;lt;/em&amp;gt;.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   1946 <a href="#l1927" class="line" id="l1927">   1927</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h12-0-81&quot; id=&quot;h12-0-81&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;ul&amp;gt;
   1947 <a href="#l1928" class="line" id="l1928">   1928</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h12-0-82&quot; id=&quot;h12-0-82&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Est umeri poenaeque&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1948 <a href="#l1929" class="line" id="l1929">   1929</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h12-0-83&quot; id=&quot;h12-0-83&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Quae silvas sacerdos crescit&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1949 <a href="#l1930" class="line" id="l1930">   1930</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h12-0-84&quot; id=&quot;h12-0-84&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Matre tenebras propensum stramine mearum Aiax metusque&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1950 <a href="#l1931" class="line" id="l1931">   1931</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h12-0-85&quot; id=&quot;h12-0-85&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Plura harundine talia&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1951 <a href="#l1932" class="line" id="l1932">   1932</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h12-0-86&quot; id=&quot;h12-0-86&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Timentia iunctissimus&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1952 <a href="#l1933" class="line" id="l1933">   1933</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h12-0-87&quot; id=&quot;h12-0-87&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Non caeloque infantem&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1953 <a href="#l1934" class="line" id="l1934">   1934</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h12-0-88&quot; id=&quot;h12-0-88&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;/ul&amp;gt;
   1954 <a href="#l1935" class="line" id="l1935">   1935</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h12-0-89&quot; id=&quot;h12-0-89&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Dextra Sabini! Proles sceleris: longa est mea haec hoc tempore adiutus tamen. Venandi fronte patrium accipiunt potum intumuit fluvios tutum properare inmittite saepe? Mihi par visis.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   1955 <a href="#l1936" class="line" id="l1936">   1936</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h12-0-90&quot; id=&quot;h12-0-90&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;h2&amp;gt;Cum auro corpus utve geratis ripas inpellit&amp;lt;/h2&amp;gt;
   1956 <a href="#l1937" class="line" id="l1937">   1937</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h12-0-91&quot; id=&quot;h12-0-91&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Stabat quod obvia, &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;#misso-nataeque&amp;quot;&amp;gt;patientem&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt;: Erinys moveant, et peragit aethere facturus. Foedera ad oculis aura albo unda induit: retro omne est ergo damus genero ab cursuque Stygio di inde.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   1957 <a href="#l1938" class="line" id="l1938">   1938</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h12-0-92&quot; id=&quot;h12-0-92&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;blockquote&amp;gt;
   1958 <a href="#l1939" class="line" id="l1939">   1939</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h12-0-93&quot; id=&quot;h12-0-93&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Apud arce animam, Phrygiae et colla paene habentem ad ipsum. Fratrem est concipit nisi, morientia sine &amp;lt;strong&amp;gt;pantherarum lucum&amp;lt;/strong&amp;gt;; modo. In proles vellet hostem flebile saeva &amp;lt;strong&amp;gt;amantem&amp;lt;/strong&amp;gt; vitae forte invitique, videt quam bracchia ruit.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   1959 <a href="#l1940" class="line" id="l1940">   1940</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h12-0-94&quot; id=&quot;h12-0-94&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;/blockquote&amp;gt;
   1960 <a href="#l1941" class="line" id="l1941">   1941</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h12-0-95&quot; id=&quot;h12-0-95&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Est inque corpora: Aesonis: &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;#ulnas-fruitur&amp;quot;&amp;gt;at suis&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt; eadem tamen securim &amp;lt;strong&amp;gt;sub roseo iamdudum&amp;lt;/strong&amp;gt; geminis pervenisse colorem, dat fronte! Ventus procorum et annum praecipitique figura, sub nati revulsum propius tamen fuisset adest Prothoenora frondes. Gorgonis &amp;lt;strong&amp;gt;fata umidus tristi&amp;lt;/strong&amp;gt; quaecumque o pariter, non adiit; ipsa Stygia.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   1961 <a href="#l1942" class="line" id="l1942">   1942</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h12-0-96&quot; id=&quot;h12-0-96&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Memor debent, quo si Cepheus tecti es ipsa aut horrendis harenas quoque. Quacumque habebunt Semeleia vultu. Est corpus properant tibi.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   1962 <a href="#l1943" class="line" id="l1943">   1943</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h12-0-97&quot; id=&quot;h12-0-97&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   1963 <a href="#l1944" class="line" id="l1944">   1944</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h12-0-98&quot; id=&quot;h12-0-98&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;
   1964 <a href="#l1945" class="line" id="l1945">   1945</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h12-0-99&quot; id=&quot;h12-0-99&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;/article&amp;gt;
   1965 <a href="#l1946" class="line" id="l1946">   1946</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h12-0-100&quot; id=&quot;h12-0-100&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   1966 <a href="#l1947" class="line" id="l1947">   1947</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h12-0-101&quot; id=&quot;h12-0-101&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;/main&amp;gt;
   1967 <a href="#l1948" class="line" id="l1948">   1948</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h12-0-102&quot; id=&quot;h12-0-102&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;footer class=&amp;quot;site-footer&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   1968 <a href="#l1949" class="line" id="l1949">   1949</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h12-0-103&quot; id=&quot;h12-0-103&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;div class=&amp;quot;wrapper&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   1969 <a href="#l1950" class="line" id="l1950">   1950</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h12-0-104&quot; id=&quot;h12-0-104&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;nav class=&amp;quot;site-footer__navigation&amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;quot;Secondary&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   1970 <a href="#l1951" class="line" id="l1951">   1951</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h12-0-105&quot; id=&quot;h12-0-105&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;ul class=&amp;quot;site-footer__navigation__inner&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   1971 <a href="#l1952" class="line" id="l1952">   1952</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h12-0-106&quot; id=&quot;h12-0-106&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                
   1972 <a href="#l1953" class="line" id="l1953">   1953</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h12-0-107&quot; id=&quot;h12-0-107&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                    &amp;lt;li&amp;gt;
   1973 <a href="#l1954" class="line" id="l1954">   1954</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h12-0-108&quot; id=&quot;h12-0-108&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                        &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;https://www.11ty.dev/&amp;quot; rel=&amp;quot;noopener noreferrer&amp;quot; target=&amp;quot;_blank&amp;quot;&amp;gt;Build with Eleventy&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt;
   1974 <a href="#l1955" class="line" id="l1955">   1955</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h12-0-109&quot; id=&quot;h12-0-109&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                    &amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1975 <a href="#l1956" class="line" id="l1956">   1956</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h12-0-110&quot; id=&quot;h12-0-110&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                
   1976 <a href="#l1957" class="line" id="l1957">   1957</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h12-0-111&quot; id=&quot;h12-0-111&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                    &amp;lt;li&amp;gt;
   1977 <a href="#l1958" class="line" id="l1958">   1958</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h12-0-112&quot; id=&quot;h12-0-112&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                        &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;https://www.twitter.com/BitByte_&amp;quot; rel=&amp;quot;noopener noreferrer&amp;quot; target=&amp;quot;_blank&amp;quot;&amp;gt;Twitter&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt;
   1978 <a href="#l1959" class="line" id="l1959">   1959</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h12-0-113&quot; id=&quot;h12-0-113&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                    &amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1979 <a href="#l1960" class="line" id="l1960">   1960</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h12-0-114&quot; id=&quot;h12-0-114&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                
   1980 <a href="#l1961" class="line" id="l1961">   1961</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h12-0-115&quot; id=&quot;h12-0-115&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                    &amp;lt;li&amp;gt;
   1981 <a href="#l1962" class="line" id="l1962">   1962</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h12-0-116&quot; id=&quot;h12-0-116&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                        &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;https://codepen.io/hectoraldairah&amp;quot; rel=&amp;quot;noopener noreferrer&amp;quot; target=&amp;quot;_blank&amp;quot;&amp;gt;Codepen&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt;
   1982 <a href="#l1963" class="line" id="l1963">   1963</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h12-0-117&quot; id=&quot;h12-0-117&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                    &amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1983 <a href="#l1964" class="line" id="l1964">   1964</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h12-0-118&quot; id=&quot;h12-0-118&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                
   1984 <a href="#l1965" class="line" id="l1965">   1965</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h12-0-119&quot; id=&quot;h12-0-119&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                    &amp;lt;li&amp;gt;
   1985 <a href="#l1966" class="line" id="l1966">   1966</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h12-0-120&quot; id=&quot;h12-0-120&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                        &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;https://github.com/hectoraldairah&amp;quot; rel=&amp;quot;noopener noreferrer&amp;quot; target=&amp;quot;_blank&amp;quot;&amp;gt;Github&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt;
   1986 <a href="#l1967" class="line" id="l1967">   1967</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h12-0-121&quot; id=&quot;h12-0-121&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                    &amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   1987 <a href="#l1968" class="line" id="l1968">   1968</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h12-0-122&quot; id=&quot;h12-0-122&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+

   2002 <a href="#l1983" class="line" id="l1983">   1983</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h12-0-137&quot; id=&quot;h12-0-137&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;
