   2068 <a href="#l2049" class="line" id="l2049">   2049</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h13-0-59&quot; id=&quot;h13-0-59&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        
   2069 <a href="#l2050" class="line" id="l2050">   2050</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h13-0-60&quot; id=&quot;h13-0-60&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;div class=&amp;quot;[ page-header__summary ] [ measure-long ]&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   2070 <a href="#l2051" class="line" id="l2051">   2051</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h13-0-61&quot; id=&quot;h13-0-61&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                
   2071 <a href="#l2052" class="line" id="l2052">   2052</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h13-0-62&quot; id=&quot;h13-0-62&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;time datetime=&amp;quot;Dec 20, 2019&amp;quot;&amp;gt;Dec 20, 2019&amp;lt;/time&amp;gt;
   2072 <a href="#l2053" class="line" id="l2053">   2053</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h13-0-63&quot; id=&quot;h13-0-63&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2073 <a href="#l2054" class="line" id="l2054">   2054</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h13-0-64&quot; id=&quot;h13-0-64&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;p class=&amp;quot;visually-hidden&amp;quot; id=&amp;quot;tags-desc&amp;quot;&amp;gt;Tags that this post has been filed under.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   2074 <a href="#l2055" class="line" id="l2055">   2055</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h13-0-65&quot; id=&quot;h13-0-65&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;ul class=&amp;quot;tags-list&amp;quot; aria-describedby=&amp;quot;tags-desc&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   2075 <a href="#l2056" class="line" id="l2056">   2056</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h13-0-66&quot; id=&quot;h13-0-66&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        
   2076 <a href="#l2057" class="line" id="l2057">   2057</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h13-0-67&quot; id=&quot;h13-0-67&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;li&amp;gt;
   2077 <a href="#l2058" class="line" id="l2058">   2058</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h13-0-68&quot; id=&quot;h13-0-68&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;/tag/design-systems/&amp;quot;&amp;gt;#DesignSystems&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt;
   2078 <a href="#l2059" class="line" id="l2059">   2059</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h13-0-69&quot; id=&quot;h13-0-69&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   2079 <a href="#l2060" class="line" id="l2060">   2060</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h13-0-70&quot; id=&quot;h13-0-70&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        
   2080 <a href="#l2061" class="line" id="l2061">   2061</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h13-0-71&quot; id=&quot;h13-0-71&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;/ul&amp;gt;
   2081 <a href="#l2062" class="line" id="l2062">   2062</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h13-0-72&quot; id=&quot;h13-0-72&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2082 <a href="#l2063" class="line" id="l2063">   2063</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h13-0-73&quot; id=&quot;h13-0-73&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2083 <a href="#l2064" class="line" id="l2064">   2064</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h13-0-74&quot; id=&quot;h13-0-74&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;
   2084 <a href="#l2065" class="line" id="l2065">   2065</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h13-0-75&quot; id=&quot;h13-0-75&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        
   2085 <a href="#l2066" class="line" id="l2066">   2066</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h13-0-76&quot; id=&quot;h13-0-76&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;
   2086 <a href="#l2067" class="line" id="l2067">   2067</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h13-0-77&quot; id=&quot;h13-0-77&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;
   2087 <a href="#l2068" class="line" id="l2068">   2068</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h13-0-78&quot; id=&quot;h13-0-78&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;article class=&amp;quot;constrained&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   2088 <a href="#l2069" class="line" id="l2069">   2069</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h13-0-79&quot; id=&quot;h13-0-79&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;div class=&amp;quot;[ page-content ] [ flow wrapper ] [ flow-space-700 gap-top-700 ]&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   2089 <a href="#l2070" class="line" id="l2070">   2070</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h13-0-80&quot; id=&quot;h13-0-80&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Lorem markdownum, bracchia iuvenis teneo, nec urget, iuvenum nec adusque. Quaerit laborum parientibus inde eloquitur impune passu coronam sed maritae oculis, valuissent ne breve novis. Nec aliena facies agros sub cupiunt Credulitas, alumnus sermonibus, medium, gemellos. Sibi nec videbor negabat; et etiam offensi amnis interea donec sanguis forsitan descenderat nempe altior!&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   2090 <a href="#l2071" class="line" id="l2071">   2071</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h13-0-81&quot; id=&quot;h13-0-81&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;ol&amp;gt;
   2091 <a href="#l2072" class="line" id="l2072">   2072</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h13-0-82&quot; id=&quot;h13-0-82&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Litora optasse visa tellus&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   2092 <a href="#l2073" class="line" id="l2073">   2073</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h13-0-83&quot; id=&quot;h13-0-83&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Lacrimante corripitur frustra conveniunt colla est inridet&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   2093 <a href="#l2074" class="line" id="l2074">   2074</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h13-0-84&quot; id=&quot;h13-0-84&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Super poscis&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   2094 <a href="#l2075" class="line" id="l2075">   2075</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h13-0-85&quot; id=&quot;h13-0-85&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Ne velamina suos iuventus&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   2095 <a href="#l2076" class="line" id="l2076">   2076</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h13-0-86&quot; id=&quot;h13-0-86&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;/ol&amp;gt;
   2096 <a href="#l2077" class="line" id="l2077">   2077</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h13-0-87&quot; id=&quot;h13-0-87&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;h2&amp;gt;Et murmur summa Titan esto ut opprimere&amp;lt;/h2&amp;gt;
   2097 <a href="#l2078" class="line" id="l2078">   2078</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h13-0-88&quot; id=&quot;h13-0-88&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Referens timeas fides, haut sic vultusque, culpa latitantem in eadem, ossa dubitat. &amp;lt;em&amp;gt;Atracides et imber&amp;lt;/em&amp;gt; vires dies placuere indignatus ardetque exire. His summa flexerat perit! Pro partu suorum ille; populos lacu positaeque vocant regia puerpera valentes o pes. Cereris rerum cornua pavet Alemoniden vitae pereunt laetum.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   2098 <a href="#l2079" class="line" id="l2079">   2079</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h13-0-89&quot; id=&quot;h13-0-89&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;h2&amp;gt;Sit potuit sinus Achille tortum&amp;lt;/h2&amp;gt;
   2099 <a href="#l2080" class="line" id="l2080">   2080</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h13-0-90&quot; id=&quot;h13-0-90&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Cauda corpore leto curas tamen pluma, ipse &amp;lt;em&amp;gt;fecundus&amp;lt;/em&amp;gt;, nihil viris cuspide convivia sanctaque. Spectatae inpetus patulo faciendus Tethys festumque exterrita nota, litora paventis inque; hic? Ingemit et frontes tumefactum hanc, nil perque stetit, factas adductaque cubilia anno, &amp;lt;strong&amp;gt;sanguinis&amp;lt;/strong&amp;gt;: munus &amp;lt;strong&amp;gt;postquam&amp;lt;/strong&amp;gt;? Stuppea illa cretus? Et gaudia et moras male defecta aquarum et grates conbibitur Mendesius thyrso ausus!&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   2100 <a href="#l2081" class="line" id="l2081">   2081</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h13-0-91&quot; id=&quot;h13-0-91&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Umida infamia colorum ille lacrimas, et gaudet erat hasta. Iudicis orant haerentes et, ad messes &amp;lt;strong&amp;gt;etenim&amp;lt;/strong&amp;gt; veneni abit pendens imitatur dixit. Unum et alite ecce quoque hamo vult etiam in nigrae. Pater cava, multicavo portasse habet, nullus rem inpulsu ense nec albentia.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   2101 <a href="#l2082" class="line" id="l2082">   2082</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h13-0-92&quot; id=&quot;h13-0-92&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;h2&amp;gt;Generi iactanti tibi medio conposuit inferias quibus&amp;lt;/h2&amp;gt;
   2102 <a href="#l2083" class="line" id="l2083">   2083</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h13-0-93&quot; id=&quot;h13-0-93&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Nec est attigimus data, nec et territus quicquam cibique &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;#inpono&amp;quot;&amp;gt;inundet sepulcro&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt;, adiecerit. Totiens nutrici nec sanguine favore speculatur Cicones Delphice; ore sine lumina.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   2103 <a href="#l2084" class="line" id="l2084">   2084</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h13-0-94&quot; id=&quot;h13-0-94&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Sic inde molle gradientis verum, amoris Cypron plurimus toris &amp;lt;strong&amp;gt;dea semideique&amp;lt;/strong&amp;gt; fiducia malis motibus, is, est. Aera lingua sequerere mille lintea eadem nodosaque potest sedisti vocatur. Nomine non haec, posse nota foedera sopita. Sed animoque felix videtur &amp;lt;em&amp;gt;aequoreae at&amp;lt;/em&amp;gt; quae, haustus tu inrita oculos. Quam lumbis dictis, accensae sole manu in illi strepitum videar.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   2104 <a href="#l2085" class="line" id="l2085">   2085</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h13-0-95&quot; id=&quot;h13-0-95&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Gestae &amp;lt;strong&amp;gt;ferre mecum fata&amp;lt;/strong&amp;gt; spatium, est acta ieiunia sperat praecipue habuere. Proteu esse secedit fata hac suis: ieiunia &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;#una&amp;quot;&amp;gt;recens&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt;. Thisbaeas lateri rogus natalibus noverca dextraque sparsae: a rore, quae veste Gyaros fluminis &amp;lt;em&amp;gt;cervixque nec&amp;lt;/em&amp;gt;, coeperunt.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   2105 <a href="#l2086" class="line" id="l2086">   2086</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h13-0-96&quot; id=&quot;h13-0-96&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2106 <a href="#l2087" class="line" id="l2087">   2087</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h13-0-97&quot; id=&quot;h13-0-97&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;
   2107 <a href="#l2088" class="line" id="l2088">   2088</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h13-0-98&quot; id=&quot;h13-0-98&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;/article&amp;gt;
   2108 <a href="#l2089" class="line" id="l2089">   2089</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h13-0-99&quot; id=&quot;h13-0-99&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2109 <a href="#l2090" class="line" id="l2090">   2090</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h13-0-100&quot; id=&quot;h13-0-100&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;/main&amp;gt;
   2110 <a href="#l2091" class="line" id="l2091">   2091</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h13-0-101&quot; id=&quot;h13-0-101&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;footer class=&amp;quot;site-footer&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   2111 <a href="#l2092" class="line" id="l2092">   2092</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h13-0-102&quot; id=&quot;h13-0-102&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;div class=&amp;quot;wrapper&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   2112 <a href="#l2093" class="line" id="l2093">   2093</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h13-0-103&quot; id=&quot;h13-0-103&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;nav class=&amp;quot;site-footer__navigation&amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;quot;Secondary&amp;quot;&amp;gt;

   2114 <a href="#l2095" class="line" id="l2095">   2095</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h13-0-105&quot; id=&quot;h13-0-105&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                
   2115 <a href="#l2096" class="line" id="l2096">   2096</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h13-0-106&quot; id=&quot;h13-0-106&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                    &amp;lt;li&amp;gt;
   2116 <a href="#l2097" class="line" id="l2097">   2097</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h13-0-107&quot; id=&quot;h13-0-107&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                        &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;https://www.11ty.dev/&amp;quot; rel=&amp;quot;noopener noreferrer&amp;quot; target=&amp;quot;_blank&amp;quot;&amp;gt;Build with Eleventy&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt;

   2122 <a href="#l2103" class="line" id="l2103">   2103</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h13-0-113&quot; id=&quot;h13-0-113&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                
   2123 <a href="#l2104" class="line" id="l2104">   2104</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h13-0-114&quot; id=&quot;h13-0-114&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                    &amp;lt;li&amp;gt;
   2124 <a href="#l2105" class="line" id="l2105">   2105</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h13-0-115&quot; id=&quot;h13-0-115&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                        &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;https://codepen.io/hectoraldairah&amp;quot; rel=&amp;quot;noopener noreferrer&amp;quot; target=&amp;quot;_blank&amp;quot;&amp;gt;Codepen&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt;
   2125 <a href="#l2106" class="line" id="l2106">   2106</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h13-0-116&quot; id=&quot;h13-0-116&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                    &amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   2126 <a href="#l2107" class="line" id="l2107">   2107</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h13-0-117&quot; id=&quot;h13-0-117&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                
   2127 <a href="#l2108" class="line" id="l2108">   2108</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h13-0-118&quot; id=&quot;h13-0-118&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                    &amp;lt;li&amp;gt;
   2128 <a href="#l2109" class="line" id="l2109">   2109</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h13-0-119&quot; id=&quot;h13-0-119&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                        &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;https://github.com/hectoraldairah&amp;quot; rel=&amp;quot;noopener noreferrer&amp;quot; target=&amp;quot;_blank&amp;quot;&amp;gt;Github&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt;
   2129 <a href="#l2110" class="line" id="l2110">   2110</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h13-0-120&quot; id=&quot;h13-0-120&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                    &amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   2130 <a href="#l2111" class="line" id="l2111">   2111</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h13-0-121&quot; id=&quot;h13-0-121&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                
   2131 <a href="#l2112" class="line" id="l2112">   2112</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h13-0-122&quot; id=&quot;h13-0-122&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                    &amp;lt;li&amp;gt;
   2132 <a href="#l2113" class="line" id="l2113">   2113</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h13-0-123&quot; id=&quot;h13-0-123&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                        &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;https://www.linkedin.com/in/hectoraldairaguilar&amp;quot; rel=&amp;quot;noopener noreferrer&amp;quot; target=&amp;quot;_blank&amp;quot;&amp;gt;LinkedIn&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt;
   2133 <a href="#l2114" class="line" id="l2114">   2114</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h13-0-124&quot; id=&quot;h13-0-124&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                    &amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   2134 <a href="#l2115" class="line" id="l2115">   2115</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h13-0-125&quot; id=&quot;h13-0-125&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                
   2135 <a href="#l2116" class="line" id="l2116">   2116</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h13-0-126&quot; id=&quot;h13-0-126&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;/ul&amp;gt;
   2136 <a href="#l2117" class="line" id="l2117">   2117</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h13-0-127&quot; id=&quot;h13-0-127&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;ul class=&amp;quot;site-footer__navigation__outer&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   2137 <a href="#l2118" class="line" id="l2118">   2118</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h13-0-128&quot; id=&quot;h13-0-128&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                &amp;lt;li&amp;gt;
   2138 <a href="#l2119" class="line" id="l2119">   2119</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h13-0-129&quot; id=&quot;h13-0-129&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                    &amp;lt;a&amp;gt;RSS&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt;
   2139 <a href="#l2120" class="line" id="l2120">   2120</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h13-0-130&quot; id=&quot;h13-0-130&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                &amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;

   2177 <a href="#l2158" class="line" id="l2158">   2158</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h14-0-25&quot; id=&quot;h14-0-25&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+

   2179 <a href="#l2160" class="line" id="l2160">   2160</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h14-0-27&quot; id=&quot;h14-0-27&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;body&amp;gt;
   2180 <a href="#l2161" class="line" id="l2161">   2161</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h14-0-28&quot; id=&quot;h14-0-28&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;header role=&amp;quot;banner&amp;quot; class=&amp;quot;site-head&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   2181 <a href="#l2162" class="line" id="l2162">   2162</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h14-0-29&quot; id=&quot;h14-0-29&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;div class=&amp;quot;wrapper&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   2182 <a href="#l2163" class="line" id="l2163">   2163</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h14-0-30&quot; id=&quot;h14-0-30&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;div class=&amp;quot;site-head__inner&amp;quot;&amp;gt;

   2211 <a href="#l2192" class="line" id="l2192">   2192</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h14-0-59&quot; id=&quot;h14-0-59&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+

   2213 <a href="#l2194" class="line" id="l2194">   2194</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h14-0-61&quot; id=&quot;h14-0-61&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                
   2214 <a href="#l2195" class="line" id="l2195">   2195</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h14-0-62&quot; id=&quot;h14-0-62&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;time datetime=&amp;quot;Sep 27, 2019&amp;quot;&amp;gt;Sep 27, 2019&amp;lt;/time&amp;gt;
   2215 <a href="#l2196" class="line" id="l2196">   2196</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h14-0-63&quot; id=&quot;h14-0-63&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2216 <a href="#l2197" class="line" id="l2197">   2197</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h14-0-64&quot; id=&quot;h14-0-64&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;p class=&amp;quot;visually-hidden&amp;quot; id=&amp;quot;tags-desc&amp;quot;&amp;gt;Tags that this post has been filed under.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   2217 <a href="#l2198" class="line" id="l2198">   2198</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h14-0-65&quot; id=&quot;h14-0-65&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;ul class=&amp;quot;tags-list&amp;quot; aria-describedby=&amp;quot;tags-desc&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   2218 <a href="#l2199" class="line" id="l2199">   2199</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h14-0-66&quot; id=&quot;h14-0-66&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        
   2219 <a href="#l2200" class="line" id="l2200">   2200</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h14-0-67&quot; id=&quot;h14-0-67&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;li&amp;gt;
   2220 <a href="#l2201" class="line" id="l2201">   2201</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h14-0-68&quot; id=&quot;h14-0-68&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;/tag/tips-and-tricks/&amp;quot;&amp;gt;#TipsAndTricks&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt;
   2221 <a href="#l2202" class="line" id="l2202">   2202</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h14-0-69&quot; id=&quot;h14-0-69&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   2222 <a href="#l2203" class="line" id="l2203">   2203</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h14-0-70&quot; id=&quot;h14-0-70&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        
   2223 <a href="#l2204" class="line" id="l2204">   2204</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h14-0-71&quot; id=&quot;h14-0-71&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;/ul&amp;gt;
   2224 <a href="#l2205" class="line" id="l2205">   2205</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h14-0-72&quot; id=&quot;h14-0-72&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2225 <a href="#l2206" class="line" id="l2206">   2206</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h14-0-73&quot; id=&quot;h14-0-73&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2226 <a href="#l2207" class="line" id="l2207">   2207</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h14-0-74&quot; id=&quot;h14-0-74&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;
   2227 <a href="#l2208" class="line" id="l2208">   2208</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h14-0-75&quot; id=&quot;h14-0-75&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        
   2228 <a href="#l2209" class="line" id="l2209">   2209</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h14-0-76&quot; id=&quot;h14-0-76&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;
   2229 <a href="#l2210" class="line" id="l2210">   2210</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h14-0-77&quot; id=&quot;h14-0-77&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;
   2230 <a href="#l2211" class="line" id="l2211">   2211</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h14-0-78&quot; id=&quot;h14-0-78&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;article class=&amp;quot;constrained&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   2231 <a href="#l2212" class="line" id="l2212">   2212</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h14-0-79&quot; id=&quot;h14-0-79&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;div class=&amp;quot;[ page-content ] [ flow wrapper ] [ flow-space-700 gap-top-700 ]&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   2232 <a href="#l2213" class="line" id="l2213">   2213</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h14-0-80&quot; id=&quot;h14-0-80&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;p&amp;gt;&amp;lt;em&amp;gt;Lorem markdownum&amp;lt;/em&amp;gt; clamor, ver gemitus numen se dura mortalia inquit, sine telum durata licet teretes delphina, ex! Et genus. Amissum quam genus ambieratque messes; et Ithacus bracchia; ergo famuli inquit Lyncidae ex vestibus premebat. Rogis crimine nunc hae falsaque, dignus.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   2233 <a href="#l2214" class="line" id="l2214">   2214</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h14-0-81&quot; id=&quot;h14-0-81&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;ol&amp;gt;
   2234 <a href="#l2215" class="line" id="l2215">   2215</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h14-0-82&quot; id=&quot;h14-0-82&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Summo lucis vultus&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   2235 <a href="#l2216" class="line" id="l2216">   2216</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h14-0-83&quot; id=&quot;h14-0-83&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Sororum esse&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   2236 <a href="#l2217" class="line" id="l2217">   2217</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h14-0-84&quot; id=&quot;h14-0-84&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Magni exire caelestia utque totidem prisci plurima&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   2237 <a href="#l2218" class="line" id="l2218">   2218</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h14-0-85&quot; id=&quot;h14-0-85&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Templum dolores belua aut gravis ut fraudem&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   2238 <a href="#l2219" class="line" id="l2219">   2219</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h14-0-86&quot; id=&quot;h14-0-86&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Formam nata bracchia Cnosia amor esse coniuge&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   2239 <a href="#l2220" class="line" id="l2220">   2220</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h14-0-87&quot; id=&quot;h14-0-87&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;/ol&amp;gt;
   2240 <a href="#l2221" class="line" id="l2221">   2221</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h14-0-88&quot; id=&quot;h14-0-88&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Anxius destringere Daedale, poenae te, leti sibi novissimus astris portus pressoque me mutavit crimine, speciem in. Pariter postis, solam?&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   2241 <a href="#l2222" class="line" id="l2222">   2222</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h14-0-89&quot; id=&quot;h14-0-89&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;h2&amp;gt;Graciles Lycaeo ab nihil ad avis Phoebe&amp;lt;/h2&amp;gt;
   2242 <a href="#l2223" class="line" id="l2223">   2223</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h14-0-90&quot; id=&quot;h14-0-90&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Emathion est labore vagae? Adpositi quaerunt in torvo; dei laeva similis. Enim quam agitataque Martis, una misero &amp;lt;strong&amp;gt;sed fugam&amp;lt;/strong&amp;gt; coniecto.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   2243 <a href="#l2224" class="line" id="l2224">   2224</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h14-0-91&quot; id=&quot;h14-0-91&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;ul&amp;gt;
   2244 <a href="#l2225" class="line" id="l2225">   2225</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h14-0-92&quot; id=&quot;h14-0-92&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;De fitque correpto usum est fallaci medium&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   2245 <a href="#l2226" class="line" id="l2226">   2226</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h14-0-93&quot; id=&quot;h14-0-93&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Moenia sensimus vidisse calorque&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   2246 <a href="#l2227" class="line" id="l2227">   2227</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h14-0-94&quot; id=&quot;h14-0-94&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Lata tuae profugaque stetit videre haberet&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   2247 <a href="#l2228" class="line" id="l2228">   2228</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h14-0-95&quot; id=&quot;h14-0-95&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Dant manuque Icare&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   2248 <a href="#l2229" class="line" id="l2229">   2229</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h14-0-96&quot; id=&quot;h14-0-96&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;/ul&amp;gt;
   2249 <a href="#l2230" class="line" id="l2230">   2230</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h14-0-97&quot; id=&quot;h14-0-97&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Aut telum naidas ducibusque: orbem Venus latosque dicere oscula, praemia lasso indestrictus namque nec et refert Telamon. Similisque &amp;lt;em&amp;gt;iuvenis relanguit refert&amp;lt;/em&amp;gt; uterum boves. Sed flenti inquit; ait iure squalidus e pennae adverso et carne haec adsunt; hoc. Solio adfectas Erymanthon eruerit tollens, &amp;lt;strong&amp;gt;est traxit&amp;lt;/strong&amp;gt; robore at. Aras veterem virtus et ad viridi sceleratus, penitusque totum.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   2250 <a href="#l2231" class="line" id="l2231">   2231</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h14-0-98&quot; id=&quot;h14-0-98&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Sic nec labare digitos tempore, mea, erat matri repagula pectore dona. Parvo moveri tantum! &amp;lt;strong&amp;gt;Nec sed&amp;lt;/strong&amp;gt; est et, Nereaque et tellus sidereis nimium! Locus nam, non naribus lotos &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;#simul-tua-tenent&amp;quot;&amp;gt;de&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt; nivea viros merui semina leves, vobis se vallem agris et. Interea quae dixere illa, undis haec ipse sanguine moriens.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   2251 <a href="#l2232" class="line" id="l2232">   2232</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h14-0-99&quot; id=&quot;h14-0-99&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Summae sui tentoria coercuit, ora uncis nunc, exhorruit colunt supersint spectem, Io premunt natum Oeclides Iovis. Membra volvere sororum libera murmura, habet adultera, semine finitur, te te illi pennis nomen, nec quisquis. Frustra perque, ipse membris et poma vincinaque umeris iste? Longus et a margine igitur esse, est mutavit ille abest mihi circuitu tempore possent. Ultima &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;#se&amp;quot;&amp;gt;silvis thalamo&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt; vestras, &amp;lt;em&amp;gt;quae probat&amp;lt;/em&amp;gt; curia medium Chaonius necopina, te nostraque armos quod Colchi.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   2252 <a href="#l2233" class="line" id="l2233">   2233</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h14-0-100&quot; id=&quot;h14-0-100&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2253 <a href="#l2234" class="line" id="l2234">   2234</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h14-0-101&quot; id=&quot;h14-0-101&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;
   2254 <a href="#l2235" class="line" id="l2235">   2235</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h14-0-102&quot; id=&quot;h14-0-102&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;/article&amp;gt;
   2255 <a href="#l2236" class="line" id="l2236">   2236</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h14-0-103&quot; id=&quot;h14-0-103&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+

cray{2%{font-style:normal;text-decoration:none;text-transform:capitalize}4%{font-style:normal;text-decoration:line-through;text-transform:lowercase}6%{font-style:normal;text-decoration:line-through;text-transform:uppercase}8%{font-style:normal;text-decoration:none;text-transform:none}10%{font-style:normal;text-decoration:line-through;text-transform:none}12%{font-style:normal;text-decoration:none;text-transform:none}14%{font-style:normal;text-decoration:none;text-transform:none}16%{font-style:italic;text-decoration:underline;text-transform:capitalize}18%{font-style:normal;text-decoration:none;text-transform:none}20%{font-style:normal;text-decoration:none;text-transform:none}22%{font-style:normal;text-decoration:none;text-transform:none}24%{font-style:normal;text-decoration:line-through;text-transform:none}26%{font-style:italic;text-decoration:line-through;text-transform:none}28%{font-style:normal;text-decoration:none;text-transform:lowercase}30%{font-style:normal;text-decoration:none;text-transform:lowercase}32%{font-style:normal;text-decoration:none;text-transform:none}34%{font-style:italic;text-decoration:underline;text-transform:none}36%{font-style:normal;text-decoration:none;text-transform:none}38%{font-style:normal;text-decoration:none;text-transform:lowercase}40%{font-style:italic;text-decoration:line-through;text-transform:none}42%{font-style:italic;text-decoration:underline;text-transform:capitalize}44%{font-style:normal;text-decoration:none;text-transform:none}46%{font-style:normal;text-decoration:none;text-transform:none}48%{font-style:normal;text-decoration:none;text-transform:uppercase}50%{font-style:italic;text-decoration:none;text-transform:none}52%{font-style:normal;text-decoration:none;text-transform:none}54%{font-style:normal;text-decoration:underline;text-transform:none}56%{font-style:normal;text-decoration:none;text-transform:none}58%{font-style:normal;text-decoration:none;text-transform:uppercase}60%{font-style:normal;text-decoration:none;text-tra    2370 <a href="#l2351" class="line" id="l2351">   2351</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h15-0-71&quot; id=&quot;h15-0-71&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;/ul&amp;gt;
   2371 <a href="#l2352" class="line" id="l2352">   2352</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h15-0-72&quot; id=&quot;h15-0-72&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2372 <a href="#l2353" class="line" id="l2353">   2353</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h15-0-73&quot; id=&quot;h15-0-73&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2373 <a href="#l2354" class="line" id="l2354">   2354</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h15-0-74&quot; id=&quot;h15-0-74&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;
   2374 <a href="#l2355" class="line" id="l2355">   2355</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h15-0-75&quot; id=&quot;h15-0-75&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        
   2375 <a href="#l2356" class="line" id="l2356">   2356</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h15-0-76&quot; id=&quot;h15-0-76&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;
   2376 <a href="#l2357" class="line" id="l2357">   2357</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h15-0-77&quot; id=&quot;h15-0-77&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;
   2377 <a href="#l2358" class="line" id="l2358">   2358</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h15-0-78&quot; id=&quot;h15-0-78&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;article class=&amp;quot;constrained&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   2378 <a href="#l2359" class="line" id="l2359">   2359</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h15-0-79&quot; id=&quot;h15-0-79&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;div class=&amp;quot;[ page-content ] [ flow wrapper ] [ flow-space-700 gap-top-700 ]&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   2379 <a href="#l2360" class="line" id="l2360">   2360</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h15-0-80&quot; id=&quot;h15-0-80&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Lorem markdownum pectus neque! Nomen et cepit in caedis protinus, motumque aderam collumque sedem domum.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   2380 <a href="#l2361" class="line" id="l2361">   2361</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h15-0-81&quot; id=&quot;h15-0-81&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;ol&amp;gt;
   2381 <a href="#l2362" class="line" id="l2362">   2362</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h15-0-82&quot; id=&quot;h15-0-82&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Erat cervus haec&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   2382 <a href="#l2363" class="line" id="l2363">   2363</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h15-0-83&quot; id=&quot;h15-0-83&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Inscribit maximus&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   2383 <a href="#l2364" class="line" id="l2364">   2364</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h15-0-84&quot; id=&quot;h15-0-84&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Annos cum iuvene iustissimus pater cinctasque genetrix&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   2384 <a href="#l2365" class="line" id="l2365">   2365</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h15-0-85&quot; id=&quot;h15-0-85&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;/ol&amp;gt;
   2385 <a href="#l2366" class="line" id="l2366">   2366</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h15-0-86&quot; id=&quot;h15-0-86&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;h2&amp;gt;Per ultro ortum gravidae temperat&amp;lt;/h2&amp;gt;
   2386 <a href="#l2367" class="line" id="l2367">   2367</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h15-0-87&quot; id=&quot;h15-0-87&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Ulla quod tuum &amp;lt;strong&amp;gt;easdem&amp;lt;/strong&amp;gt; subiere, Atrides plura, Pagasaeae paret sentit. Manibusque virginis, coniugium auras: Venerem damna fugacibus cristati viget in rogos breve! O serva dolentem totidem avertitur et minus, tuens in tela boum habent leaeque. Aris aras lympha Memnonis tenebrae et nominis &amp;lt;strong&amp;gt;fratribus&amp;lt;/strong&amp;gt; tuae premens nitore ademi ope fallaci summo, &amp;lt;strong&amp;gt;mortisque&amp;lt;/strong&amp;gt; sanguine. Utque moras tellus frigida vestes, nec fiant manat de parenti velamina.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   2387 <a href="#l2368" class="line" id="l2368">   2368</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h15-0-88&quot; id=&quot;h15-0-88&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;ol&amp;gt;
   2388 <a href="#l2369" class="line" id="l2369">   2369</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h15-0-89&quot; id=&quot;h15-0-89&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Flammas anguis&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   2389 <a href="#l2370" class="line" id="l2370">   2370</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h15-0-90&quot; id=&quot;h15-0-90&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Sceleratos sanguinis validi corpore dederat verbis numinis&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   2390 <a href="#l2371" class="line" id="l2371">   2371</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h15-0-91&quot; id=&quot;h15-0-91&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Eratque mitissima&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   2391 <a href="#l2372" class="line" id="l2372">   2372</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h15-0-92&quot; id=&quot;h15-0-92&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Carebis armis demas unus retendit&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   2392 <a href="#l2373" class="line" id="l2373">   2373</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h15-0-93&quot; id=&quot;h15-0-93&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Fuit Iuno securi&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   2393 <a href="#l2374" class="line" id="l2374">   2374</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h15-0-94&quot; id=&quot;h15-0-94&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;/ol&amp;gt;
   2394 <a href="#l2375" class="line" id="l2375">   2375</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h15-0-95&quot; id=&quot;h15-0-95&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;h2&amp;gt;Contra quasi transferre et imago quoque manu&amp;lt;/h2&amp;gt;
   2395 <a href="#l2376" class="line" id="l2376">   2376</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h15-0-96&quot; id=&quot;h15-0-96&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Transire stratis, ut &amp;lt;strong&amp;gt;se&amp;lt;/strong&amp;gt; exiguo plenis &amp;lt;strong&amp;gt;clarum armiger simulati&amp;lt;/strong&amp;gt; tuum. Potentior a &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;#inque&amp;quot;&amp;gt;pavidam&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt;, inque modo colle &amp;lt;strong&amp;gt;colubrasque porrigis&amp;lt;/strong&amp;gt; altae in aura, at attactu. Et fessis longo; abi de, egi anni, habeo pars tecta extimuit.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   2396 <a href="#l2377" class="line" id="l2377">   2377</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h15-0-97&quot; id=&quot;h15-0-97&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Mota crimina, honor misit &amp;lt;em&amp;gt;amnis humo&amp;lt;/em&amp;gt;, ter vidi medios terga, sprevere. Est nunc plangor concurrere opifer ore, eurytus tellus.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   2397 <a href="#l2378" class="line" id="l2378">   2378</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h15-0-98&quot; id=&quot;h15-0-98&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Rurigenae Parnasia proelia confertque nostri; ore cum lanas regna! Est annis magnis protinus, Pleionesque et id longi sorte Tonantis. Et quod, est artes negarent primus, haec stipitis scopulis modo honorem has meis prius manus tempus ni foedabis.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   2398 <a href="#l2379" class="line" id="l2379">   2379</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h15-0-99&quot; id=&quot;h15-0-99&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Repulsam iuvenum somnos percusso salutis decimum manes! Lucida et amabam date nectare concipit humano. Vidi ardet nihil faciebat saevique nitorem quoque quidem victa.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   2399 <a href="#l2380" class="line" id="l2380">   2380</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h15-0-100&quot; id=&quot;h15-0-100&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2400 <a href="#l2381" class="line" id="l2381">   2381</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h15-0-101&quot; id=&quot;h15-0-101&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;
   2401 <a href="#l2382" class="line" id="l2382">   2382</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h15-0-102&quot; id=&quot;h15-0-102&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;/article&amp;gt;
   2402 <a href="#l2383" class="line" id="l2383">   2383</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h15-0-103&quot; id=&quot;h15-0-103&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2403 <a href="#l2384" class="line" id="l2384">   2384</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h15-0-104&quot; id=&quot;h15-0-104&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;/main&amp;gt;
   2404 <a href="#l2385" class="line" id="l2385">   2385</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h15-0-105&quot; id=&quot;h15-0-105&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;footer class=&amp;quot;site-footer&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   2405 <a href="#l2386" class="line" id="l2386">   2386</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h15-0-106&quot; id=&quot;h15-0-106&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;div class=&amp;quot;wrapper&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   2406 <a href="#l2387" class="line" id="l2387">   2387</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h15-0-107&quot; id=&quot;h15-0-107&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;nav class=&amp;quot;site-footer__navigation&amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;quot;Secondary&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   2407 <a href="#l2388" class="line" id="l2388">   2388</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h15-0-108&quot; id=&quot;h15-0-108&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;ul class=&amp;quot;site-footer__navigation__inner&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   2408 <a href="#l2389" class="line" id="l2389">   2389</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h15-0-109&quot; id=&quot;h15-0-109&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                
   2409 <a href="#l2390" class="line" id="l2390">   2390</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h15-0-110&quot; id=&quot;h15-0-110&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                    &amp;lt;li&amp;gt;
   2410 <a href="#l2391" class="line" id="l2391">   2391</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h15-0-111&quot; id=&quot;h15-0-111&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                        &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;https://www.11ty.dev/&amp;quot; rel=&amp;quot;noopener noreferrer&amp;quot; target=&amp;quot;_blank&amp;quot;&amp;gt;Build with Eleventy&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt;
   2411 <a href="#l2392" class="line" id="l2392">   2392</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h15-0-112&quot; id=&quot;h15-0-112&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                    &amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   2412 <a href="#l2393" class="line" id="l2393">   2393</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h15-0-113&quot; id=&quot;h15-0-113&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                
   2413 <a href="#l2394" class="line" id="l2394">   2394</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h15-0-114&quot; id=&quot;h15-0-114&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                    &amp;lt;li&amp;gt;

   2418 <a href="#l2399" class="line" id="l2399">   2399</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h15-0-119&quot; id=&quot;h15-0-119&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                        &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;https://codepen.io/hectoraldairah&amp;quot; rel=&amp;quot;noopener noreferrer&amp;quot; target=&amp;quot;_blank&amp;quot;&amp;gt;Codepen&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt;
   2419 <a href="#l2400" class="line" id="l2400">   2400</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h15-0-120&quot; id=&quot;h15-0-120&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                    &amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   2420 <a href="#l2401" class="line" id="l2401">   2401</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h15-0-121&quot; id=&quot;h15-0-121&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                
   2421 <a href="#l2402" class="line" id="l2402">   2402</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h15-0-122&quot; id=&quot;h15-0-122&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                    &amp;lt;li&amp;gt;
   2422 <a href="#l2403" class="line" id="l2403">   2403</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h15-0-123&quot; id=&quot;h15-0-123&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                        &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;https://github.com/hectoraldairah&amp;quot; rel=&amp;quot;noopener noreferrer&amp;quot; target=&amp;quot;_blank&amp;quot;&amp;gt;Github&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt;
   2423 <a href="#l2404" class="line" id="l2404">   2404</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h15-0-124&quot; id=&quot;h15-0-124&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                    &amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   2424 <a href="#l2405" class="line" id="l2405">   2405</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h15-0-125&quot; id=&quot;h15-0-125&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                
   2425 <a href="#l2406" class="line" id="l2406">   2406</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h15-0-126&quot; id=&quot;h15-0-126&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                    &amp;lt;li&amp;gt;
   2426 <a href="#l2407" class="line" id="l2407">   2407</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h15-0-127&quot; id=&quot;h15-0-127&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                        &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;https://www.linkedin.com/in/hectoraldairaguilar&amp;quot; rel=&amp;quot;noopener noreferrer&amp;quot; target=&amp;quot;_blank&amp;quot;&amp;gt;LinkedIn&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt;

   2428 <a href="#l2409" class="line" id="l2409">   2409</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h15-0-129&quot; id=&quot;h15-0-129&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+

   2430 <a href="#l2411" class="line" id="l2411">   2411</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h15-0-131&quot; id=&quot;h15-0-131&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;ul class=&amp;quot;site-footer__navigation__outer&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   2431 <a href="#l2412" class="line" id="l2412">   2412</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h15-0-132&quot; id=&quot;h15-0-132&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                &amp;lt;li&amp;gt;

   2433 <a href="#l2414" class="line" id="l2414">   2414</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h15-0-134&quot; id=&quot;h15-0-134&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                &amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   2434 <a href="#l2415" class="line" id="l2415">   2415</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h15-0-135&quot; id=&quot;h15-0-135&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                &amp;lt;li&amp;gt;
   2435 <a href="#l2416" class="line" id="l2416">   2416</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h15-0-136&quot; id=&quot;h15-0-136&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                    &amp;lt;a&amp;gt;Github&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt;
   2436 <a href="#l2417" class="line" id="l2417">   2417</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h15-0-137&quot; id=&quot;h15-0-137&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                &amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   2437 <a href="#l2418" class="line" id="l2418">   2418</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h15-0-138&quot; id=&quot;h15-0-138&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;/ul&amp;gt;
   2438 <a href="#l2419" class="line" id="l2419">   2419</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h15-0-139&quot; id=&quot;h15-0-139&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;/nav&amp;gt;
   2439 <a href="#l2420" class="line" id="l2420">   2420</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h15-0-140&quot; id=&quot;h15-0-140&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;
   2440 <a href="#l2421" class="line" id="l2421">   2421</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h15-0-141&quot; id=&quot;h15-0-141&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;/footer&amp;gt;
   2441 <a href="#l2422" class="line" id="l2422">   2422</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h15-0-142&quot; id=&quot;h15-0-142&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;/body&amp;gt;
   2442 <a href="#l2423" class="line" id="l2423">   2423</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h15-0-143&quot; id=&quot;h15-0-143&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;/html&amp;gt;
   2443 <a href="#l2424" class="line" id="l2424">   2424</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h15-0-144&quot; id=&quot;h15-0-144&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+\ No newline at end of file
   2444 <a href="#l2425" class="line" id="l2425">   2425</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;b&gt;diff --git a/&lt;a id=&quot;h16&quot; href=&quot;../file/dist/posts/why-cross-cultural-design-really-matters/index.html.html&quot;&gt;dist/posts/why-cross-cultural-design-really-matters/index.html&lt;/a&gt; b/&lt;a href=&quot;../file/dist/posts/why-cross-cultural-design-really-matters/index.html.html&quot;&gt;dist/posts/why-cross-cultural-design-really-matters/index.html&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/b&gt;

   2485 <a href="#l2466" class="line" id="l2466">   2466</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h16-0-39&quot; id=&quot;h16-0-39&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                        &amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   2486 <a href="#l2467" class="line" id="l2467">   2467</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h16-0-40&quot; id=&quot;h16-0-40&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                    
   2487 <a href="#l2468" class="line" id="l2468">   2468</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h16-0-41&quot; id=&quot;h16-0-41&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                        &amp;lt;li&amp;gt;
   2488 <a href="#l2469" class="line" id="l2469">   2469</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h16-0-42&quot; id=&quot;h16-0-42&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                            &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;/blog/&amp;quot; &amp;gt;blog&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt;
   2489 <a href="#l2470" class="line" id="l2470">   2470</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h16-0-43&quot; id=&quot;h16-0-43&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                        &amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   2490 <a href="#l2471" class="line" id="l2471">   2471</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h16-0-44&quot; id=&quot;h16-0-44&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                    
   2491 <a href="#l2472" class="line" id="l2472">   2472</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h16-0-45&quot; id=&quot;h16-0-45&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                        &amp;lt;li&amp;gt;
   2492 <a href="#l2473" class="line" id="l2473">   2473</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h16-0-46&quot; id=&quot;h16-0-46&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                            &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;/about/&amp;quot; &amp;gt;about&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt;
   2493 <a href="#l2474" class="line" id="l2474">   2474</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h16-0-47&quot; id=&quot;h16-0-47&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                        &amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   2494 <a href="#l2475" class="line" id="l2475">   2475</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h16-0-48&quot; id=&quot;h16-0-48&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                    
   2495 <a href="#l2476" class="line" id="l2476">   2476</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h16-0-49&quot; id=&quot;h16-0-49&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                &amp;lt;/ul&amp;gt;
   2496 <a href="#l2477" class="line" id="l2477">   2477</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h16-0-50&quot; id=&quot;h16-0-50&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;/nav&amp;gt;
   2497 <a href="#l2478" class="line" id="l2478">   2478</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h16-0-51&quot; id=&quot;h16-0-51&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;
   2498 <a href="#l2479" class="line" id="l2479">   2479</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h16-0-52&quot; id=&quot;h16-0-52&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;
   2499 <a href="#l2480" class="line" id="l2480">   2480</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h16-0-53&quot; id=&quot;h16-0-53&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;/header&amp;gt;
   2500 <a href="#l2481" class="line" id="l2481">   2481</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h16-0-54&quot; id=&quot;h16-0-54&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;main tabindex=&amp;quot;-1&amp;quot; id=&amp;quot;main-content&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   2501 <a href="#l2482" class="line" id="l2482">   2482</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h16-0-55&quot; id=&quot;h16-0-55&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            
   2502 <a href="#l2483" class="line" id="l2483">   2483</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h16-0-56&quot; id=&quot;h16-0-56&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;div class=&amp;quot;[ page-header ]&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   2503 <a href="#l2484" class="line" id="l2484">   2484</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h16-0-57&quot; id=&quot;h16-0-57&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;div class=&amp;quot;[ wrapper ] [ flow ]&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   2504 <a href="#l2485" class="line" id="l2485">   2485</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h16-0-58&quot; id=&quot;h16-0-58&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;h1&amp;gt;Why cross-cultural design really matters&amp;lt;/h1&amp;gt;
   2505 <a href="#l2486" class="line" id="l2486">   2486</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h16-0-59&quot; id=&quot;h16-0-59&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        
   2506 <a href="#l2487" class="line" id="l2487">   2487</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h16-0-60&quot; id=&quot;h16-0-60&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;div class=&amp;quot;[ page-header__summary ] [ measure-long ]&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   2507 <a href="#l2488" class="line" id="l2488">   2488</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h16-0-61&quot; id=&quot;h16-0-61&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                
   2508 <a href="#l2489" class="line" id="l2489">   2489</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h16-0-62&quot; id=&quot;h16-0-62&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;time datetime=&amp;quot;Mar 31, 2020&amp;quot;&amp;gt;Mar 31, 2020&amp;lt;/time&amp;gt;
   2509 <a href="#l2490" class="line" id="l2490">   2490</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h16-0-63&quot; id=&quot;h16-0-63&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2510 <a href="#l2491" class="line" id="l2491">   2491</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h16-0-64&quot; id=&quot;h16-0-64&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;p class=&amp;quot;visually-hidden&amp;quot; id=&amp;quot;tags-desc&amp;quot;&amp;gt;Tags that this post has been filed under.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   2511 <a href="#l2492" class="line" id="l2492">   2492</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h16-0-65&quot; id=&quot;h16-0-65&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;ul class=&amp;quot;tags-list&amp;quot; aria-describedby=&amp;quot;tags-desc&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   2512 <a href="#l2493" class="line" id="l2493">   2493</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h16-0-66&quot; id=&quot;h16-0-66&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        
   2513 <a href="#l2494" class="line" id="l2494">   2494</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h16-0-67&quot; id=&quot;h16-0-67&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;li&amp;gt;
   2514 <a href="#l2495" class="line" id="l2495">   2495</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h16-0-68&quot; id=&quot;h16-0-68&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;/tag/culture/&amp;quot;&amp;gt;#Culture&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt;
   2515 <a href="#l2496" class="line" id="l2496">   2496</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h16-0-69&quot; id=&quot;h16-0-69&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   2516 <a href="#l2497" class="line" id="l2497">   2497</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h16-0-70&quot; id=&quot;h16-0-70&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        
   2517 <a href="#l2498" class="line" id="l2498">   2498</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h16-0-71&quot; id=&quot;h16-0-71&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;li&amp;gt;
   2518 <a href="#l2499" class="line" id="l2499">   2499</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h16-0-72&quot; id=&quot;h16-0-72&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+                &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;/tag/design-thinking/&amp;quot;&amp;gt;#DesignThinking&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt;
   2519 <a href="#l2500" class="line" id="l2500">   2500</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h16-0-73&quot; id=&quot;h16-0-73&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   2520 <a href="#l2501" class="line" id="l2501">   2501</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h16-0-74&quot; id=&quot;h16-0-74&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        
   2521 <a href="#l2502" class="line" id="l2502">   2502</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h16-0-75&quot; id=&quot;h16-0-75&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;/ul&amp;gt;
   2522 <a href="#l2503" class="line" id="l2503">   2503</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h16-0-76&quot; id=&quot;h16-0-76&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2523 <a href="#l2504" class="line" id="l2504">   2504</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h16-0-77&quot; id=&quot;h16-0-77&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2524 <a href="#l2505" class="line" id="l2505">   2505</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h16-0-78&quot; id=&quot;h16-0-78&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;
   2525 <a href="#l2506" class="line" id="l2506">   2506</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h16-0-79&quot; id=&quot;h16-0-79&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        
   2526 <a href="#l2507" class="line" id="l2507">   2507</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h16-0-80&quot; id=&quot;h16-0-80&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;
   2527 <a href="#l2508" class="line" id="l2508">   2508</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h16-0-81&quot; id=&quot;h16-0-81&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;
   2528 <a href="#l2509" class="line" id="l2509">   2509</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h16-0-82&quot; id=&quot;h16-0-82&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;lt;article class=&amp;quot;constrained&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   2529 <a href="#l2510" class="line" id="l2510">   2510</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h16-0-83&quot; id=&quot;h16-0-83&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;div class=&amp;quot;[ page-content ] [ flow wrapper ] [ flow-space-700 gap-top-700 ]&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
   2530 <a href="#l2511" class="line" id="l2511">   2511</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h16-0-84&quot; id=&quot;h16-0-84&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+            &amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Lorem markdownum teneri dives, vota inarsit, numina qui mixto. Oculos quo vestro fero inrequieta magni. Ad inania pedes et volucrem, sub ex facti, nec huc curvamina! Semina cum sonitusque fraterno Meriones animas pervenit iusta populos faciem. Colebat et saepe!&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   2531 <a href="#l2512" class="line" id="l2512">   2512</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h16-0-85&quot; id=&quot;h16-0-85&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;ol&amp;gt;
   2532 <a href="#l2513" class="line" id="l2513">   2513</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h16-0-86&quot; id=&quot;h16-0-86&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Et Hectoris quaeque&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   2533 <a href="#l2514" class="line" id="l2514">   2514</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h16-0-87&quot; id=&quot;h16-0-87&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Noctis pars&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   2534 <a href="#l2515" class="line" id="l2515">   2515</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h16-0-88&quot; id=&quot;h16-0-88&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Possint dimittere poscitur&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   2535 <a href="#l2516" class="line" id="l2516">   2516</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h16-0-89&quot; id=&quot;h16-0-89&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Sine praemia&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   2536 <a href="#l2517" class="line" id="l2517">   2517</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h16-0-90&quot; id=&quot;h16-0-90&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Genae et sed in regia sonitum non&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   2537 <a href="#l2518" class="line" id="l2518">   2518</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h16-0-91&quot; id=&quot;h16-0-91&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Preme ne perstant non intrarit cura&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   2538 <a href="#l2519" class="line" id="l2519">   2519</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h16-0-92&quot; id=&quot;h16-0-92&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;/ol&amp;gt;
   2539 <a href="#l2520" class="line" id="l2520">   2520</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h16-0-93&quot; id=&quot;h16-0-93&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;h2&amp;gt;Et habenas honoratas&amp;lt;/h2&amp;gt;
   2540 <a href="#l2521" class="line" id="l2521">   2521</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h16-0-94&quot; id=&quot;h16-0-94&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Modo talia, nebulae quem. Sed ducit ossaque humilis lumine, excusantia Actorides nec deus. Nec tuas pares regia, inops ne ponti, quamquam, et! Cautes viae capillos communis parce, sub curva dat &amp;lt;strong&amp;gt;nota et&amp;lt;/strong&amp;gt;. Quaeritis inopino ligavit ne perque moriens numquam, mox iaculum apta Ciris, sunt.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   2541 <a href="#l2522" class="line" id="l2522">   2522</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h16-0-95&quot; id=&quot;h16-0-95&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Perit semideique copia. Quod tu, et &amp;lt;strong&amp;gt;enim&amp;lt;/strong&amp;gt; inmurmurat perque, nocent adfectat ut acrior &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;#per-inproba&amp;quot;&amp;gt;missi&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt;. Romanae est! Stipite hasta micante, puppe canities matris virgineosque duo rursus tamen mundus perque deus. Languescuntque Interea contigit ipsosque, est ore &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;#umbrosum-medius-esse&amp;quot;&amp;gt;esset&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt;; coronae mandatam quaque os per, deique caedis.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   2542 <a href="#l2523" class="line" id="l2523">   2523</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h16-0-96&quot; id=&quot;h16-0-96&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;ul&amp;gt;
   2543 <a href="#l2524" class="line" id="l2524">   2524</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h16-0-97&quot; id=&quot;h16-0-97&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Ille inclusit summa forem arborea tactus in&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   2544 <a href="#l2525" class="line" id="l2525">   2525</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h16-0-98&quot; id=&quot;h16-0-98&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Tellure refert&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   2545 <a href="#l2526" class="line" id="l2526">   2526</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h16-0-99&quot; id=&quot;h16-0-99&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Huic quantum credere terram&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
   2546 <a href="#l2527" class="line" id="l2527">   2527</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h16-0-100&quot; id=&quot;h16-0-100&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;/ul&amp;gt;
   2547 <a href="#l2528" class="line" id="l2528">   2528</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h16-0-101&quot; id=&quot;h16-0-101&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;h2&amp;gt;Aversa et sinistra flava praemia proelia ala&amp;lt;/h2&amp;gt;
   2548 <a href="#l2529" class="line" id="l2529">   2529</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h16-0-102&quot; id=&quot;h16-0-102&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Suos Pana pudori concubiturus paelex glomeravit, certare querellis, deus salutem tantaeque nomina: &amp;lt;a href=&amp;quot;#ferox-impete-misso&amp;quot;&amp;gt;stetit respiramen ad&amp;lt;/a&amp;gt;. Precor audistis cunctari arce tenui Hippomene satis prospiciens et hinc albentia Lyaeus, nec timetis, in. Iam flavum cantus, Iove Pharonque in linquit &amp;lt;em&amp;gt;attollit&amp;lt;/em&amp;gt;, cum? Versus tendentem et fecere amnis incola vulgares Cereris unguis ignibus obstipuit despexit, desierant componit nec imis capro horrida. Iove splendescunt agebat nubila favete cornibus ducit eadem in inde ignes dixit annis dona habemus litora?&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   2549 <a href="#l2530" class="line" id="l2530">   2530</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h16-0-103&quot; id=&quot;h16-0-103&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;blockquote&amp;gt;
   2550 <a href="#l2531" class="line" id="l2531">   2531</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h16-0-104&quot; id=&quot;h16-0-104&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Labores ille Thespiades inde, capellae dedi adire cortice! Velant aestuat per extis Mimasque figuram. Pelias concilio credentes induxerat fidem dedit; opem ut flumina quae vulnus specie permanet. Possent non facti pelagi faveas; incubat non et certans. Medea et: tota Dite.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   2551 <a href="#l2532" class="line" id="l2532">   2532</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h16-0-105&quot; id=&quot;h16-0-105&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;/blockquote&amp;gt;
   2552 <a href="#l2533" class="line" id="l2533">   2533</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h16-0-106&quot; id=&quot;h16-0-106&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Viri vidit rubor inquit: cum &amp;lt;strong&amp;gt;piscem naides&amp;lt;/strong&amp;gt; ut, sed forcipe nunc arte vulnera naturaque plus, amo. Partim Tritoniaca nimbos quid causam corpore fuit arces ieiunia sagitta tetigere me, quam duce. Volebat &amp;lt;strong&amp;gt;revocata nate&amp;lt;/strong&amp;gt;. Tu orbem locuturo prius dextera vesana &amp;lt;em&amp;gt;hostes adspicias facit&amp;lt;/em&amp;gt;, inde quos.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   2553 <a href="#l2534" class="line" id="l2534">   2534</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h16-0-107&quot; id=&quot;h16-0-107&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Hoc et ambo ortu ficta iuvencae crescentem debuerant caedis eo illis sceleratae somni. Pamphagos lapsu me idque lacertis, est pressos, dum. Estque dubitabat tamen gurgite est adicit de Epaphi pulveris cinerem colles &amp;lt;em&amp;gt;eadem publica&amp;lt;/em&amp;gt; vox unam &amp;lt;em&amp;gt;fecisse&amp;lt;/em&amp;gt; palmas Mopsus. In Mycenida fessos subsequitur &amp;lt;strong&amp;gt;femina&amp;lt;/strong&amp;gt; notas: in vocato tamen glaciali.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;
   2554 <a href="#l2535" class="line" id="l2535">   2535</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h16-0-108&quot; id=&quot;h16-0-108&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2555 <a href="#l2536" class="line" id="l2536">   2536</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h16-0-109&quot; id=&quot;h16-0-109&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+        &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;

   2799 <a href="#l2780" class="line" id="l2780">   2780</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h29-0-1&quot; id=&quot;h29-0-1&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+title: &amp;#39;10 Tips for Website Redesign in 2020&amp;#39;
   2800 <a href="#l2781" class="line" id="l2781">   2781</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h29-0-2&quot; id=&quot;h29-0-2&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+date: 2020-01-02
   2801 <a href="#l2782" class="line" id="l2782">   2782</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h29-0-3&quot; id=&quot;h29-0-3&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+tags: [&amp;#39;Tips And Tricks&amp;#39;, &amp;#39;Featured&amp;#39;]
   2802 <a href="#l2783" class="line" id="l2783">   2783</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h29-0-4&quot; id=&quot;h29-0-4&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+---
   2803 <a href="#l2784" class="line" id="l2784">   2784</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h29-0-5&quot; id=&quot;h29-0-5&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+Lorem markdownum **verbis**, fertur *fas* poplite cervix proximus ventis et. Regia ac gestu pugnacem actis, cum [illis](#murmurat-veros-tepescunt), et ungues ante mihi placet nomina relaxant circumstantes repagula non, speratque. Amorem suadent volucris quoque, tamen nunc sacra et genitalia candidaque audet homini iudice auras ramosam Dictaeaque.
   2804 <a href="#l2785" class="line" id="l2785">   2785</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h29-0-6&quot; id=&quot;h29-0-6&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2805 <a href="#l2786" class="line" id="l2786">   2786</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h29-0-7&quot; id=&quot;h29-0-7&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+1. Addenda ventis non
   2806 <a href="#l2787" class="line" id="l2787">   2787</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h29-0-8&quot; id=&quot;h29-0-8&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+2. Sol inpia ne arboreis
   2807 <a href="#l2788" class="line" id="l2788">   2788</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h29-0-9&quot; id=&quot;h29-0-9&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+3. Iam grates voluit cumque
   2808 <a href="#l2789" class="line" id="l2789">   2789</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h29-0-10&quot; id=&quot;h29-0-10&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+4. Vestigia et clipei adhaeret atque aristas collaque
   2809 <a href="#l2790" class="line" id="l2790">   2790</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h29-0-11&quot; id=&quot;h29-0-11&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+5. Furialibus Aonius morati optari nullique Hersilie manus
   2810 <a href="#l2791" class="line" id="l2791">   2791</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h29-0-12&quot; id=&quot;h29-0-12&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2811 <a href="#l2792" class="line" id="l2792">   2792</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h29-0-13&quot; id=&quot;h29-0-13&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+## Dispositam terribilis quae
   2812 <a href="#l2793" class="line" id="l2793">   2793</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h29-0-14&quot; id=&quot;h29-0-14&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2813 <a href="#l2794" class="line" id="l2794">   2794</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h29-0-15&quot; id=&quot;h29-0-15&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+Cognoscite gerens causam circumstant *luctus cupioque* morte, fera coniunx frustra Cnosiacaeque, cupidisque tempus Achaia. Pericla multis blanda! Et terribili, nec, **trepidans** pro; toto nam urbesque.
   2814 <a href="#l2795" class="line" id="l2795">   2795</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h29-0-16&quot; id=&quot;h29-0-16&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2815 <a href="#l2796" class="line" id="l2796">   2796</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h29-0-17&quot; id=&quot;h29-0-17&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+Utilis templum verbis, date Sidonide et fugit, iram vela cultros pennis et nimium. Tuam speciosam truculenta et cinxit sacer feroci et armenta servas; totoque fovet! Diversa ite profugi bella fugit viasque, velint sinu sic Iliades aquas gutture *asper* Neptunus.
   2816 <a href="#l2797" class="line" id="l2797">   2797</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h29-0-18&quot; id=&quot;h29-0-18&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2817 <a href="#l2798" class="line" id="l2798">   2798</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h29-0-19&quot; id=&quot;h29-0-19&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+## Tu viginti non
   2818 <a href="#l2799" class="line" id="l2799">   2799</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h29-0-20&quot; id=&quot;h29-0-20&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2819 <a href="#l2800" class="line" id="l2800">   2800</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h29-0-21&quot; id=&quot;h29-0-21&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+Dedit profundo similis Aurora Luna obscenique; innato amabam scopulos Idan? Ratione fides, nomen, nidos telluris stetit; dextra collumque maenades proxima congreditur! Inquit in dixere noverca manerem; dis omnia meri postquam nostris calidis fraudesque, **imis**. **Probavit coniunx quoque**, me mentior geniti fatorum vulnus.
   2820 <a href="#l2801" class="line" id="l2801">   2801</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h29-0-22&quot; id=&quot;h29-0-22&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2821 <a href="#l2802" class="line" id="l2802">   2802</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h29-0-23&quot; id=&quot;h29-0-23&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+- Est et haec bitumine documenta ora at
   2822 <a href="#l2803" class="line" id="l2803">   2803</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h29-0-24&quot; id=&quot;h29-0-24&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+- Possent herbas
   2823 <a href="#l2804" class="line" id="l2804">   2804</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h29-0-25&quot; id=&quot;h29-0-25&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+- Iacens caelo guttae
   2824 <a href="#l2805" class="line" id="l2805">   2805</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h29-0-26&quot; id=&quot;h29-0-26&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+- Unus regni
   2825 <a href="#l2806" class="line" id="l2806">   2806</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h29-0-27&quot; id=&quot;h29-0-27&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+- Ad aras pueroque nomen
   2826 <a href="#l2807" class="line" id="l2807">   2807</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h29-0-28&quot; id=&quot;h29-0-28&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2827 <a href="#l2808" class="line" id="l2808">   2808</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h29-0-29&quot; id=&quot;h29-0-29&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+## Ut iugo quod
   2828 <a href="#l2809" class="line" id="l2809">   2809</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h29-0-30&quot; id=&quot;h29-0-30&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2829 <a href="#l2810" class="line" id="l2810">   2810</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h29-0-31&quot; id=&quot;h29-0-31&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+In Alce ergo vestem Dixit pede non ut **sumit** exercent. Illi portus; pedes nomine [praeferre rarescit cadit](#duxerat-fudit) magni, indignantibus iram herbarum omnibus alter. Et dicere sonum, falsosque vulnera exiliis fugacibus oras accipit templa; sub ora.
   2830 <a href="#l2811" class="line" id="l2811">   2811</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h29-0-32&quot; id=&quot;h29-0-32&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2831 <a href="#l2812" class="line" id="l2812">   2812</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h29-0-33&quot; id=&quot;h29-0-33&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+1. Quae equos versus iura leti germanae sibi
   2832 <a href="#l2813" class="line" id="l2813">   2813</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h29-0-34&quot; id=&quot;h29-0-34&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+2. Vertice innubere velox et postquam fugae credulitate
   2833 <a href="#l2814" class="line" id="l2814">   2814</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h29-0-35&quot; id=&quot;h29-0-35&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+3. Mihi scelerataque extendi nec istis nostris caput
   2834 <a href="#l2815" class="line" id="l2815">   2815</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h29-0-36&quot; id=&quot;h29-0-36&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2835 <a href="#l2816" class="line" id="l2816">   2816</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h29-0-37&quot; id=&quot;h29-0-37&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+Tellure liceat sive serpens, erat quamvis, mihi: vultus mihi [contra frater](#relicta). Arce constitit Cimmerios quod, pedes, cetera, totoque dixit misit [adapertaque addidici dabat](#quae-verba).
   2836 <a href="#l2817" class="line" id="l2817">   2817</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;b&gt;diff --git a/&lt;a id=&quot;h30&quot; href=&quot;../file/src/posts/a-complete-guide-to-wireframe-design.md.html&quot;&gt;src/posts/a-complete-guide-to-wireframe-design.md&lt;/a&gt; b/&lt;a href=&quot;../file/src/posts/a-complete-guide-to-wireframe-design.md.html&quot;&gt;src/posts/a-complete-guide-to-wireframe-design.md&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/b&gt;
   2837 <a href="#l2818" class="line" id="l2818">   2818</a> &lt;a href=&quot;#h30-0&quot; id=&quot;h30-0&quot; class=&quot;h&quot;&gt;@@ -0,0 +1,48 @@
   2838 <a href="#l2819" class="line" id="l2819">   2819</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h30-0-0&quot; id=&quot;h30-0-0&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+---
   2839 <a href="#l2820" class="line" id="l2820">   2820</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h30-0-1&quot; id=&quot;h30-0-1&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+title: &amp;#39;A Complete Guide to Wireframe Design&amp;#39;
   2840 <a href="#l2821" class="line" id="l2821">   2821</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h30-0-2&quot; id=&quot;h30-0-2&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+date: 2020-04-13
   2841 <a href="#l2822" class="line" id="l2822">   2822</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h30-0-3&quot; id=&quot;h30-0-3&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+tags: [&amp;#39;Tutorial&amp;#39;, &amp;#39;Learning&amp;#39;, &amp;#39;Featured&amp;#39;]
   2842 <a href="#l2823" class="line" id="l2823">   2823</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h30-0-4&quot; id=&quot;h30-0-4&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+excerpt: &amp;#39;Placidis tamen. Amnem unda fores et nocent tellus. Ictu undis offensi nostra nempe dextra quod, illa causa expositum, dat.&amp;#39;
   2843 <a href="#l2824" class="line" id="l2824">   2824</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h30-0-5&quot; id=&quot;h30-0-5&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+---
   2844 <a href="#l2825" class="line" id="l2825">   2825</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h30-0-6&quot; id=&quot;h30-0-6&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2845 <a href="#l2826" class="line" id="l2826">   2826</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h30-0-7&quot; id=&quot;h30-0-7&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+Placidis tamen. Amnem unda fores et nocent tellus. Ictu undis offensi nostra nempe dextra quod, illa causa expositum, dat. Cura rapta dum praepositam inhaesit, laeto sceleratus vicina utque. Annos nunc sumitur ignes ac nequit minanti.
   2846 <a href="#l2827" class="line" id="l2827">   2827</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h30-0-8&quot; id=&quot;h30-0-8&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2847 <a href="#l2828" class="line" id="l2828">   2828</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h30-0-9&quot; id=&quot;h30-0-9&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+## Latus formam supplex dea ante cupies sanguisque
   2848 <a href="#l2829" class="line" id="l2829">   2829</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h30-0-10&quot; id=&quot;h30-0-10&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2849 <a href="#l2830" class="line" id="l2830">   2830</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h30-0-11&quot; id=&quot;h30-0-11&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+Et mors praebebat et acciperet flammas meque gravida quam quid. Baculisque armis levavit quarum habitataque atque abstractus: tenet ad pericula posset! Semesaque cura super concursibus enim communis caede **iam illa eduxit**, commissa acies, alto sit [soror](#te-aestuat) aut?
   2850 <a href="#l2831" class="line" id="l2831">   2831</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h30-0-12&quot; id=&quot;h30-0-12&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2851 <a href="#l2832" class="line" id="l2832">   2832</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h30-0-13&quot; id=&quot;h30-0-13&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;gt; Sigei pontus quondam, sed, anus duos nec: tamen? Marito fiuntque Baccho causam. Hecabe funus Oleniae umida illi miserere grandaevus aventi vocem, habet; iura. Ambae Phrygiisque magnis [spectemur](#hunc) Erigoneque vates. Colla trahebat tamen nec datis mihi colorum [vidit](#et-fata-locis).
   2852 <a href="#l2833" class="line" id="l2833">   2833</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h30-0-14&quot; id=&quot;h30-0-14&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2853 <a href="#l2834" class="line" id="l2834">   2834</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h30-0-15&quot; id=&quot;h30-0-15&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+## Fuit Cypro
   2854 <a href="#l2835" class="line" id="l2835">   2835</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h30-0-16&quot; id=&quot;h30-0-16&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2855 <a href="#l2836" class="line" id="l2836">   2836</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h30-0-17&quot; id=&quot;h30-0-17&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+Urbem monte vaccam tales Dianae, terrore quam non segetes ianua spatioque, ora des! Omnes vitiataque fibra promissa: et corpore timor; cum ait tumidaeque adolescere ipsaque nec. Facilem non ne forte Pergama corporis morbi removete amnes, movere loca [lumina Rutuli](#primaque), opus est poenamque. Campos dicere, replet placidi citharaque titulum in oritur ex omnibus **patitur**! Dixit Taygetenque album Deoia Troiae et utinam ergo animam tacita flores _visa_.
   2856 <a href="#l2837" class="line" id="l2837">   2837</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h30-0-18&quot; id=&quot;h30-0-18&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2857 <a href="#l2838" class="line" id="l2838">   2838</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h30-0-19&quot; id=&quot;h30-0-19&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+- Sed pro dicturus matres
   2858 <a href="#l2839" class="line" id="l2839">   2839</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h30-0-20&quot; id=&quot;h30-0-20&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+- Tremendos annos cunctosque mugiat videns
   2859 <a href="#l2840" class="line" id="l2840">   2840</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h30-0-21&quot; id=&quot;h30-0-21&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+- Ait in recipit nutricis in rapimur velox
   2860 <a href="#l2841" class="line" id="l2841">   2841</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h30-0-22&quot; id=&quot;h30-0-22&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+- Prosiliunt propior quamvis altera tumulo sensit
   2861 <a href="#l2842" class="line" id="l2842">   2842</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h30-0-23&quot; id=&quot;h30-0-23&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+- Florem leve inclusas cernere eandem nobis
   2862 <a href="#l2843" class="line" id="l2843">   2843</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h30-0-24&quot; id=&quot;h30-0-24&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+- Orchamus protinus
   2863 <a href="#l2844" class="line" id="l2844">   2844</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h30-0-25&quot; id=&quot;h30-0-25&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2864 <a href="#l2845" class="line" id="l2845">   2845</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h30-0-26&quot; id=&quot;h30-0-26&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+Tum est prendique acerbo! Et latitant aequore vivit; hic nisi excita duram petit: aut cedentem primum?
   2865 <a href="#l2846" class="line" id="l2846">   2846</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h30-0-27&quot; id=&quot;h30-0-27&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2866 <a href="#l2847" class="line" id="l2847">   2847</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h30-0-28&quot; id=&quot;h30-0-28&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+1. Dentibus inque rigidum dici vigil
   2867 <a href="#l2848" class="line" id="l2848">   2848</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h30-0-29&quot; id=&quot;h30-0-29&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+2. Popularis solitas amicis certos maneant discedite Sisyphe
   2868 <a href="#l2849" class="line" id="l2849">   2849</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h30-0-30&quot; id=&quot;h30-0-30&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+3. Nec verba
   2869 <a href="#l2850" class="line" id="l2850">   2850</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h30-0-31&quot; id=&quot;h30-0-31&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+4. Mihi patriumque abnuat formas
   2870 <a href="#l2851" class="line" id="l2851">   2851</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h30-0-32&quot; id=&quot;h30-0-32&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+5. Piscem blandaque in nervoque corpus qua longo
   2871 <a href="#l2852" class="line" id="l2852">   2852</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h30-0-33&quot; id=&quot;h30-0-33&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+6. Quid hanc puerile imbres
   2872 <a href="#l2853" class="line" id="l2853">   2853</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h30-0-34&quot; id=&quot;h30-0-34&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2873 <a href="#l2854" class="line" id="l2854">   2854</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h30-0-35&quot; id=&quot;h30-0-35&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+## Percussit clamor heu senes vixque cur
   2874 <a href="#l2855" class="line" id="l2855">   2855</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h30-0-36&quot; id=&quot;h30-0-36&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2875 <a href="#l2856" class="line" id="l2856">   2856</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h30-0-37&quot; id=&quot;h30-0-37&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+Nihil Phoebeius, ferro ferrataque limenque est facies _et_ amet Troianaque. Repetenda umor iuvenes, _dum probat freta_ nec arvis mersura. Regia qua quam despectat.
   2876 <a href="#l2857" class="line" id="l2857">   2857</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h30-0-38&quot; id=&quot;h30-0-38&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2877 <a href="#l2858" class="line" id="l2858">   2858</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h30-0-39&quot; id=&quot;h30-0-39&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;gt; Suos est? Dat duras magis fuit: domus vobis. Petis pervenientia vidit axis sanae, ore corpora turba, nova mutat.
