Fervoribus lumen, nam concursibus non alta quatenus, [in undis comae](#natae-aeneadae-fingit) doceri aequore excute. Limosi genitor, doles invia: [vidisse rauco](#pependit-bracchia-quidem) vocari.
   2878 <a href="#l2859" class="line" id="l2859">   2859</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h30-0-40&quot; id=&quot;h30-0-40&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2879 <a href="#l2860" class="line" id="l2860">   2860</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h30-0-41&quot; id=&quot;h30-0-41&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+## Ilicet sata edax artesque submersum amicitur ad
   2880 <a href="#l2861" class="line" id="l2861">   2861</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h30-0-42&quot; id=&quot;h30-0-42&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2881 <a href="#l2862" class="line" id="l2862">   2862</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h30-0-43&quot; id=&quot;h30-0-43&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+Et [oculis](#misit-aures) vadit flavusque. Responsa sceleris ibat nitentem Crenaee mors pendens inquit moriemur artem armos praeter illud, Aloidas olorinis seque et?
   2882 <a href="#l2863" class="line" id="l2863">   2863</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h30-0-44&quot; id=&quot;h30-0-44&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2883 <a href="#l2864" class="line" id="l2864">   2864</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h30-0-45&quot; id=&quot;h30-0-45&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;gt; Territa qui nostro, magis palus erat, hoc [solem](#coniunx-et). Fronti triumphos vinaque; vultusque tollere raptatur Iuppiter, tibi fatalis in modo quotiens minimamque et Minyae. Dantem optabile _aurum_; videt est ponit se vultu fervet superi, sub segnior placidique Tremorque. Fictilibus ignis; oris esse cum huius [ultoris](#me-eratque), terrae Delphica.
   2884 <a href="#l2865" class="line" id="l2865">   2865</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h30-0-46&quot; id=&quot;h30-0-46&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2885 <a href="#l2866" class="line" id="l2866">   2866</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h30-0-47&quot; id=&quot;h30-0-47&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+Gravis si nona urbes aggere, tulit **vivat tulit caeleste** in virgine vidit, diligis. Tibi quid. Illo sua, Palladis, iunctis. Lustrabere regnum Aeneia verba est quo accipis habet Hebe: cum.
   2886 <a href="#l2867" class="line" id="l2867">   2867</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;b&gt;diff --git a/&lt;a id=&quot;h31&quot; href=&quot;../file/src/posts/a-font-for-people-with-dyslexia.md.html&quot;&gt;src/posts/a-font-for-people-with-dyslexia.md&lt;/a&gt; b/&lt;a href=&quot;../file/src/posts/a-font-for-people-with-dyslexia.md.html&quot;&gt;src/posts/a-font-for-people-with-dyslexia.md&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/b&gt;
   2887 <a href="#l2868" class="line" id="l2868">   2868</a> &lt;a href=&quot;#h31-0&quot; id=&quot;h31-0&quot; class=&quot;h&quot;&gt;@@ -0,0 +1,39 @@
   2888 <a href="#l2869" class="line" id="l2869">   2869</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h31-0-0&quot; id=&quot;h31-0-0&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+---
   2889 <a href="#l2870" class="line" id="l2870">   2870</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h31-0-1&quot; id=&quot;h31-0-1&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+title: &amp;#39;A Font for people with dyslexia&amp;#39;
   2890 <a href="#l2871" class="line" id="l2871">   2871</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h31-0-2&quot; id=&quot;h31-0-2&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+date: 2020-04-09
   2891 <a href="#l2872" class="line" id="l2872">   2872</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h31-0-3&quot; id=&quot;h31-0-3&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+tags: [&amp;#39;Typography&amp;#39;, &amp;#39;Resources&amp;#39;, &amp;#39;Featured&amp;#39;]
   2892 <a href="#l2873" class="line" id="l2873">   2873</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h31-0-4&quot; id=&quot;h31-0-4&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+---
   2893 <a href="#l2874" class="line" id="l2874">   2874</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h31-0-5&quot; id=&quot;h31-0-5&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2894 <a href="#l2875" class="line" id="l2875">   2875</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h31-0-6&quot; id=&quot;h31-0-6&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+Lorem markdownum **verbis**, fertur *fas* poplite cervix proximus ventis et. Regia ac gestu pugnacem actis, cum [illis](#murmurat-veros-tepescunt), et ungues ante mihi placet nomina relaxant circumstantes repagula non, speratque. Amorem suadent volucris quoque, tamen nunc sacra et genitalia candidaque audet homini iudice auras ramosam Dictaeaque.
   2895 <a href="#l2876" class="line" id="l2876">   2876</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h31-0-7&quot; id=&quot;h31-0-7&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2896 <a href="#l2877" class="line" id="l2877">   2877</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h31-0-8&quot; id=&quot;h31-0-8&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+1. Addenda ventis non
   2897 <a href="#l2878" class="line" id="l2878">   2878</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h31-0-9&quot; id=&quot;h31-0-9&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+2. Sol inpia ne arboreis
   2898 <a href="#l2879" class="line" id="l2879">   2879</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h31-0-10&quot; id=&quot;h31-0-10&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+3. Iam grates voluit cumque
   2899 <a href="#l2880" class="line" id="l2880">   2880</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h31-0-11&quot; id=&quot;h31-0-11&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+4. Vestigia et clipei adhaeret atque aristas collaque
   2900 <a href="#l2881" class="line" id="l2881">   2881</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h31-0-12&quot; id=&quot;h31-0-12&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+5. Furialibus Aonius morati optari nullique Hersilie manus
   2901 <a href="#l2882" class="line" id="l2882">   2882</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h31-0-13&quot; id=&quot;h31-0-13&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2902 <a href="#l2883" class="line" id="l2883">   2883</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h31-0-14&quot; id=&quot;h31-0-14&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+## Dispositam terribilis quae
   2903 <a href="#l2884" class="line" id="l2884">   2884</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h31-0-15&quot; id=&quot;h31-0-15&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2904 <a href="#l2885" class="line" id="l2885">   2885</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h31-0-16&quot; id=&quot;h31-0-16&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+Cognoscite gerens causam circumstant *luctus cupioque* morte, fera coniunx frustra Cnosiacaeque, cupidisque tempus Achaia. Pericla multis blanda! Et terribili, nec, **trepidans** pro; toto nam urbesque.
   2905 <a href="#l2886" class="line" id="l2886">   2886</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h31-0-17&quot; id=&quot;h31-0-17&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2906 <a href="#l2887" class="line" id="l2887">   2887</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h31-0-18&quot; id=&quot;h31-0-18&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+Utilis templum verbis, date Sidonide et fugit, iram vela cultros pennis et nimium. Tuam speciosam truculenta et cinxit sacer feroci et armenta servas; totoque fovet! Diversa ite profugi bella fugit viasque, velint sinu sic Iliades aquas gutture *asper* Neptunus.
   2907 <a href="#l2888" class="line" id="l2888">   2888</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h31-0-19&quot; id=&quot;h31-0-19&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2908 <a href="#l2889" class="line" id="l2889">   2889</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h31-0-20&quot; id=&quot;h31-0-20&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+## Tu viginti non
   2909 <a href="#l2890" class="line" id="l2890">   2890</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h31-0-21&quot; id=&quot;h31-0-21&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2910 <a href="#l2891" class="line" id="l2891">   2891</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h31-0-22&quot; id=&quot;h31-0-22&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+Dedit profundo similis Aurora Luna obscenique; innato amabam scopulos Idan? Ratione fides, nomen, nidos telluris stetit; dextra collumque maenades proxima congreditur! Inquit in dixere noverca manerem; dis omnia meri postquam nostris calidis fraudesque, **imis**. **Probavit coniunx quoque**, me mentior geniti fatorum vulnus.
   2911 <a href="#l2892" class="line" id="l2892">   2892</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h31-0-23&quot; id=&quot;h31-0-23&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2912 <a href="#l2893" class="line" id="l2893">   2893</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h31-0-24&quot; id=&quot;h31-0-24&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+- Est et haec bitumine documenta ora at
   2913 <a href="#l2894" class="line" id="l2894">   2894</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h31-0-25&quot; id=&quot;h31-0-25&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+- Possent herbas
   2914 <a href="#l2895" class="line" id="l2895">   2895</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h31-0-26&quot; id=&quot;h31-0-26&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+- Iacens caelo guttae
   2915 <a href="#l2896" class="line" id="l2896">   2896</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h31-0-27&quot; id=&quot;h31-0-27&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+- Unus regni
   2916 <a href="#l2897" class="line" id="l2897">   2897</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h31-0-28&quot; id=&quot;h31-0-28&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+- Ad aras pueroque nomen
   2917 <a href="#l2898" class="line" id="l2898">   2898</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h31-0-29&quot; id=&quot;h31-0-29&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2918 <a href="#l2899" class="line" id="l2899">   2899</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h31-0-30&quot; id=&quot;h31-0-30&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+## Ut iugo quod
   2919 <a href="#l2900" class="line" id="l2900">   2900</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h31-0-31&quot; id=&quot;h31-0-31&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2920 <a href="#l2901" class="line" id="l2901">   2901</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h31-0-32&quot; id=&quot;h31-0-32&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+In Alce ergo vestem Dixit pede non ut **sumit** exercent. Illi portus; pedes nomine [praeferre rarescit cadit](#duxerat-fudit) magni, indignantibus iram herbarum omnibus alter. Et dicere sonum, falsosque vulnera exiliis fugacibus oras accipit templa; sub ora.
   2921 <a href="#l2902" class="line" id="l2902">   2902</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h31-0-33&quot; id=&quot;h31-0-33&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2922 <a href="#l2903" class="line" id="l2903">   2903</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h31-0-34&quot; id=&quot;h31-0-34&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+1. Quae equos versus iura leti germanae sibi
   2923 <a href="#l2904" class="line" id="l2904">   2904</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h31-0-35&quot; id=&quot;h31-0-35&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+2. Vertice innubere velox et postquam fugae credulitate
   2924 <a href="#l2905" class="line" id="l2905">   2905</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h31-0-36&quot; id=&quot;h31-0-36&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+3. Mihi scelerataque extendi nec istis nostris caput
   2925 <a href="#l2906" class="line" id="l2906">   2906</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h31-0-37&quot; id=&quot;h31-0-37&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2926 <a href="#l2907" class="line" id="l2907">   2907</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h31-0-38&quot; id=&quot;h31-0-38&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+Tellure liceat sive serpens, erat quamvis, mihi: vultus mihi [contra frater](#relicta). Arce constitit Cimmerios quod, pedes, cetera, totoque dixit misit [adapertaque addidici dabat](#quae-verba).
   2927 <a href="#l2908" class="line" id="l2908">   2908</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;b&gt;diff --git a/&lt;a id=&quot;h32&quot; href=&quot;../file/src/posts/color-palette-generator.md.html&quot;&gt;src/posts/color-palette-generator.md&lt;/a&gt; b/&lt;a href=&quot;../file/src/posts/color-palette-generator.md.html&quot;&gt;src/posts/color-palette-generator.md&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/b&gt;
   2928 <a href="#l2909" class="line" id="l2909">   2909</a> &lt;a href=&quot;#h32-0&quot; id=&quot;h32-0&quot; class=&quot;h&quot;&gt;@@ -0,0 +1,32 @@
   2929 <a href="#l2910" class="line" id="l2910">   2910</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h32-0-0&quot; id=&quot;h32-0-0&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+---
   2930 <a href="#l2911" class="line" id="l2911">   2911</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h32-0-1&quot; id=&quot;h32-0-1&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+title: &amp;#39;Color Palette Generator&amp;#39;
   2931 <a href="#l2912" class="line" id="l2912">   2912</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h32-0-2&quot; id=&quot;h32-0-2&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+date: 2019-11-16
   2932 <a href="#l2913" class="line" id="l2913">   2913</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h32-0-3&quot; id=&quot;h32-0-3&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+tags: [&amp;#39;Tools&amp;#39;, &amp;#39;Featured&amp;#39;]
   2933 <a href="#l2914" class="line" id="l2914">   2914</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h32-0-4&quot; id=&quot;h32-0-4&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+---
   2934 <a href="#l2915" class="line" id="l2915">   2915</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h32-0-5&quot; id=&quot;h32-0-5&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2935 <a href="#l2916" class="line" id="l2916">   2916</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h32-0-6&quot; id=&quot;h32-0-6&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+Lorem markdownum ait. Plaustrum gaudet: similis pulsarunt inmortalis multa cui et huic altera nil; non ingenio tormenta visa.
   2936 <a href="#l2917" class="line" id="l2917">   2917</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h32-0-7&quot; id=&quot;h32-0-7&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2937 <a href="#l2918" class="line" id="l2918">   2918</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h32-0-8&quot; id=&quot;h32-0-8&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;gt; Matre quid vescitur Paris hunc rependatur cursus vitasset tenebrae nec! Caelo ad flumina, delapsa tamen corpus hunc nymphae sanguine compos interea excusat iaceres vetitorum, nostro.
   2938 <a href="#l2919" class="line" id="l2919">   2919</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h32-0-9&quot; id=&quot;h32-0-9&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2939 <a href="#l2920" class="line" id="l2920">   2920</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h32-0-10&quot; id=&quot;h32-0-10&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+## Cthonius reque missa robore humus perque
   2940 <a href="#l2921" class="line" id="l2921">   2921</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h32-0-11&quot; id=&quot;h32-0-11&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2941 <a href="#l2922" class="line" id="l2922">   2922</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h32-0-12&quot; id=&quot;h32-0-12&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+Nodum praemia nam postes tellus. Iuvenis exstinctum in venire consilium est, pars non eunti *texerat* dapibus, satis suarum non mihi licuit carmine. Consulat nec; convexi Apollinei inportuna ipse patitur omnipotens ut ipse!
   2942 <a href="#l2923" class="line" id="l2923">   2923</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h32-0-13&quot; id=&quot;h32-0-13&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2943 <a href="#l2924" class="line" id="l2924">   2924</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h32-0-14&quot; id=&quot;h32-0-14&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+- Veste caelestibus Tyrrhenaque sed
   2944 <a href="#l2925" class="line" id="l2925">   2925</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h32-0-15&quot; id=&quot;h32-0-15&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+- Per sacrorum mendacem ut aureus Bromumque haeret
   2945 <a href="#l2926" class="line" id="l2926">   2926</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h32-0-16&quot; id=&quot;h32-0-16&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+- Et longe tamen pariterque et toto dabas
   2946 <a href="#l2927" class="line" id="l2927">   2927</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h32-0-17&quot; id=&quot;h32-0-17&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+- Ore sui cum in iter nocturnos gestamina
   2947 <a href="#l2928" class="line" id="l2928">   2928</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h32-0-18&quot; id=&quot;h32-0-18&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+- Annis frementes flammis
   2948 <a href="#l2929" class="line" id="l2929">   2929</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h32-0-19&quot; id=&quot;h32-0-19&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2949 <a href="#l2930" class="line" id="l2930">   2930</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h32-0-20&quot; id=&quot;h32-0-20&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+## Inpositum inque de sagittas furoris umet
   2950 <a href="#l2931" class="line" id="l2931">   2931</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h32-0-21&quot; id=&quot;h32-0-21&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2951 <a href="#l2932" class="line" id="l2932">   2932</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h32-0-22&quot; id=&quot;h32-0-22&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+Aureus res ille mutata tempora vapor volubile animalia lacrimis cumulum, radiis? Manus figit prius, patrem?
   2952 <a href="#l2933" class="line" id="l2933">   2933</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h32-0-23&quot; id=&quot;h32-0-23&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2953 <a href="#l2934" class="line" id="l2934">   2934</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h32-0-24&quot; id=&quot;h32-0-24&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+- Omni equinis Neptunia habebat
   2954 <a href="#l2935" class="line" id="l2935">   2935</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h32-0-25&quot; id=&quot;h32-0-25&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+- Misso hunc notior pars fictus hic opus
   2955 <a href="#l2936" class="line" id="l2936">   2936</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h32-0-26&quot; id=&quot;h32-0-26&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+- Quod tuum lenta
   2956 <a href="#l2937" class="line" id="l2937">   2937</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h32-0-27&quot; id=&quot;h32-0-27&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+- Manumque illa novit tumulo notam
   2957 <a href="#l2938" class="line" id="l2938">   2938</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h32-0-28&quot; id=&quot;h32-0-28&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+- Quid traxere
   2958 <a href="#l2939" class="line" id="l2939">   2939</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h32-0-29&quot; id=&quot;h32-0-29&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+- Ut tibi prudens temporis liliaque inmanis meas
   2959 <a href="#l2940" class="line" id="l2940">   2940</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h32-0-30&quot; id=&quot;h32-0-30&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2960 <a href="#l2941" class="line" id="l2941">   2941</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h32-0-31&quot; id=&quot;h32-0-31&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+Pectus dum mendaci duce [fama](#et-vulnerat) idem praedae coniunx **obstitit**, est. Gerit oris manes ferrumque illa, responderat utroque quoque et aera habenti et iterum pugnare; sine, fert. Amplectitur tuam seu tamen utrumque, est quos sub, nec obsuntque, refert exilio supernum carica nunc, carmen.
   2961 <a href="#l2942" class="line" id="l2942">   2942</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;b&gt;diff --git a/&lt;a id=&quot;h33&quot; href=&quot;../file/src/posts/design-thinking-understanding-the-product-design-process.md.html&quot;&gt;src/posts/design-thinking-understanding-the-product-design-process.md&lt;/a&gt; b/&lt;a href=&quot;../file/src/posts/design-thinking-understanding-the-product-design-process.md.html&quot;&gt;src/posts/design-thinking-understanding-the-product-design-process.md&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/b&gt;
   2962 <a href="#l2943" class="line" id="l2943">   2943</a> &lt;a href=&quot;#h33-0&quot; id=&quot;h33-0&quot; class=&quot;h&quot;&gt;@@ -0,0 +1,32 @@
   2963 <a href="#l2944" class="line" id="l2944">   2944</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h33-0-0&quot; id=&quot;h33-0-0&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+---
   2964 <a href="#l2945" class="line" id="l2945">   2945</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h33-0-1&quot; id=&quot;h33-0-1&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+title: &amp;#39;Design Thinking &amp;amp; Understanding the Product Design Process&amp;#39;
   2965 <a href="#l2946" class="line" id="l2946">   2946</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h33-0-2&quot; id=&quot;h33-0-2&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+date: 2020-02-22
   2966 <a href="#l2947" class="line" id="l2947">   2947</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h33-0-3&quot; id=&quot;h33-0-3&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+tags: &amp;#39;Design Thinking&amp;#39;
   2967 <a href="#l2948" class="line" id="l2948">   2948</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h33-0-4&quot; id=&quot;h33-0-4&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+---
   2968 <a href="#l2949" class="line" id="l2949">   2949</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h33-0-5&quot; id=&quot;h33-0-5&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2969 <a href="#l2950" class="line" id="l2950">   2950</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h33-0-6&quot; id=&quot;h33-0-6&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+Lorem markdownum purpura dolorem! Paterque gentis nam **consilii** temptanti comitum epulae hic iuvene inducta cava talia solebat iussit.
   2970 <a href="#l2951" class="line" id="l2951">   2951</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h33-0-7&quot; id=&quot;h33-0-7&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2971 <a href="#l2952" class="line" id="l2952">   2952</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h33-0-8&quot; id=&quot;h33-0-8&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;gt; Natasque iacebat curvantem me iactat atque: non deus si omnia Buten inquit confinia ausa repertum virum. In iniusta libertas inposuitque probant, _ut iubasque_ dignus aethera vale mitem tecumque insidias concita, quis modo egentes. Pico peregit nunc; quia litore pronos iuvenalia verteris partique solvi, tres et! Enim sumus viriles concepit ementitus ullis sublime ferentes ferro Troada posse expersque terris.
   2972 <a href="#l2953" class="line" id="l2953">   2953</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h33-0-9&quot; id=&quot;h33-0-9&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2973 <a href="#l2954" class="line" id="l2954">   2954</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h33-0-10&quot; id=&quot;h33-0-10&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+## Non est fieri vani dentemque Thracum
   2974 <a href="#l2955" class="line" id="l2955">   2955</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h33-0-11&quot; id=&quot;h33-0-11&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2975 <a href="#l2956" class="line" id="l2956">   2956</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h33-0-12&quot; id=&quot;h33-0-12&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+Teneraque Peneidas nisi Isthmo, curru erat Argos dryades, ait fila. Et absumptis omnemque. Cum altum iubebat Acrota fuerat nec telisque hactenus. Ire sinus oblatae pennas, et vidit se _est numen_! Fictilibus comparat cutis.
   2976 <a href="#l2957" class="line" id="l2957">   2957</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h33-0-13&quot; id=&quot;h33-0-13&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2977 <a href="#l2958" class="line" id="l2958">   2958</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h33-0-14&quot; id=&quot;h33-0-14&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+Est me imagine [intrare dimittere](#est-nurus-nitidaeque), cremet, totosque utero. Vestros pudorem.
   2978 <a href="#l2959" class="line" id="l2959">   2959</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h33-0-15&quot; id=&quot;h33-0-15&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2979 <a href="#l2960" class="line" id="l2960">   2960</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h33-0-16&quot; id=&quot;h33-0-16&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+## Extis iactanti indicat profuit
   2980 <a href="#l2961" class="line" id="l2961">   2961</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h33-0-17&quot; id=&quot;h33-0-17&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2981 <a href="#l2962" class="line" id="l2962">   2962</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h33-0-18&quot; id=&quot;h33-0-18&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+Praebentem curis, omnibus neque admissa fortissime ipse potuit ne spes Cyllenius. Suscipitur ita dictu serva Cancri, illac sanguine fabula matrem Onetor, pro maestis voces mandata dumque **Camenae**. Roratis fluidos ubi sit stupuit rupit tura nec [me](#ales-est-easdem) regia: [ubi](#miserande-palmas-positoris) tum [cepit](#medea) contra modumque refert caeruleusque minax.
   2982 <a href="#l2963" class="line" id="l2963">   2963</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h33-0-19&quot; id=&quot;h33-0-19&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2983 <a href="#l2964" class="line" id="l2964">   2964</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h33-0-20&quot; id=&quot;h33-0-20&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;gt; Eburno Phoebi nec mille fluctus tinguitur _quaque_ terris intra **et sceleri vocamus** gravis ante, est! Aloidas quis vincite pectora puer, ducens. Sine urbes: quem vati subducere artis quisquis, legit nuper, erat quos. Quae vultus hic triplex, lumina et bina _femina pectore_, suco ducit ventis parentem Abanteis. Abarin inmeritas et reddunt; phaethon inroravit arcanis vates; laboris.
   2984 <a href="#l2965" class="line" id="l2965">   2965</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h33-0-21&quot; id=&quot;h33-0-21&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2985 <a href="#l2966" class="line" id="l2966">   2966</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h33-0-22&quot; id=&quot;h33-0-22&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+## Cladis abeunt bimari per ad hanc
   2986 <a href="#l2967" class="line" id="l2967">   2967</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h33-0-23&quot; id=&quot;h33-0-23&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2987 <a href="#l2968" class="line" id="l2968">   2968</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h33-0-24&quot; id=&quot;h33-0-24&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+Cava metum iam pinum, aequora auferat memorant aut versat forsitan Phoebe! Mutastis apparuit novit aegre cognati est, in nostri ratibus Pergama partes campoque.
   2988 <a href="#l2969" class="line" id="l2969">   2969</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h33-0-25&quot; id=&quot;h33-0-25&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   2989 <a href="#l2970" class="line" id="l2970">   2970</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h33-0-26&quot; id=&quot;h33-0-26&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+1. Saepe scire cauda
   2990 <a href="#l2971" class="line" id="l2971">   2971</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h33-0-27&quot; id=&quot;h33-0-27&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+2. Pergus nunc inde iamque secura seriemque viso
   2991 <a href="#l2972" class="line" id="l2972">   2972</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h33-0-28&quot; id=&quot;h33-0-28&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+3. Ibat Tempe locum ostia lacrimarum fraudem illa
   2992 <a href="#l2973" class="line" id="l2973">   2973</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h33-0-29&quot; id=&quot;h33-0-29&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+4. Acutis carpitur et restat volvitur radiis deus
   2993 <a href="#l2974" class="line" id="l2974">   2974</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h33-0-30&quot; id=&quot;h33-0-30&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+5. Aloidas tenues
   2994 <a href="#l2975" class="line" id="l2975">   2975</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h33-0-31&quot; id=&quot;h33-0-31&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+6. Etiamnum in amans vinctus quo ratis profecti
   2995 <a href="#l2976" class="line" id="l2976">   2976</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;b&gt;diff --git a/&lt;a id=&quot;h34&quot; href=&quot;../file/src/posts/how-to-create-a-remote-usability-test-for-fast-actionable-insights.md.html&quot;&gt;src/posts/how-to-create-a-remote-usability-test-for-fast-actionable-insights.md&lt;/a&gt; b/&lt;a href=&quot;../file/src/posts/how-to-create-a-remote-usability-test-for-fast-actionable-insights.md.html&quot;&gt;src/posts/how-to-create-a-remote-usability-test-for-fast-actionable-insights.md&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/b&gt;
   2996 <a href="#l2977" class="line" id="l2977">   2977</a> &lt;a href=&quot;#h34-0&quot; id=&quot;h34-0&quot; class=&quot;h&quot;&gt;@@ -0,0 +1,50 @@
   2997 <a href="#l2978" class="line" id="l2978">   2978</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h34-0-0&quot; id=&quot;h34-0-0&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+---
   2998 <a href="#l2979" class="line" id="l2979">   2979</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h34-0-1&quot; id=&quot;h34-0-1&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+title: &amp;#39;How to create a remote usability test for fast, actionable insights&amp;#39;
   2999 <a href="#l2980" class="line" id="l2980">   2980</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h34-0-2&quot; id=&quot;h34-0-2&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+date: 2020-02-03
   3000 <a href="#l2981" class="line" id="l2981">   2981</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h34-0-3&quot; id=&quot;h34-0-3&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+tags: [&amp;#39;UX&amp;#39;, &amp;#39;Testing&amp;#39;]
   3001 <a href="#l2982" class="line" id="l2982">   2982</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h34-0-4&quot; id=&quot;h34-0-4&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+---
   3002 <a href="#l2983" class="line" id="l2983">   2983</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h34-0-5&quot; id=&quot;h34-0-5&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+Lorem markdownum tecta: sub candore removete cessit summum [laetitiae](#adigitque-qua)? Per et est micantia nisi fato? Inde cura velamina tamen deme nititur ubere: una sidera fruticosa primus demissam transire in muneris. Inter est repugnat [dempta](#medio-sine-quamvis), sinu, quisque.
   3003 <a href="#l2984" class="line" id="l2984">   2984</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h34-0-6&quot; id=&quot;h34-0-6&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3004 <a href="#l2985" class="line" id="l2985">   2985</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h34-0-7&quot; id=&quot;h34-0-7&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;gt; Huic e hunc flamina in eripuit vittisconcutiens et Phylius fulmineo. Medium cursu Acastus nolim **auditas se** videntur undis et Ulixes et tanto coruscis luctibus perdidit iam undique Medea finiat. Labare marmoris; in arte inpressa, tacuit, Argosque! Et quodsi arma, et **verba**, dominoque colla prece, [Hippodamen ab](#mittunt) viderit cruor rugosoque terra omnipotens.
   3005 <a href="#l2986" class="line" id="l2986">   2986</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h34-0-8&quot; id=&quot;h34-0-8&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3006 <a href="#l2987" class="line" id="l2987">   2987</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h34-0-9&quot; id=&quot;h34-0-9&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+## Crudelia qua arida quae ducum
   3007 <a href="#l2988" class="line" id="l2988">   2988</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h34-0-10&quot; id=&quot;h34-0-10&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3008 <a href="#l2989" class="line" id="l2989">   2989</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h34-0-11&quot; id=&quot;h34-0-11&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+Tirynthia sacras. Sed urbes; est et adamante tegens, dea data [nebulas](#nullam-persea-conplexa) buxoque, mansura pars, corpore! Currere iacent curaeque addidit [qui](#vetitum-nostris-vultus) Tydidae aeris. Ignotas se *matris timido aquae*: pedis alis circum lilia flumine, et fecit mei minores tantum. Funera caput.
   3009 <a href="#l2990" class="line" id="l2990">   2990</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h34-0-12&quot; id=&quot;h34-0-12&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3010 <a href="#l2991" class="line" id="l2991">   2991</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h34-0-13&quot; id=&quot;h34-0-13&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;gt; Parens parte mora: caput copia, [senes quae cervix](#aptumque-hypsea-est) Troum tenent, rectior. Foret sanguine lilia. Aut arvo repetita palmas.
   3011 <a href="#l2992" class="line" id="l2992">   2992</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h34-0-14&quot; id=&quot;h34-0-14&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3012 <a href="#l2993" class="line" id="l2993">   2993</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h34-0-15&quot; id=&quot;h34-0-15&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+## Quae ideoque
   3013 <a href="#l2994" class="line" id="l2994">   2994</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h34-0-16&quot; id=&quot;h34-0-16&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3014 <a href="#l2995" class="line" id="l2995">   2995</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h34-0-17&quot; id=&quot;h34-0-17&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+Antri fervoribus fulvae: adest modo veretur in pignus essem, [auro](#tendat-illis-sed) et Orphea filia, demens, regnorum, aut. Nivea est ubi peragit, usus utere Talia permanet, omnes.
   3015 <a href="#l2996" class="line" id="l2996">   2996</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h34-0-18&quot; id=&quot;h34-0-18&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3016 <a href="#l2997" class="line" id="l2997">   2997</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h34-0-19&quot; id=&quot;h34-0-19&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;gt; Iaculum si tenues vivit fuit, ille quoque proceres summisque, quaerere. Utque dixit harpen astra antiquas; deus nondum et successu.
   3017 <a href="#l2998" class="line" id="l2998">   2998</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h34-0-20&quot; id=&quot;h34-0-20&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3018 <a href="#l2999" class="line" id="l2999">   2999</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h34-0-21&quot; id=&quot;h34-0-21&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+In se silvis sulphure **caecisque navita relanguit**, auxilium vulnus levem, superesse orbem Iapetionides. In trahit undas concilium urbe Aiax foedus pavit sonum probatum nunc timentem bene!
   3019 <a href="#l3000" class="line" id="l3000">   3000</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h34-0-22&quot; id=&quot;h34-0-22&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3020 <a href="#l3001" class="line" id="l3001">   3001</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h34-0-23&quot; id=&quot;h34-0-23&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+Lorem markdownum quicumque illa. Licuit saetae in pedem moles **clamare etiam**. Sunt ligati genu Oetaeis fines non addit, *sub silvestribus stabula* servat; et pelago in reticere. Iphi tristis egit vatum Priamum cuncta, tu sive liquidas, est cum [paciscitur tamen](#manu-accessit-verbis). Fata post voles sparsosque ducat pedibusque nobilitas diem miseroque natum corrigit hanc in quem tuum quos in.
   3021 <a href="#l3002" class="line" id="l3002">   3002</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h34-0-24&quot; id=&quot;h34-0-24&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3022 <a href="#l3003" class="line" id="l3003">   3003</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h34-0-25&quot; id=&quot;h34-0-25&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;gt; *Vires* illo sum, nec, nunc, ademi silvas occubuit magnanimus umore, sit alimenta quam, lateque. Illa excipit: bos platanus mihi, est lacessas cum, quid Iuno ter frondentis te convexa iuvenes nobis rates. Fruges magna, inflataque tale attonitae acies.
   3023 <a href="#l3004" class="line" id="l3004">   3004</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h34-0-26&quot; id=&quot;h34-0-26&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3024 <a href="#l3005" class="line" id="l3005">   3005</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h34-0-27&quot; id=&quot;h34-0-27&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+## Ac fretaque rapitur pluma numine aris
   3025 <a href="#l3006" class="line" id="l3006">   3006</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h34-0-28&quot; id=&quot;h34-0-28&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3026 <a href="#l3007" class="line" id="l3007">   3007</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h34-0-29&quot; id=&quot;h34-0-29&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+**Arreptamque** dixit faciendus ex somnis damnavit nocens ut picae. Uno **paternum** dicta furtisque noctem hoste in Bybli dilectus. Est angue noverat: coniunx et disque tuentes tenes raptaque praeside. Ducit vos ego Italiae nimbis miserae **superos** praeterque, certa per. Quae bene atque sequitur crimen inter tollere.
   3027 <a href="#l3008" class="line" id="l3008">   3008</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h34-0-30&quot; id=&quot;h34-0-30&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3028 <a href="#l3009" class="line" id="l3009">   3009</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h34-0-31&quot; id=&quot;h34-0-31&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+- Crudelia properas praeterita prima est mei lumina
   3029 <a href="#l3010" class="line" id="l3010">   3010</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h34-0-32&quot; id=&quot;h34-0-32&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+- Onus per serpens celant
   3030 <a href="#l3011" class="line" id="l3011">   3011</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h34-0-33&quot; id=&quot;h34-0-33&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+- Generisque rarior est sperat
   3031 <a href="#l3012" class="line" id="l3012">   3012</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h34-0-34&quot; id=&quot;h34-0-34&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+- Tum signa tegebant perire militia nivibus exacta
   3032 <a href="#l3013" class="line" id="l3013">   3013</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h34-0-35&quot; id=&quot;h34-0-35&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3033 <a href="#l3014" class="line" id="l3014">   3014</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h34-0-36&quot; id=&quot;h34-0-36&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+## Lacrimare volentem
   3034 <a href="#l3015" class="line" id="l3015">   3015</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h34-0-37&quot; id=&quot;h34-0-37&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3035 <a href="#l3016" class="line" id="l3016">   3016</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h34-0-38&quot; id=&quot;h34-0-38&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+Cursus plenum? Usus rura timidis.
   3036 <a href="#l3017" class="line" id="l3017">   3017</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h34-0-39&quot; id=&quot;h34-0-39&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3037 <a href="#l3018" class="line" id="l3018">   3018</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h34-0-40&quot; id=&quot;h34-0-40&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+- Est sed ignotis texit insequitur cerebro summae
   3038 <a href="#l3019" class="line" id="l3019">   3019</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h34-0-41&quot; id=&quot;h34-0-41&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+- In et auras sanguine Maeonia
   3039 <a href="#l3020" class="line" id="l3020">   3020</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h34-0-42&quot; id=&quot;h34-0-42&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+- Medium ait dederant ferunt munus
   3040 <a href="#l3021" class="line" id="l3021">   3021</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h34-0-43&quot; id=&quot;h34-0-43&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+- Tamen mutor tu esse ambiguis Auram
   3041 <a href="#l3022" class="line" id="l3022">   3022</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h34-0-44&quot; id=&quot;h34-0-44&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3042 <a href="#l3023" class="line" id="l3023">   3023</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h34-0-45&quot; id=&quot;h34-0-45&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+## Exit fortes bibendo ferre nemus spe velociter
   3043 <a href="#l3024" class="line" id="l3024">   3024</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h34-0-46&quot; id=&quot;h34-0-46&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3044 <a href="#l3025" class="line" id="l3025">   3025</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h34-0-47&quot; id=&quot;h34-0-47&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+Frustra aera verum lusuque [inquit nata](#ora-meos-in) mixtum arva Glaucus vitiataque *exaestuat ruborem*. Ergo refugitque nocti tingui si corpus factis maius in vipereos stratis servant aut quae viribus circum, victi.
   3045 <a href="#l3026" class="line" id="l3026">   3026</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h34-0-48&quot; id=&quot;h34-0-48&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3046 <a href="#l3027" class="line" id="l3027">   3027</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h34-0-49&quot; id=&quot;h34-0-49&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+Deos tulit Cephison nequiquam luctus tellus: ora iacet aequoris viri gurgite cumulum ad ignibus *neque*. Hectoris posse: vinclis stupet! Putat tuorum; ramos, lotos populi demptis tenues hic time procorum domo?
   3047 <a href="#l3028" class="line" id="l3028">   3028</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;b&gt;diff --git a/&lt;a id=&quot;h35&quot; href=&quot;../file/src/posts/how-to-test-usability-of-websites-remotely.md.html&quot;&gt;src/posts/how-to-test-usability-of-websites-remotely.md&lt;/a&gt; b/&lt;a href=&quot;../file/src/posts/how-to-test-usability-of-websites-remotely.md.html&quot;&gt;src/posts/how-to-test-usability-of-websites-remotely.md&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/b&gt;
   3048 <a href="#l3029" class="line" id="l3029">   3029</a> &lt;a href=&quot;#h35-0&quot; id=&quot;h35-0&quot; class=&quot;h&quot;&gt;@@ -0,0 +1,24 @@
   3049 <a href="#l3030" class="line" id="l3030">   3030</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h35-0-0&quot; id=&quot;h35-0-0&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+---
   3050 <a href="#l3031" class="line" id="l3031">   3031</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h35-0-1&quot; id=&quot;h35-0-1&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+title: &amp;#39;How to test usability of websites remotely&amp;#39;
   3051 <a href="#l3032" class="line" id="l3032">   3032</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h35-0-2&quot; id=&quot;h35-0-2&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+date: 2019-12-03
   3052 <a href="#l3033" class="line" id="l3033">   3033</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h35-0-3&quot; id=&quot;h35-0-3&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+tags: [&amp;#39;UX&amp;#39;, &amp;#39;Testing&amp;#39;]
   3053 <a href="#l3034" class="line" id="l3034">   3034</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h35-0-4&quot; id=&quot;h35-0-4&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+---
   3054 <a href="#l3035" class="line" id="l3035">   3035</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h35-0-5&quot; id=&quot;h35-0-5&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+Lorem markdownum et quaeque nunc cum *Atlantiades* versis, valuit meos tumescere fateri in circa. Ipso colla multum volentem, in viro neve, semineces ac erat carmine manus. *Per* amat aut **Thracesque semina** meritus lacrimas scinditur et pro enim summis, probat gravi mare. Cuspide sustulit, secutis alte, muta tibi me o torum. Probavit tegitur meritum, Pythia subscribi, miscuerat fallax, hoc mille.
   3055 <a href="#l3036" class="line" id="l3036">   3036</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h35-0-6&quot; id=&quot;h35-0-6&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3056 <a href="#l3037" class="line" id="l3037">   3037</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h35-0-7&quot; id=&quot;h35-0-7&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;gt; Cthonius toto ignara excussit dixit ora dentes loquatur hi tractus maius, alto. Suae nomine tellus, conparentis bene Phaethon bene Iphis quisquis cretum eram quoque nec haec fugiunt trepidans in torvo. Columbae extrema occupat huic, precari enim rupem equos his fama. Deerit hunc paludosa ex sine non quamquam veram simul, quid, vipereis aures intabescere maior corpus, imas.
   3057 <a href="#l3038" class="line" id="l3038">   3038</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h35-0-8&quot; id=&quot;h35-0-8&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3058 <a href="#l3039" class="line" id="l3039">   3039</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h35-0-9&quot; id=&quot;h35-0-9&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+Corpora est, ad dixit auctoris tumulavit in **fateor** versarunt latet: gladiis undamque Medusae: sunt videt hic. Annum penetralia usque maior esse *Cyllare* medii precanda ab est montis ne, deae Oeten se uterum ad pressaeque patrii. Et putat nulla, iam umeris indotata signaque rerum unius medicamina quam ripa annum lecturum ut torum magicaeque Phrygios? Victus arma, malo curas temptabimus illi oborto undis pharetra! Caelo risi cecidere quo ferrum: solis tacitus patrii, in lato.
   3059 <a href="#l3040" class="line" id="l3040">   3040</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h35-0-10&quot; id=&quot;h35-0-10&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3060 <a href="#l3041" class="line" id="l3041">   3041</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h35-0-11&quot; id=&quot;h35-0-11&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+## Quae sedes percussit
   3061 <a href="#l3042" class="line" id="l3042">   3042</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h35-0-12&quot; id=&quot;h35-0-12&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3062 <a href="#l3043" class="line" id="l3043">   3043</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h35-0-13&quot; id=&quot;h35-0-13&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+Mihi sed Talibus est addere negetur, poscis facis, subvolat, uno detraxit post: me aurata, egreditur. **Se moenia quosque** commune: ait sive. Sit non per voce vinctus, ut frondes hanc avido [si naturae saucius](#suo-atque).
   3063 <a href="#l3044" class="line" id="l3044">   3044</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h35-0-14&quot; id=&quot;h35-0-14&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3064 <a href="#l3045" class="line" id="l3045">   3045</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h35-0-15&quot; id=&quot;h35-0-15&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;gt; Sequenti albet; iram nisi ima *montis sanguine parmam* quinquennem. Illo haut, deus est percurrere gaudia meruisse pia simul; ire. Imminet errore pestifero Amphissos uterum annua protinus Menephron vultus avium ortus, serpit opus: non. Eueni meis cauda coluique **molarem mitissima**; ramos exit illa salutem ensis ille quam pontum.
   3065 <a href="#l3046" class="line" id="l3046">   3046</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h35-0-16&quot; id=&quot;h35-0-16&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3066 <a href="#l3047" class="line" id="l3047">   3047</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h35-0-17&quot; id=&quot;h35-0-17&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+## Ferre incipit Melanthus exiguo
   3067 <a href="#l3048" class="line" id="l3048">   3048</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h35-0-18&quot; id=&quot;h35-0-18&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3068 <a href="#l3049" class="line" id="l3049">   3049</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h35-0-19&quot; id=&quot;h35-0-19&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+Versus deinde pectoraque arcana glandiferam passu, et placet cuncti nitido adfectu loca erat Tusci, vidistis. **Cum oculis carinas** simul fatum quaterque anxia paverunt tegat, repulsam **et invicti fundebat** et pavit a seges [per patris](#reliquerat). Lacrimae rubescunt et tenus superare adspicis flammis illi usu lacrimae procul ei frustra Hectoris annis exstructas campos inhaesit pectore movit. Ipse nuper densis aevo anguem, vides apta aquis, creditur. Es *tulit* culpa, cruore arma ore premunt apte, sua!
   3069 <a href="#l3050" class="line" id="l3050">   3050</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h35-0-20&quot; id=&quot;h35-0-20&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3070 <a href="#l3051" class="line" id="l3051">   3051</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h35-0-21&quot; id=&quot;h35-0-21&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;gt; Alto operum concolor Daedalus. Sit ipse contrarius tibi bracchia saecula et comas uritur, divino ut percussamque et **Dianae**, lacrimaeque. Tuos stellarum Ithacus sub, et rutilis torrentur staret pietas laborant sagittae contraria sorores. Matre ipsa nostro cum omnes unde virga seque barbam functa de habebat ictae, et metuens.
   3071 <a href="#l3052" class="line" id="l3052">   3052</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h35-0-22&quot; id=&quot;h35-0-22&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3072 <a href="#l3053" class="line" id="l3053">   3053</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h35-0-23&quot; id=&quot;h35-0-23&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+Non matrem mactatae se multa odium ipsa, ubi cremabo, Solis ferro Asbolus in. Nox fodientibus suo inplent ebur, Qui tamen nec movit, et ruit Hypanis ereptus postes attenuatus.
   3073 <a href="#l3054" class="line" id="l3054">   3054</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;b&gt;diff --git a/&lt;a id=&quot;h36&quot; href=&quot;../file/src/posts/laws-of-ux.md.html&quot;&gt;src/posts/laws-of-ux.md&lt;/a&gt; b/&lt;a href=&quot;../file/src/posts/laws-of-ux.md.html&quot;&gt;src/posts/laws-of-ux.md&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/b&gt;
   3074 <a href="#l3055" class="line" id="l3055">   3055</a> &lt;a href=&quot;#h36-0&quot; id=&quot;h36-0&quot; class=&quot;h&quot;&gt;@@ -0,0 +1,26 @@
   3075 <a href="#l3056" class="line" id="l3056">   3056</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h36-0-0&quot; id=&quot;h36-0-0&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+---
   3076 <a href="#l3057" class="line" id="l3057">   3057</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h36-0-1&quot; id=&quot;h36-0-1&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+title: &amp;#39;Laws of UX&amp;#39;
   3077 <a href="#l3058" class="line" id="l3058">   3058</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h36-0-2&quot; id=&quot;h36-0-2&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+date: 2020-03-23
   3078 <a href="#l3059" class="line" id="l3059">   3059</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h36-0-3&quot; id=&quot;h36-0-3&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+tags: &amp;#39;UX&amp;#39;
   3079 <a href="#l3060" class="line" id="l3060">   3060</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h36-0-4&quot; id=&quot;h36-0-4&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+---
   3080 <a href="#l3061" class="line" id="l3061">   3061</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h36-0-5&quot; id=&quot;h36-0-5&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3081 <a href="#l3062" class="line" id="l3062">   3062</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h36-0-6&quot; id=&quot;h36-0-6&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+Lorem **markdownum illum**: possem pectore trucis genitus volat de ictu reparet, repetenda translata tulit. Celanda sed. Contulerat flavum; tua versus patiensque dumque nemorum. Caput colla nomen aras vela tum favilla velle unica, venit poenaeque expertem in ligones huius et invenit libat *resupinus*.
   3082 <a href="#l3063" class="line" id="l3063">   3063</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h36-0-7&quot; id=&quot;h36-0-7&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3083 <a href="#l3064" class="line" id="l3064">   3064</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h36-0-8&quot; id=&quot;h36-0-8&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+- Est umeri poenaeque
   3084 <a href="#l3065" class="line" id="l3065">   3065</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h36-0-9&quot; id=&quot;h36-0-9&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+- Quae silvas sacerdos crescit
   3085 <a href="#l3066" class="line" id="l3066">   3066</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h36-0-10&quot; id=&quot;h36-0-10&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+- Matre tenebras propensum stramine mearum Aiax metusque
   3086 <a href="#l3067" class="line" id="l3067">   3067</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h36-0-11&quot; id=&quot;h36-0-11&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+- Plura harundine talia
   3087 <a href="#l3068" class="line" id="l3068">   3068</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h36-0-12&quot; id=&quot;h36-0-12&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+- Timentia iunctissimus
   3088 <a href="#l3069" class="line" id="l3069">   3069</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h36-0-13&quot; id=&quot;h36-0-13&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+- Non caeloque infantem
   3089 <a href="#l3070" class="line" id="l3070">   3070</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h36-0-14&quot; id=&quot;h36-0-14&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3090 <a href="#l3071" class="line" id="l3071">   3071</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h36-0-15&quot; id=&quot;h36-0-15&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+Dextra Sabini! Proles sceleris: longa est mea haec hoc tempore adiutus tamen. Venandi fronte patrium accipiunt potum intumuit fluvios tutum properare inmittite saepe? Mihi par visis.
   3091 <a href="#l3072" class="line" id="l3072">   3072</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h36-0-16&quot; id=&quot;h36-0-16&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3092 <a href="#l3073" class="line" id="l3073">   3073</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h36-0-17&quot; id=&quot;h36-0-17&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+## Cum auro corpus utve geratis ripas inpellit
   3093 <a href="#l3074" class="line" id="l3074">   3074</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h36-0-18&quot; id=&quot;h36-0-18&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3094 <a href="#l3075" class="line" id="l3075">   3075</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h36-0-19&quot; id=&quot;h36-0-19&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+Stabat quod obvia, [patientem](#misso-nataeque): Erinys moveant, et peragit aethere facturus. Foedera ad oculis aura albo unda induit: retro omne est ergo damus genero ab cursuque Stygio di inde.
   3095 <a href="#l3076" class="line" id="l3076">   3076</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h36-0-20&quot; id=&quot;h36-0-20&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3096 <a href="#l3077" class="line" id="l3077">   3077</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h36-0-21&quot; id=&quot;h36-0-21&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;gt; Apud arce animam, Phrygiae et colla paene habentem ad ipsum. Fratrem est concipit nisi, morientia sine **pantherarum lucum**; modo. In proles vellet hostem flebile saeva **amantem** vitae forte invitique, videt quam bracchia ruit.
   3097 <a href="#l3078" class="line" id="l3078">   3078</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h36-0-22&quot; id=&quot;h36-0-22&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3098 <a href="#l3079" class="line" id="l3079">   3079</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h36-0-23&quot; id=&quot;h36-0-23&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+Est inque corpora: Aesonis: [at suis](#ulnas-fruitur) eadem tamen securim **sub roseo iamdudum** geminis pervenisse colorem, dat fronte! Ventus procorum et annum praecipitique figura, sub nati revulsum propius tamen fuisset adest Prothoenora frondes. Gorgonis **fata umidus tristi** quaecumque o pariter, non adiit; ipsa Stygia.
   3099 <a href="#l3080" class="line" id="l3080">   3080</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h36-0-24&quot; id=&quot;h36-0-24&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3100 <a href="#l3081" class="line" id="l3081">   3081</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h36-0-25&quot; id=&quot;h36-0-25&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+Memor debent, quo si Cepheus tecti es ipsa aut horrendis harenas quoque. Quacumque habebunt Semeleia vultu. Est corpus properant tibi.
   3101 <a href="#l3082" class="line" id="l3082">   3082</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;b&gt;diff --git a/&lt;a id=&quot;h37&quot; href=&quot;../file/src/posts/making-design-tokens-a-single-source-of-truth.md.html&quot;&gt;src/posts/making-design-tokens-a-single-source-of-truth.md&lt;/a&gt; b/&lt;a href=&quot;../file/src/posts/making-design-tokens-a-single-source-of-truth.md.html&quot;&gt;src/posts/making-design-tokens-a-single-source-of-truth.md&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/b&gt;
   3102 <a href="#l3083" class="line" id="l3083">   3083</a> &lt;a href=&quot;#h37-0&quot; id=&quot;h37-0&quot; class=&quot;h&quot;&gt;@@ -0,0 +1,29 @@
   3103 <a href="#l3084" class="line" id="l3084">   3084</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h37-0-0&quot; id=&quot;h37-0-0&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+---
   3104 <a href="#l3085" class="line" id="l3085">   3085</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h37-0-1&quot; id=&quot;h37-0-1&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+title: &amp;#39;Making design tokens a single source of truth&amp;#39;
   3105 <a href="#l3086" class="line" id="l3086">   3086</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h37-0-2&quot; id=&quot;h37-0-2&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+date: 2019-12-21
   3106 <a href="#l3087" class="line" id="l3087">   3087</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h37-0-3&quot; id=&quot;h37-0-3&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+tags: &amp;#39;Design Systems&amp;#39;
   3107 <a href="#l3088" class="line" id="l3088">   3088</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h37-0-4&quot; id=&quot;h37-0-4&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+---
   3108 <a href="#l3089" class="line" id="l3089">   3089</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h37-0-5&quot; id=&quot;h37-0-5&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+Lorem markdownum, bracchia iuvenis teneo, nec urget, iuvenum nec adusque. Quaerit laborum parientibus inde eloquitur impune passu coronam sed maritae oculis, valuissent ne breve novis. Nec aliena facies agros sub cupiunt Credulitas, alumnus sermonibus, medium, gemellos. Sibi nec videbor negabat; et etiam offensi amnis interea donec sanguis forsitan descenderat nempe altior!
   3109 <a href="#l3090" class="line" id="l3090">   3090</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h37-0-6&quot; id=&quot;h37-0-6&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3110 <a href="#l3091" class="line" id="l3091">   3091</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h37-0-7&quot; id=&quot;h37-0-7&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+1. Litora optasse visa tellus
   3111 <a href="#l3092" class="line" id="l3092">   3092</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h37-0-8&quot; id=&quot;h37-0-8&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+2. Lacrimante corripitur frustra conveniunt colla est inridet
   3112 <a href="#l3093" class="line" id="l3093">   3093</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h37-0-9&quot; id=&quot;h37-0-9&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+3. Super poscis
   3113 <a href="#l3094" class="line" id="l3094">   3094</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h37-0-10&quot; id=&quot;h37-0-10&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+4. Ne velamina suos iuventus
   3114 <a href="#l3095" class="line" id="l3095">   3095</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h37-0-11&quot; id=&quot;h37-0-11&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3115 <a href="#l3096" class="line" id="l3096">   3096</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h37-0-12&quot; id=&quot;h37-0-12&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+## Et murmur summa Titan esto ut opprimere
   3116 <a href="#l3097" class="line" id="l3097">   3097</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h37-0-13&quot; id=&quot;h37-0-13&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3117 <a href="#l3098" class="line" id="l3098">   3098</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h37-0-14&quot; id=&quot;h37-0-14&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+Referens timeas fides, haut sic vultusque, culpa latitantem in eadem, ossa dubitat. *Atracides et imber* vires dies placuere indignatus ardetque exire. His summa flexerat perit! Pro partu suorum ille; populos lacu positaeque vocant regia puerpera valentes o pes. Cereris rerum cornua pavet Alemoniden vitae pereunt laetum.
   3118 <a href="#l3099" class="line" id="l3099">   3099</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h37-0-15&quot; id=&quot;h37-0-15&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3119 <a href="#l3100" class="line" id="l3100">   3100</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h37-0-16&quot; id=&quot;h37-0-16&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+## Sit potuit sinus Achille tortum
   3120 <a href="#l3101" class="line" id="l3101">   3101</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h37-0-17&quot; id=&quot;h37-0-17&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3121 <a href="#l3102" class="line" id="l3102">   3102</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h37-0-18&quot; id=&quot;h37-0-18&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+Cauda corpore leto curas tamen pluma, ipse *fecundus*, nihil viris cuspide convivia sanctaque. Spectatae inpetus patulo faciendus Tethys festumque exterrita nota, litora paventis inque; hic? Ingemit et frontes tumefactum hanc, nil perque stetit, factas adductaque cubilia anno, **sanguinis**: munus **postquam**? Stuppea illa cretus? Et gaudia et moras male defecta aquarum et grates conbibitur Mendesius thyrso ausus!
   3122 <a href="#l3103" class="line" id="l3103">   3103</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h37-0-19&quot; id=&quot;h37-0-19&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3123 <a href="#l3104" class="line" id="l3104">   3104</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h37-0-20&quot; id=&quot;h37-0-20&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+Umida infamia colorum ille lacrimas, et gaudet erat hasta. Iudicis orant haerentes et, ad messes **etenim** veneni abit pendens imitatur dixit. Unum et alite ecce quoque hamo vult etiam in nigrae. Pater cava, multicavo portasse habet, nullus rem inpulsu ense nec albentia.
   3124 <a href="#l3105" class="line" id="l3105">   3105</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h37-0-21&quot; id=&quot;h37-0-21&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3125 <a href="#l3106" class="line" id="l3106">   3106</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h37-0-22&quot; id=&quot;h37-0-22&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+## Generi iactanti tibi medio conposuit inferias quibus
   3126 <a href="#l3107" class="line" id="l3107">   3107</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h37-0-23&quot; id=&quot;h37-0-23&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3127 <a href="#l3108" class="line" id="l3108">   3108</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h37-0-24&quot; id=&quot;h37-0-24&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+Nec est attigimus data, nec et territus quicquam cibique [inundet sepulcro](#inpono), adiecerit. Totiens nutrici nec sanguine favore speculatur Cicones Delphice; ore sine lumina.
   3128 <a href="#l3109" class="line" id="l3109">   3109</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h37-0-25&quot; id=&quot;h37-0-25&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3129 <a href="#l3110" class="line" id="l3110">   3110</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h37-0-26&quot; id=&quot;h37-0-26&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+Sic inde molle gradientis verum, amoris Cypron plurimus toris **dea semideique** fiducia malis motibus, is, est. Aera lingua sequerere mille lintea eadem nodosaque potest sedisti vocatur. Nomine non haec, posse nota foedera sopita. Sed animoque felix videtur *aequoreae at* quae, haustus tu inrita oculos. Quam lumbis dictis, accensae sole manu in illi strepitum videar.
   3130 <a href="#l3111" class="line" id="l3111">   3111</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h37-0-27&quot; id=&quot;h37-0-27&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3131 <a href="#l3112" class="line" id="l3112">   3112</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h37-0-28&quot; id=&quot;h37-0-28&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+Gestae **ferre mecum fata** spatium, est acta ieiunia sperat praecipue habuere. Proteu esse secedit fata hac suis: ieiunia [recens](#una). Thisbaeas lateri rogus natalibus noverca dextraque sparsae: a rore, quae veste Gyaros fluminis *cervixque nec*, coeperunt.
   3132 <a href="#l3113" class="line" id="l3113">   3113</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;b&gt;diff --git a/&lt;a id=&quot;h38&quot; href=&quot;../file/src/posts/posts.json.html&quot;&gt;src/posts/posts.json&lt;/a&gt; b/&lt;a href=&quot;../file/src/posts/posts.json.html&quot;&gt;src/posts/posts.json&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/b&gt;
   3133 <a href="#l3114" class="line" id="l3114">   3114</a> &lt;a href=&quot;#h38-0&quot; id=&quot;h38-0&quot; class=&quot;h&quot;&gt;@@ -0,0 +1,3 @@
   3134 <a href="#l3115" class="line" id="l3115">   3115</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h38-0-0&quot; id=&quot;h38-0-0&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+{
   3135 <a href="#l3116" class="line" id="l3116">   3116</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h38-0-1&quot; id=&quot;h38-0-1&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    &amp;quot;layout&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;layouts/post.njk&amp;quot;
   3136 <a href="#l3117" class="line" id="l3117">   3117</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h38-0-2&quot; id=&quot;h38-0-2&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+}
   3137 <a href="#l3118" class="line" id="l3118">   3118</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h38-0-3&quot; id=&quot;h38-0-3&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+\ No newline at end of file
   3138 <a href="#l3119" class="line" id="l3119">   3119</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;b&gt;diff --git a/&lt;a id=&quot;h39&quot; href=&quot;../file/src/posts/quick-and-simple-image-placeholder.md.html&quot;&gt;src/posts/quick-and-simple-image-placeholder.md&lt;/a&gt; b/&lt;a href=&quot;../file/src/posts/quick-and-simple-image-placeholder.md.html&quot;&gt;src/posts/quick-and-simple-image-placeholder.md&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/b&gt;
   3139 <a href="#l3120" class="line" id="l3120">   3120</a> &lt;a href=&quot;#h39-0&quot; id=&quot;h39-0&quot; class=&quot;h&quot;&gt;@@ -0,0 +1,30 @@
   3140 <a href="#l3121" class="line" id="l3121">   3121</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h39-0-0&quot; id=&quot;h39-0-0&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+---
   3141 <a href="#l3122" class="line" id="l3122">   3122</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h39-0-1&quot; id=&quot;h39-0-1&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+title: &amp;#39;Quick and simple image placeholder&amp;#39;
   3142 <a href="#l3123" class="line" id="l3123">   3123</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h39-0-2&quot; id=&quot;h39-0-2&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+date: 2019-09-28
   3143 <a href="#l3124" class="line" id="l3124">   3124</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h39-0-3&quot; id=&quot;h39-0-3&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+tags: [&amp;#39;Tips And Tricks&amp;#39;]
   3144 <a href="#l3125" class="line" id="l3125">   3125</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h39-0-4&quot; id=&quot;h39-0-4&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+---
   3145 <a href="#l3126" class="line" id="l3126">   3126</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h39-0-5&quot; id=&quot;h39-0-5&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3146 <a href="#l3127" class="line" id="l3127">   3127</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h39-0-6&quot; id=&quot;h39-0-6&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+*Lorem markdownum* clamor, ver gemitus numen se dura mortalia inquit, sine telum durata licet teretes delphina, ex! Et genus. Amissum quam genus ambieratque messes; et Ithacus bracchia; ergo famuli inquit Lyncidae ex vestibus premebat. Rogis crimine nunc hae falsaque, dignus.
   3147 <a href="#l3128" class="line" id="l3128">   3128</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h39-0-7&quot; id=&quot;h39-0-7&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3148 <a href="#l3129" class="line" id="l3129">   3129</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h39-0-8&quot; id=&quot;h39-0-8&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+1. Summo lucis vultus
   3149 <a href="#l3130" class="line" id="l3130">   3130</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h39-0-9&quot; id=&quot;h39-0-9&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+2. Sororum esse
   3150 <a href="#l3131" class="line" id="l3131">   3131</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h39-0-10&quot; id=&quot;h39-0-10&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+3. Magni exire caelestia utque totidem prisci plurima
   3151 <a href="#l3132" class="line" id="l3132">   3132</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h39-0-11&quot; id=&quot;h39-0-11&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+4. Templum dolores belua aut gravis ut fraudem
   3152 <a href="#l3133" class="line" id="l3133">   3133</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h39-0-12&quot; id=&quot;h39-0-12&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+5. Formam nata bracchia Cnosia amor esse coniuge
   3153 <a href="#l3134" class="line" id="l3134">   3134</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h39-0-13&quot; id=&quot;h39-0-13&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3154 <a href="#l3135" class="line" id="l3135">   3135</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h39-0-14&quot; id=&quot;h39-0-14&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+Anxius destringere Daedale, poenae te, leti sibi novissimus astris portus pressoque me mutavit crimine, speciem in. Pariter postis, solam?
   3155 <a href="#l3136" class="line" id="l3136">   3136</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h39-0-15&quot; id=&quot;h39-0-15&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3156 <a href="#l3137" class="line" id="l3137">   3137</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h39-0-16&quot; id=&quot;h39-0-16&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+## Graciles Lycaeo ab nihil ad avis Phoebe
   3157 <a href="#l3138" class="line" id="l3138">   3138</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h39-0-17&quot; id=&quot;h39-0-17&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3158 <a href="#l3139" class="line" id="l3139">   3139</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h39-0-18&quot; id=&quot;h39-0-18&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+Emathion est labore vagae? Adpositi quaerunt in torvo; dei laeva similis. Enim quam agitataque Martis, una misero **sed fugam** coniecto.
   3159 <a href="#l3140" class="line" id="l3140">   3140</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h39-0-19&quot; id=&quot;h39-0-19&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3160 <a href="#l3141" class="line" id="l3141">   3141</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h39-0-20&quot; id=&quot;h39-0-20&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+- De fitque correpto usum est fallaci medium
   3161 <a href="#l3142" class="line" id="l3142">   3142</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h39-0-21&quot; id=&quot;h39-0-21&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+- Moenia sensimus vidisse calorque
   3162 <a href="#l3143" class="line" id="l3143">   3143</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h39-0-22&quot; id=&quot;h39-0-22&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+- Lata tuae profugaque stetit videre haberet
   3163 <a href="#l3144" class="line" id="l3144">   3144</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h39-0-23&quot; id=&quot;h39-0-23&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+- Dant manuque Icare
   3164 <a href="#l3145" class="line" id="l3145">   3145</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h39-0-24&quot; id=&quot;h39-0-24&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3165 <a href="#l3146" class="line" id="l3146">   3146</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h39-0-25&quot; id=&quot;h39-0-25&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+Aut telum naidas ducibusque: orbem Venus latosque dicere oscula, praemia lasso indestrictus namque nec et refert Telamon. Similisque *iuvenis relanguit refert* uterum boves. Sed flenti inquit; ait iure squalidus e pennae adverso et carne haec adsunt; hoc. Solio adfectas Erymanthon eruerit tollens, **est traxit** robore at. Aras veterem virtus et ad viridi sceleratus, penitusque totum.
   3166 <a href="#l3147" class="line" id="l3147">   3147</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h39-0-26&quot; id=&quot;h39-0-26&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3167 <a href="#l3148" class="line" id="l3148">   3148</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h39-0-27&quot; id=&quot;h39-0-27&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+Sic nec labare digitos tempore, mea, erat matri repagula pectore dona. Parvo moveri tantum! **Nec sed** est et, Nereaque et tellus sidereis nimium! Locus nam, non naribus lotos [de](#simul-tua-tenent) nivea viros merui semina leves, vobis se vallem agris et. Interea quae dixere illa, undis haec ipse sanguine moriens.
   3168 <a href="#l3149" class="line" id="l3149">   3149</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h39-0-28&quot; id=&quot;h39-0-28&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3169 <a href="#l3150" class="line" id="l3150">   3150</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h39-0-29&quot; id=&quot;h39-0-29&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+Summae sui tentoria coercuit, ora uncis nunc, exhorruit colunt supersint spectem, Io premunt natum Oeclides Iovis. Membra volvere sororum libera murmura, habet adultera, semine finitur, te te illi pennis nomen, nec quisquis. Frustra perque, ipse membris et poma vincinaque umeris iste? Longus et a margine igitur esse, est mutavit ille abest mihi circuitu tempore possent. Ultima [silvis thalamo](#se) vestras, *quae probat* curia medium Chaonius necopina, te nostraque armos quod Colchi.
   3170 <a href="#l3151" class="line" id="l3151">   3151</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;b&gt;diff --git a/&lt;a id=&quot;h40&quot; href=&quot;../file/src/posts/typography-tips-for-the-web.md.html&quot;&gt;src/posts/typography-tips-for-the-web.md&lt;/a&gt; b/&lt;a href=&quot;../file/src/posts/typography-tips-for-the-web.md.html&quot;&gt;src/posts/typography-tips-for-the-web.md&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/b&gt;
   3171 <a href="#l3152" class="line" id="l3152">   3152</a> &lt;a href=&quot;#h40-0&quot; id=&quot;h40-0&quot; class=&quot;h&quot;&gt;@@ -0,0 +1,30 @@
   3172 <a href="#l3153" class="line" id="l3153">   3153</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h40-0-0&quot; id=&quot;h40-0-0&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+---
   3173 <a href="#l3154" class="line" id="l3154">   3154</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h40-0-1&quot; id=&quot;h40-0-1&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+title: &amp;#39;Typography tips for the web&amp;#39;
   3174 <a href="#l3155" class="line" id="l3155">   3155</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h40-0-2&quot; id=&quot;h40-0-2&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+date: 2019-12-04
   3175 <a href="#l3156" class="line" id="l3156">   3156</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h40-0-3&quot; id=&quot;h40-0-3&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+tags: [&amp;#39;Tips And Tricks&amp;#39;]
   3176 <a href="#l3157" class="line" id="l3157">   3157</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h40-0-4&quot; id=&quot;h40-0-4&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+---
   3177 <a href="#l3158" class="line" id="l3158">   3158</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h40-0-5&quot; id=&quot;h40-0-5&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+Lorem markdownum pectus neque! Nomen et cepit in caedis protinus, motumque aderam collumque sedem domum.
   3178 <a href="#l3159" class="line" id="l3159">   3159</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h40-0-6&quot; id=&quot;h40-0-6&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3179 <a href="#l3160" class="line" id="l3160">   3160</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h40-0-7&quot; id=&quot;h40-0-7&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+1. Erat cervus haec
   3180 <a href="#l3161" class="line" id="l3161">   3161</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h40-0-8&quot; id=&quot;h40-0-8&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+2. Inscribit maximus
   3181 <a href="#l3162" class="line" id="l3162">   3162</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h40-0-9&quot; id=&quot;h40-0-9&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+3. Annos cum iuvene iustissimus pater cinctasque genetrix
   3182 <a href="#l3163" class="line" id="l3163">   3163</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h40-0-10&quot; id=&quot;h40-0-10&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3183 <a href="#l3164" class="line" id="l3164">   3164</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h40-0-11&quot; id=&quot;h40-0-11&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+## Per ultro ortum gravidae temperat
   3184 <a href="#l3165" class="line" id="l3165">   3165</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h40-0-12&quot; id=&quot;h40-0-12&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3185 <a href="#l3166" class="line" id="l3166">   3166</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h40-0-13&quot; id=&quot;h40-0-13&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+Ulla quod tuum **easdem** subiere, Atrides plura, Pagasaeae paret sentit. Manibusque virginis, coniugium auras: Venerem damna fugacibus cristati viget in rogos breve! O serva dolentem totidem avertitur et minus, tuens in tela boum habent leaeque. Aris aras lympha Memnonis tenebrae et nominis **fratribus** tuae premens nitore ademi ope fallaci summo, **mortisque** sanguine. Utque moras tellus frigida vestes, nec fiant manat de parenti velamina.
   3186 <a href="#l3167" class="line" id="l3167">   3167</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h40-0-14&quot; id=&quot;h40-0-14&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3187 <a href="#l3168" class="line" id="l3168">   3168</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h40-0-15&quot; id=&quot;h40-0-15&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+1. Flammas anguis
   3188 <a href="#l3169" class="line" id="l3169">   3169</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h40-0-16&quot; id=&quot;h40-0-16&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+2. Sceleratos sanguinis validi corpore dederat verbis numinis
   3189 <a href="#l3170" class="line" id="l3170">   3170</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h40-0-17&quot; id=&quot;h40-0-17&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+3. Eratque mitissima
   3190 <a href="#l3171" class="line" id="l3171">   3171</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h40-0-18&quot; id=&quot;h40-0-18&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+4. Carebis armis demas unus retendit
   3191 <a href="#l3172" class="line" id="l3172">   3172</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h40-0-19&quot; id=&quot;h40-0-19&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+5. Fuit Iuno securi
   3192 <a href="#l3173" class="line" id="l3173">   3173</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h40-0-20&quot; id=&quot;h40-0-20&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3193 <a href="#l3174" class="line" id="l3174">   3174</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h40-0-21&quot; id=&quot;h40-0-21&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+## Contra quasi transferre et imago quoque manu
   3194 <a href="#l3175" class="line" id="l3175">   3175</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h40-0-22&quot; id=&quot;h40-0-22&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3195 <a href="#l3176" class="line" id="l3176">   3176</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h40-0-23&quot; id=&quot;h40-0-23&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+Transire stratis, ut **se** exiguo plenis **clarum armiger simulati** tuum. Potentior a [pavidam](#inque), inque modo colle **colubrasque porrigis** altae in aura, at attactu. Et fessis longo; abi de, egi anni, habeo pars tecta extimuit.
   3196 <a href="#l3177" class="line" id="l3177">   3177</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h40-0-24&quot; id=&quot;h40-0-24&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3197 <a href="#l3178" class="line" id="l3178">   3178</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h40-0-25&quot; id=&quot;h40-0-25&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+Mota crimina, honor misit *amnis humo*, ter vidi medios terga, sprevere. Est nunc plangor concurrere opifer ore, eurytus tellus.
   3198 <a href="#l3179" class="line" id="l3179">   3179</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h40-0-26&quot; id=&quot;h40-0-26&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3199 <a href="#l3180" class="line" id="l3180">   3180</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h40-0-27&quot; id=&quot;h40-0-27&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+Rurigenae Parnasia proelia confertque nostri; ore cum lanas regna! Est annis magnis protinus, Pleionesque et id longi sorte Tonantis. Et quod, est artes negarent primus, haec stipitis scopulis modo honorem has meis prius manus tempus ni foedabis.
   3200 <a href="#l3181" class="line" id="l3181">   3181</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h40-0-28&quot; id=&quot;h40-0-28&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3201 <a href="#l3182" class="line" id="l3182">   3182</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h40-0-29&quot; id=&quot;h40-0-29&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+Repulsam iuvenum somnos percusso salutis decimum manes! Lucida et amabam date nectare concipit humano. Vidi ardet nihil faciebat saevique nitorem quoque quidem victa.
   3202 <a href="#l3183" class="line" id="l3183">   3183</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;b&gt;diff --git a/&lt;a id=&quot;h41&quot; href=&quot;../file/src/posts/why-cross-cultural-design-really-matters.md.html&quot;&gt;src/posts/why-cross-cultural-design-really-matters.md&lt;/a&gt; b/&lt;a href=&quot;../file/src/posts/why-cross-cultural-design-really-matters.md.html&quot;&gt;src/posts/why-cross-cultural-design-really-matters.md&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/b&gt;
   3203 <a href="#l3184" class="line" id="l3184">   3184</a> &lt;a href=&quot;#h41-0&quot; id=&quot;h41-0&quot; class=&quot;h&quot;&gt;@@ -0,0 +1,34 @@
   3204 <a href="#l3185" class="line" id="l3185">   3185</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h41-0-0&quot; id=&quot;h41-0-0&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+---
   3205 <a href="#l3186" class="line" id="l3186">   3186</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h41-0-1&quot; id=&quot;h41-0-1&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+title: &amp;#39;Why cross-cultural design really matters&amp;#39;
   3206 <a href="#l3187" class="line" id="l3187">   3187</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h41-0-2&quot; id=&quot;h41-0-2&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+date: 2020-04-01
   3207 <a href="#l3188" class="line" id="l3188">   3188</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h41-0-3&quot; id=&quot;h41-0-3&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+tags: [&amp;#39;Culture&amp;#39;, &amp;#39;Design Thinking&amp;#39;]
   3208 <a href="#l3189" class="line" id="l3189">   3189</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h41-0-4&quot; id=&quot;h41-0-4&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+---
   3209 <a href="#l3190" class="line" id="l3190">   3190</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h41-0-5&quot; id=&quot;h41-0-5&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3210 <a href="#l3191" class="line" id="l3191">   3191</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h41-0-6&quot; id=&quot;h41-0-6&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+Lorem markdownum teneri dives, vota inarsit, numina qui mixto. Oculos quo vestro fero inrequieta magni. Ad inania pedes et volucrem, sub ex facti, nec huc curvamina! Semina cum sonitusque fraterno Meriones animas pervenit iusta populos faciem. Colebat et saepe!
   3211 <a href="#l3192" class="line" id="l3192">   3192</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h41-0-7&quot; id=&quot;h41-0-7&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3212 <a href="#l3193" class="line" id="l3193">   3193</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h41-0-8&quot; id=&quot;h41-0-8&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+1. Et Hectoris quaeque
   3213 <a href="#l3194" class="line" id="l3194">   3194</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h41-0-9&quot; id=&quot;h41-0-9&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+2. Noctis pars
   3214 <a href="#l3195" class="line" id="l3195">   3195</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h41-0-10&quot; id=&quot;h41-0-10&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+3. Possint dimittere poscitur
   3215 <a href="#l3196" class="line" id="l3196">   3196</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h41-0-11&quot; id=&quot;h41-0-11&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+4. Sine praemia
   3216 <a href="#l3197" class="line" id="l3197">   3197</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h41-0-12&quot; id=&quot;h41-0-12&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+5. Genae et sed in regia sonitum non
   3217 <a href="#l3198" class="line" id="l3198">   3198</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h41-0-13&quot; id=&quot;h41-0-13&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+6. Preme ne perstant non intrarit cura
   3218 <a href="#l3199" class="line" id="l3199">   3199</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h41-0-14&quot; id=&quot;h41-0-14&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3219 <a href="#l3200" class="line" id="l3200">   3200</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h41-0-15&quot; id=&quot;h41-0-15&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+## Et habenas honoratas
   3220 <a href="#l3201" class="line" id="l3201">   3201</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h41-0-16&quot; id=&quot;h41-0-16&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3221 <a href="#l3202" class="line" id="l3202">   3202</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h41-0-17&quot; id=&quot;h41-0-17&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+Modo talia, nebulae quem. Sed ducit ossaque humilis lumine, excusantia Actorides nec deus. Nec tuas pares regia, inops ne ponti, quamquam, et! Cautes viae capillos communis parce, sub curva dat **nota et**. Quaeritis inopino ligavit ne perque moriens numquam, mox iaculum apta Ciris, sunt.
   3222 <a href="#l3203" class="line" id="l3203">   3203</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h41-0-18&quot; id=&quot;h41-0-18&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3223 <a href="#l3204" class="line" id="l3204">   3204</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h41-0-19&quot; id=&quot;h41-0-19&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+Perit semideique copia. Quod tu, et **enim** inmurmurat perque, nocent adfectat ut acrior [missi](#per-inproba). Romanae est! Stipite hasta micante, puppe canities matris virgineosque duo rursus tamen mundus perque deus. Languescuntque Interea contigit ipsosque, est ore [esset](#umbrosum-medius-esse); coronae mandatam quaque os per, deique caedis.
   3224 <a href="#l3205" class="line" id="l3205">   3205</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h41-0-20&quot; id=&quot;h41-0-20&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3225 <a href="#l3206" class="line" id="l3206">   3206</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h41-0-21&quot; id=&quot;h41-0-21&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+- Ille inclusit summa forem arborea tactus in
   3226 <a href="#l3207" class="line" id="l3207">   3207</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h41-0-22&quot; id=&quot;h41-0-22&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+- Tellure refert
   3227 <a href="#l3208" class="line" id="l3208">   3208</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h41-0-23&quot; id=&quot;h41-0-23&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+- Huic quantum credere terram
   3228 <a href="#l3209" class="line" id="l3209">   3209</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h41-0-24&quot; id=&quot;h41-0-24&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
