   3229 <a href="#l3210" class="line" id="l3210">   3210</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h41-0-25&quot; id=&quot;h41-0-25&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+## Aversa et sinistra flava praemia proelia ala
   3230 <a href="#l3211" class="line" id="l3211">   3211</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h41-0-26&quot; id=&quot;h41-0-26&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3231 <a href="#l3212" class="line" id="l3212">   3212</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h41-0-27&quot; id=&quot;h41-0-27&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+Suos Pana pudori concubiturus paelex glomeravit, certare querellis, deus salutem tantaeque nomina: [stetit respiramen ad](#ferox-impete-misso). Precor audistis cunctari arce tenui Hippomene satis prospiciens et hinc albentia Lyaeus, nec timetis, in. Iam flavum cantus, Iove Pharonque in linquit _attollit_, cum? Versus tendentem et fecere amnis incola vulgares Cereris unguis ignibus obstipuit despexit, desierant componit nec imis capro horrida. Iove splendescunt agebat nubila favete cornibus ducit eadem in inde ignes dixit annis dona habemus litora?
   3232 <a href="#l3213" class="line" id="l3213">   3213</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h41-0-28&quot; id=&quot;h41-0-28&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3233 <a href="#l3214" class="line" id="l3214">   3214</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h41-0-29&quot; id=&quot;h41-0-29&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+&amp;gt; Labores ille Thespiades inde, capellae dedi adire cortice! Velant aestuat per extis Mimasque figuram. Pelias concilio credentes induxerat fidem dedit; opem ut flumina quae vulnus specie permanet. Possent non facti pelagi faveas; incubat non et certans. Medea et: tota Dite.
   3234 <a href="#l3215" class="line" id="l3215">   3215</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h41-0-30&quot; id=&quot;h41-0-30&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3235 <a href="#l3216" class="line" id="l3216">   3216</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h41-0-31&quot; id=&quot;h41-0-31&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+Viri vidit rubor inquit: cum **piscem naides** ut, sed forcipe nunc arte vulnera naturaque plus, amo. Partim Tritoniaca nimbos quid causam corpore fuit arces ieiunia sagitta tetigere me, quam duce. Volebat **revocata nate**. Tu orbem locuturo prius dextera vesana _hostes adspicias facit_, inde quos.
   3236 <a href="#l3217" class="line" id="l3217">   3217</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h41-0-32&quot; id=&quot;h41-0-32&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3237 <a href="#l3218" class="line" id="l3218">   3218</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h41-0-33&quot; id=&quot;h41-0-33&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+Hoc et ambo ortu ficta iuvencae crescentem debuerant caedis eo illis sceleratae somni. Pamphagos lapsu me idque lacertis, est pressos, dum. Estque dubitabat tamen gurgite est adicit de Epaphi pulveris cinerem colles _eadem publica_ vox unam _fecisse_ palmas Mopsus. In Mycenida fessos subsequitur **femina** notas: in vocato tamen glaciali.
   3238 <a href="#l3219" class="line" id="l3219">   3219</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;b&gt;diff --git a/&lt;a id=&quot;h42&quot; href=&quot;../file/src/scss/blocks/_page-header.scss.html&quot;&gt;src/scss/blocks/_page-header.scss&lt;/a&gt; b/&lt;a href=&quot;../file/src/scss/blocks/_page-header.scss.html&quot;&gt;src/scss/blocks/_page-header.scss&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/b&gt;
   3239 <a href="#l3220" class="line" id="l3220">   3220</a> &lt;a href=&quot;#h42-0&quot; id=&quot;h42-0&quot; class=&quot;h&quot;&gt;@@ -0,0 +1,13 @@
   3240 <a href="#l3221" class="line" id="l3221">   3221</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h42-0-0&quot; id=&quot;h42-0-0&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+.page-header {
   3241 <a href="#l3222" class="line" id="l3222">   3222</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h42-0-1&quot; id=&quot;h42-0-1&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+  padding: get-size(&amp;quot;900&amp;quot;) 0;
   3242 <a href="#l3223" class="line" id="l3223">   3223</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h42-0-2&quot; id=&quot;h42-0-2&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+  text-align: center;
   3243 <a href="#l3224" class="line" id="l3224">   3224</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h42-0-3&quot; id=&quot;h42-0-3&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+  h1 {
   3244 <a href="#l3225" class="line" id="l3225">   3225</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h42-0-4&quot; id=&quot;h42-0-4&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    font-size: get-size(&amp;quot;900&amp;quot;);
   3245 <a href="#l3226" class="line" id="l3226">   3226</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h42-0-5&quot; id=&quot;h42-0-5&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+  }
   3246 <a href="#l3227" class="line" id="l3227">   3227</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h42-0-6&quot; id=&quot;h42-0-6&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
   3247 <a href="#l3228" class="line" id="l3228">   3228</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h42-0-7&quot; id=&quot;h42-0-7&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+  @include media-query(&amp;quot;md&amp;quot;) {
   3248 <a href="#l3229" class="line" id="l3229">   3229</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h42-0-8&quot; id=&quot;h42-0-8&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    h1 {
   3249 <a href="#l3230" class="line" id="l3230">   3230</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h42-0-9&quot; id=&quot;h42-0-9&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+      font-size: get-size(&amp;quot;1100&amp;quot;);
   3250 <a href="#l3231" class="line" id="l3231">   3231</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h42-0-10&quot; id=&quot;h42-0-10&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    }
   3251 <a href="#l3232" class="line" id="l3232">   3232</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h42-0-11&quot; id=&quot;h42-0-11&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+  }
   3252 <a href="#l3233" class="line" id="l3233">   3233</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h42-0-12&quot; id=&quot;h42-0-12&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+}
   3253 <a href="#l3234" class="line" id="l3234">   3234</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;b&gt;diff --git a/&lt;a id=&quot;h43&quot; href=&quot;../file/src/scss/blocks/_post-list.scss.html&quot;&gt;src/scss/blocks/_post-list.scss&lt;/a&gt; b/&lt;a href=&quot;../file/src/scss/blocks/_post-list.scss.html&quot;&gt;src/scss/blocks/_post-list.scss&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/b&gt;
   3254 <a href="#l3235" class="line" id="l3235">   3235</a> &lt;a href=&quot;#h43-0&quot; id=&quot;h43-0&quot; class=&quot;h&quot;&gt;@@ -0,0 +1,40 @@
   3255 <a href="#l3236" class="line" id="l3236">   3236</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h43-0-0&quot; id=&quot;h43-0-0&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+.post-list {
   3256 <a href="#l3237" class="line" id="l3237">   3237</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h43-0-1&quot; id=&quot;h43-0-1&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+  &amp;amp;__item {
   3257 <a href="#l3238" class="line" id="l3238">   3238</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h43-0-2&quot; id=&quot;h43-0-2&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+    padding-bottom: get-size(&amp;quot;1000&amp;quot;);
   3258 <a href="#l3239" class="line" id="l3239">   3239</a> &lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;#h43-0-3&quot; id=&quot;h43-0-3&quot; class=&quot;i&quot;&gt;+
